.<l n="d">krīḍākulay sira lavan hyaṅ umādidevī.</l>
. <!--<app>(a) F kita; (d) y riṅ.</app>-->
. </lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.11.10" n="10"><l n="a">təkvan katattvanikanaṅ giri* rakva ṅūni,</l>
870<l n="b">indrādideva sira tan kavənaṅ maṅagra.</l>
.<l n="c">ndah* kantənanya, daśavaktra, kitan pamiṅsor,</l>
.<l n="d">byaktāṅ upadrava kiterika* yan prasaṅga.’</l>
.<!--<app> (a) v sira; (c) z ndā; (d) z -rika: kita.</app>-->
. </lg>
875<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.11.11" n="11"><l n="a">liṅ saṅ mapintu*; tumurun daśavaktra śīghra</l>
.<l n="b">saṅkeṅ vimāna, təhər aṅguyuguyv asampay,</l>
.<l n="c">yan ton gatinya mahulu vray arūpa sattva.</l>
.<l n="d">yekan śumāpa* magələṅ ya ri saṅ daśāsya:</l>
.<!--<app> (a) ABCq mapantu; (d) z yekā śumāpa.</app>-->
880 </lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.11.12" n="12"><l n="a">`ai saṅ daśāsya, paracodya* kite* gatiṅku.</l>
.<l n="b">bhoh, vray jəmah rumusakaṅ nagaramv* i ləṅkā,</l>
.<l n="c">mvaṅ vandhuvargamu kabehnya mahəntya denya.’</l>
.<l n="d">nā liṅnya, hetuni vuyuṅ* daśavaktrarāja.</l>
885<!--<app>(a) By mara-; qv kiteṅ; (b) BCF rumusakā nagaramu; (d) AD huyuṅ. (c) kahəntya &lt; mahəntya ?</app>-->
. </lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.11.13" n="13"><l n="a">krūrāṅgətəm sira rumoh vitikaṅ girīndra,</l>
.<l n="b">sampun kasaṅga, rəmukən sahananya bhasman.</l>
.<l n="c">kagyat bhaṭāra vahu rakva huvus saharṣa,</l>
890<l n="d">mvaṅ pārvatī turun adan tapih, aṅlih ambək.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.11.14" n="14"><l n="a">glānaṅ tapodhara haneṅ giripārśva mavrəg,</l>
.<l n="b">mvaṅ siṅha barvaṅ alayū sahananya meṅas.</l>
.<l n="c">yatnan bhaṭāra vihikan ri gatinya maṅkā,</l>
895<l n="d">aṅguṣṭha pādanira* vāmaṅ umīḍanāgra.</l>
.<!--<app> (d) F niki.</app>-->
. </lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.11.15" n="15"><l n="a">aṇḍəknya*, tan dva kapipit* bhuja saṅ daśāsya,</l>
.<l n="b">gək gər, nda tan kəna miṅər pva təkap bhaṭāra.</l>
900<l n="c">maṅkin sudhīra maṅunus ri taṅanya, malvat;</l>
.<l n="d">krodhāṅdhik akrakikanaṅ daśavaktrarāja.</l>
. <!--<app>(a) z həṇḍəknya; v kakapit.</app>-->
. </lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.11.16" n="16"><l n="a">humvaṅ kabeh aliliṅən sahaneṅ triloka,</l>
905<l n="b">devādi kapləṅən* avū təka riṅ śivāṇḍa,</l>
.<l n="c">vetniṅ prakopa gumuruh kadi sindhu ghora,</l>
.<l n="d">sākṣāt gəlap śatasahasra parəṅ tumampuh.</l>
. <!--<app>(b) F kapliṅən.</app>-->
. </lg>
910<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.11.17" n="17"><l n="a">saṅ hyaṅ jagatguru miṅis sira harṣacitta,</l>
.<l n="b">yekan vinehnira* vənaṅ munuse* taṅanya;</l>
.<l n="c">hyunhyun sire vuvusikaṅ* vararāvaṇeṅ rāt,</l>
.<l n="d">hetunya rāvaṇa ṅaranya təkap bhaṭāra.</l>
. <!--<app>(b) v yekā vineh; z munuseṅ; (c) y ikāṅ.</app>-->
915 </lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.11.18" n="18"><l n="a">ṅkā saṅ daśāsyan umilag saka riṅ girīndra,</l>
.<l n="b">sampun maṅañjali ya mamvit i jə̄ṅ bhaṭāra;</l>
.<l n="c">mvaṅ vāhananya muyəṅ iṅ bhuvanātiśīghra,</l>
.<l n="d">len taṅ pravīrabala rākṣasasaṅgha mahya.</l>
920</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.11.19" n="19"><l n="a">bhraṣṭaṅ kaḍatvan ika siṅ kaparah ya cūrṇa,</l>
.<l n="b">gəmpuṅ kabeh sahananiṅ ratu len balanya,</l>
.<l n="c">mvaṅ maṇḍaleki kuṭi dharma təlas rinampas,</l>
.<l n="d">de saṅ daśāsya kumusuh vəgig iṅ triloka.</l>
925</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.11.20" n="20"><l n="a">śīghran təkeṅ himavanadri daśāsyarāja,</l>
.<l n="b">ramyānuramya mihat iṅ patapan suramya.</l>
.<l n="c">ramyaṅ kapuṇḍuṅika ḍuryanikeṅ juraṅnya,</l>
.<l n="d">maṅguṣṭa* laṅsəb ika poh panasāgəṅ abyut*;</l>
930 <!--<app>(d) y maṅgiṣṭa; Fy abyat.</app>-->
. </lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.11.21" n="21"><l n="a">sə̄k taṅ pisaṅ, vvahika vṛddha* səḍəṅ* supīta;</l>
.<l n="b">movī gaganya suḍa honya taləsnikākveh.</l>
.<l n="c">yekāmaṅun sukhanikaṅ bala rākṣasāmet,</l>
935<l n="d">dudv aṅjaluk cacah i saṅ tapa len gaṅanya.</l>
. <!--<app>(a) Ay vṛddhi; F lumuṅ.</app>-->
. </lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.11.22" n="22"><l n="a">līlā lənəṅ manahikaṅ daśavaktrarāja,</l>
.<l n="b">yan ton laṅə̄nya saha tīrtha mijil sakeṅ roṅ*;</l>
940<l n="c">tovin kabeh paḍa sumaṅgraha saṅ maharṣi,</l>
.<l n="d">mavvat səḍah pucaṅike saha paṅhələ̄ vvai.</l>
. <!--<app>(b) Aqy groṅ.</app>-->
. </lg>
.</div>
945<div type="canto" rend="met" n="11" met="jagaddhita" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.12">
.<!--Jagaddhita: - - - | ~ ~ - | ~ - ~ | ~ ~ - | ~ ~ ~ | ~ ~ ~ | - ~ - | ~ =-->
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.12.01" n="1"><l n="a">tan ṅeh* yan huniṅan gatinya; tucapaṅ patapan i təpiniṅ gunuṅ kidul;</l><l n="b">groṅ durgāhrit ike təpinya midər iṅ gəgər inəmukan iṅ lamadlamad.</l><l n="c">devī vedavatī* ṅaran rasiki* saṅ tapi, suraṛṣiratnakanyakā;</l><l n="d">nāhan hetunikaṅ tapovana baṅun smarabhavana, sirānulad ratih.</l>
.<!--<app> (a) z tāṅeh; (c) C Devatika; F rasika.</app>-->
. </lg>
950<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.12.02" n="2"><l n="a">maṅkin ləṅləṅi rūmniran vinulatan mijil, i huvusiran paṅarcaṇa,</l>
.<l n="b">saṅkeṅ* meru pahoman adbhuta, pucaknya maṇimaya suteja bhāsvara;</l>
.<l n="c">bvat siṅhāsana raṅkaṅ arja ri harəpnya maṅuṅaṅ i kalaṅvaniṅ pasir,</l>
.<l n="d">jaṅgāmrik ri tətə̄nya rakva pinakoṅgvanira ləṅən anīsakən huyaṅ.</l>
.<!--<app> (b) BCF saṅke.</app>-->
955 </lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.12.03" n="3"><l n="a">sakvehniṅ kalaṅə̄n paḍāsəmu kətər, halihalin i sirāmaṅun tapa;</l>
.<l n="b">dūran taṅ vaṅiniṅ səkar mucapa yan hana luməbura śaktiniṅ tapa;</l>
.<l n="c">gəntərnyāvurahan* jugeka* ri səḍəṅnira kagaməlanāmuluṅ səkar;</l>
.<l n="d">air tambaṅ tumibəṅ* juraṅ ya makəcapkəcap ika riṅ apan pataṅgəha*.</l>
960<!--<app> (c) BD ahurahan; z jugeki; (d) y malabuh; v pitaṅgəha.</app>-->
. </lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.12.04" n="4"><l n="a">yekā hetuniṅ asmu kepvan anaṅis bhramara ləṅəṅi paṅjrahiṅ səkar;</l>
.<l n="b">lagy āluh titisiṅ tuṣāra ri pucakniṅ alalaṅika muṅgu riṅ gəgər.</l>
.<l n="c">byātītan, ri ḍatəṅ daśāsya, kadi tuhva panapanika* mogha tan luput,</l>
965<l n="d">sampun prāpta sireṅ natar, katəmu saṅ tapi sira tumurun sumambhrama*:</l>
. <!-- <app>(c) F panapakika, v padapanika, y panahanika; (d) qF susambhrama.</app> -->
.</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="12" met="upajāti" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.13">
970<!--Upajāti: = - ~ | - - ~| ~ - ~ | - =-->
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.13.01" n="1"><l n="a">`ḍū* saṅ mahārākṣasa, bhāgya saṅ prabhu,</l><l n="b">marāvilāseṅ* patapan mamī vukir.</l><l n="c">lvāmbək, tuhan, nora phalaṅ kapaṅguha,</l><l n="d">vibhukti, tapvan hana ramyaṅ uṅsirən.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) qz ḍuh; (b) q vilāse.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.13.02" n="2"><l n="a">maṅke balik* lvir paramālayeṅ laṅit,</l>
975<l n="b">təkapta sākṣāt parameśvarāləṅəṅ*,</l>
.<l n="c">mvaṅ vīrayakṣādhika devatulya ya,</l>
.<l n="d">ya tāmaṅun tuṣṭanikiṅ tapodhara.’</l>
.<!--<app> (a) q balik maṅke; (b) ACE -āṅləṅəṅ.</app>-->
. </lg>
980<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.13.03" n="3"><l n="a">liṅ saṅ sutāpī* sira gauraveṅ tamuy.</l>
.<l n="b">vimūrchitan rāvaṇa kāṇḍəhan lulut,</l>
.<l n="c">de saṅ tapī lvīr adhikāra riṅ hajə̄ṅ,</l>
.<l n="d">subhāga* de vākyaniran manohara.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) C sutarṣī; (d) F subhagya.</app> -->
985</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.13.04" n="4"><l n="a">`ai saṅ bibiṅku, dyah inaṅku saṅ tapī,</l>
.<l n="b">varah ṅhulun hetuni rūmta valkalī!</l>
.<l n="c">āpan mahācintya surūpa kottama,</l>
.<l n="d">sarehta himpər hyaṅi raśminiṅ səkar.</l>
990</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.13.05" n="5"><l n="a">sakvehnikaṅ sarva laṅə̄ hane kita:</l>
.<l n="b">aśoka sinvamnyan umiśra* riṅ təṅah,</l>
.<l n="c">nyū danta sampun rəsəp* iṅ payodhara,</l>
.<l n="d">gaḍuṅ lumuṅ lvir luṅayanta yan cala,</l>
995<!--<app> (b) F umigra; (c) v rəməsəp, y harəs.</app>-->
. </lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.13.06" n="6"><l n="a">tuñjuṅ birū tan sah ikeṅ matāluru,</l>
.<l n="b">madhubratākveh kamage vətista mār;</l>
.<l n="c">polahnikaṅ sarva sarīki* kāṅinan,</l>
1000<l n="d">baṅun vivalteki mənen kinolakən;</l>
.<!--<app> (c) y sarīra.</app>-->
. </lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.13.07" n="7"><l n="a">saṅ hyaṅ vulan lvir kadinan sireṅ vəṅi,</l>
.<l n="b">təkapni rūmtābuhayeṅ pajaṅ śaśi*.</l>
1005<l n="c">tā ṅeh hajə̄ṅteki yadin kavarṇana,</l>
.<l n="d">səkar pirekaṅ jinaheki tan cukup.’</l>
.<!--<app> (b) A śaśih.</app>-->
. </lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.13.08" n="8"><l n="a">`ai saṅ daśāsyeki,’ vuvusniraṅ tapī,</l>
1010<l n="b">`rəṅə̄n pva tā kāraṇaniṅ tapodhara.</l>
.<l n="c">vvantən surarṣy āmitadharma kottama,</l>
.<l n="d">kuśadhvajekā panəlahnireṅ sarāt.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.13.09" n="9"><l n="a">śāstrajña, putrarṣi vṛhaspatīnucap,</l>
1015<l n="b">bapaṅku tan len sira mānak iṅ hulun;</l>
.<l n="c">tūtniṅ ṅaran vedavatī*, siran tinūt</l>
.<l n="d">səḍəṅnirāveda sadā, mijil ṅhulun.</l>
.<!--<app> (c) C Devatikā.</app>-->
. </lg>
1020<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.13.10" n="10"><l n="a">yekātuhāgə̄ṅ tuvuhiṅ hulun rara,</l>
.<l n="b">aneka tekaṅ maharəp sumomaha:</l>
.<l n="c">gandharva vidyādhara daitya rākṣasa</l>
.<l n="d">surādi, sampun tinulaknirātələb.</l>
.</lg>
1025<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.13.11" n="11"><l n="a">ṅhiṅ saṅ mahākeśava mantva tan vuruṅ,</l>
.<l n="b">prayojana mvaṅ bibiniṅ hulun rəsəp.</l>
.<l n="c">ndah bhagna, mogheki pəjahniran kalih,</l>
.<l n="d">təkapnikaṅ rākṣasa śambhu* gə̄ṅ galak.</l>
.<!--<app> (d) y samya.</app>-->
1030</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.13.12" n="12"><l n="a"> doṣeṅ* hulun hetuniran vineh pati,</l>
.<l n="b">titir pininte sira tan paveh kədə̄;</l>
.<l n="c">mārgaṅku muṅsir tapa bhakty akavvitan,</l>
.<l n="d">makārtha* saṅ hyan hari lakya riṅ hələm.’</l>
1035<!--<app> (a) E2z doṣa; (d) F makarṣa, Bz makarta.</app>-->
. </lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="13" met="pr̥thvītala" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.14">
.<!--Pṛthvītala: ~ - ~ | ~ ~ - | ~ - ~ | ~ ~ - | ~ - - | ~ =-->
1040<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.14.01" n="1"><l n="a">nahan liṅira mārdaveki*; sumahur ta saṅ rāvaṇa:</l><l n="b">’ibuṅku, kita hayva maṅkana; niniṅku, mūḍhādhama*</l><l n="c">pitovi ri kədə̄nta rakva pakasādhya saṅ hyaṅ hari</l><l n="d">ikaṅ rumabhase tuvuhta makamuṣṭyaniṅ valkalī,</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) z mardaveka; (b) y mūḍha-: suta-.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.14.02" n="2"><l n="a">apan rasika deva hīna putus iṅ mahāduryaśa;</l>
.<l n="b">taṅanku sasikīki* tar makapaḍanya sikvākəna.</l>
1045<l n="c">kalīṅan ika, nora lena saka riṅ hulun dyah sivin,</l>
.<l n="d">anindyaguṇa śakti vīra səḍəṅ antukantātapa.</l>
.<!--<app> (b) F sasikīka.</app>-->
. </lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.14.03" n="3"><l n="a">prasiddha karəs* iṅ triloka, putus iṅ mahāśaktimān,</l>
1050<l n="b">dhaneśvara huvus pacuṇḍaṅ ika deṅku ṅūnīṅ raṇa,</l>
.<l n="c">vimāna pakavāhananya katavan təkapniṅ hulun,</l>
.<l n="d">təlas sahananiṅ balāsura lavan surākveh pəjah.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) v karəp.</app> -->
.</lg>
1055<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.14.04" n="4"><l n="a">lariṅkun umareṅ vukir subhaga nāma kailāsa ya,</l>
.<l n="b">haneka ya mavaktra vānara manaṅguhī don mami:</l>
.<l n="c">— ’bhaṭāra suranātha tovi juga tan vənaṅ yomara,</l>
.<l n="d">avās manəmu pāpa duhkha* yan atiprasaṅgerika.’ —</l>
.<!--<app> (d) z duhkhapati.</app>-->
1060 </lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.14.05" n="5"><l n="a">ya hetuni manahku gadgada vavaṅ kədə̄ gə̄ṅ galak,</l>
.<l n="b">rumoh vvitikanaṅ girīndra ya rugən təkapkun kabeh;</l>
.<l n="c">amogha ta bhaṭāra muṅgu* ri pucaknya mohut* sira,</l>
.<l n="d">lavan girisuteki kāvit i səḍəṅnirāpet laṅə̄.</l>
1065<!--<app> (c) v muṅguh; v motut.
. (d) səḍəṅnirāpet &lt; səḍəṅ irāpet</app>-->
. </lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.14.06" n="6"><l n="a">nimittanikanaṅ gunuṅ paḍa marək* təkapniṅ hulun,</l>
.<l n="b">muvah sahananiṅ vatək hyaṅ ika tan vənaṅ yomulat;</l>
1070<l n="c">pitovi kəta yan bhaṭāra hari deva nīcādhama,</l>
.<l n="d">ndi yan vənaṅa donya rakva mapage pamukv iṅ raṇa?</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) z marəs.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.14.07" n="7"><l n="a">subhikṣaṅ* amarālayālayanikaṅ mahākeśava,</l>
1075<l n="b">ya tenusinikaṅ matīṅ raṇa, pinetnikaṅ vvaṅ kabeh;</l>
.<l n="c">paran haləpikan tumaṇḍiṅa ta yeṅ suləṅkāpura* ?</l>
.<l n="d">kunaṅkunaṅ ike paḍanya səḍəṅ in vulan bhāsvara.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) v subhakṣa; BF asurālayā-.</app> -->
.</lg>
1080<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.14.08" n="8"><l n="a">məneki* ya dələ̄n təkapta kalavan ṅhulun riṅ purī,</l>
.<l n="b">pratiṅkahika tan kavastvan, atiramya tan popama.’</l>
.<l n="c">nahan liṅira rakva, cumbu humaras gəluṅ saṅ tapī;</l>
.<l n="d">siraṅ tapitapīki rakva magələṅ mucap* duhkhita:</l>
.<!--<app> (a) y məne pva; (d) z murud.</app>-->
1085 </lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.14.09" n="9"><l n="a">`aḍāsura* daśāsya, koṅ asu ləvəs mahādurjana!</l>
.<l n="b">ri demu humaras gəluṅku, kamu tan vruh iṅ lokika;</l>
.<l n="c">dudu* pravacananya duṣṭa maharəp masevyaṅ hulun,</l>
.<l n="d">sadenyan aṅucap nda tan hana vənaṅ rəṅə̄n saṅ viku;</l>
1090 <!-- <app>(a) v ahā-; (c) z dudu ṅ.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.14.10" n="10"><l n="a">pitovi satatālpabuddhi ri bhaṭāra saṅ hyaṅ hari,</l>
.<l n="b">mataṅnyan aku mārgamun pəjaha denireṅ praṅ hələm.’</l>
.<l n="c">nahan liṅira yar śumāpa, tumudiṅ ri saṅ rāvaṇa,</l>
1095<l n="d">nəhər sira mareṅ pahoman i daləm pradīptāṅ apuy.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.14.11" n="11"><l n="a">nda śīghra tuməḍun ri kuṇḍa, ri huvusnirāṅañjali;</l>
.<l n="b">daśāsya tumuluy manut, sira huvus matunv īṅ* apuy.</l>
.<l n="c">byatīta, ri pəjahnireki, daśavaktra mūr keraṅan,</l>
1100<l n="d">maṅə̄ kahənəṅan kapūhan i kadibya saṅ valkalī.</l>
.<!--<app> (b) F matunveṅ.</app>-->
. </lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="14" met="kaləṅəṅan" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.15">
1105<!--Kaləṅəṅan: ~ ~ - | ~ - ~ | ~ ~ - | ~ ~ ~ | ~ ~ ~ | - ~ - | ~ =-->
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.15.01" n="1"><l n="a">avivakṣiteki laku saṅ daśamukha mahas iṅ tapovana,</l><l n="b">təka riṅ gunuṅ makaṅaran ry uśinara* paramādi riṅ laṅə̄;</l><l n="c">nṛpa mārutādhipati saṅ sinivi sakala devaniṅ pura*,</l><l n="d">subhageki yajña vinaṅunnira saha ṛṣi devatakrama.</l>
.<!--<app> (b) AC Upinara, y Asinapa; (c) Dz puri.</app>-->
. </lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.15.02" n="2"><l n="a">kṣaṇa saṅ daśāsyan umasuk sira ri daləmikaṅ pamurṣitan,</l>
1110<l n="b">murəṅaṅ kabeh sahana saṅ maṅarivuvu ri yajña saṅ prabhu;</l>
.<l n="c">umilag kabeh, hana salah dadi, kadi dadiniṅ mamañcana,</l>
.<l n="d">masalin svarūpa paḍa rakva gumirisin i saṅ mahāsura.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.15.03" n="3"><l n="a">suranātha rakva matəmah mrak atiśaya surūpa* kottama,</l>
1115<l n="b">yama vāyaseka, baruṇāṅdadi sira varahaṅsa maṅlayaṅ,</l>
.<l n="c">kṛkalāsa* rakva təmahan dhanapati maṅurambat iṅ kayu,</l>
.<l n="d">karuhun sira vruh i ləkas daśamukha makabuddhi duryaśa.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) F mərak atisaya rūpa; (c) qz kṛtalaśa.</app> -->
.</lg>
1120<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.15.04" n="4"><l n="a">irikan* panaṅtaṅ ika saṅ daśamukha ri narendra mapraṅa;</l>
.<l n="b">prabhu māruteki sira tan vədi, mavuvus i saṅ daśānana:</l>
.<l n="c">`syapa koṅ pravīra maharəp maṅalaṅana ri yajñaniṅ hulun?</l>
.<l n="d">atiduṣṭa pāpa riṅ apan vənaṅa huripa deṅku riṅ raṇa!’</l>
. <!--<app>(a) y ikanaṅ.</app>-->
1125 </lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.15.05" n="5"><l n="a">`aku yā daśāsya,’ paṅucap daśamukha ri siraṅ nareśvara,</l>
.<l n="b">`aku śakti vāni juga, saṅ humalahakən* i saṅ dhaneśvara.’</l>
.<l n="c">na vuvus daśāsya; nṛpa māruta sira maṅunus śarottama,</l>
.<l n="d">maharəp sirāmanaha saṅ daśamukha pinakeṣṭiniṅ manah.</l>
1130 <!--<app>(b) y humilaṅakən.</app>-->
.</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="15" met="bhramaravilasita" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.16">
.<!--Bhramaravilasita: - - - | - ~ ~ | ~ ~ ~ | ~ =-->
1135<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.16.01" n="1"><l n="a">tatkāla śrī narapati maṅayat</l><l n="b">gāṇḍeva hrūnira səḍəṅ umurub,</l><l n="c">sambartekī gurunira mavuvus,</l><l n="d">kapvohut paṅlavana narapati:</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.16.02" n="2"><l n="a">`dūran rakve kita vənaṅa* lavan</l>
.<l n="b">tandaṅniṅ rāvaṇa ripu subala;</l>
.<l n="c">deva ndīkaṅ vənaṅ* uməjahana,</l>
1140<l n="d">āstām taṅ rākṣasaṅ asura kabeh.</l>
.<!--<app> (a) BFqz rakveki kavənaṅa; (c) y devādi tan vənaṅ.</app>-->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.16.03" n="3"><l n="a">saṅsiptan, hayva narapati vavaṅ</l>
.<l n="b">krodhekaṅ rāvaṇa papagakəna.</l>
1145<l n="c">tiṅkahniṅ dikṣitagati tuturən,</l>
.<l n="d">tan dadyaṅ vvaṅ kadi kita malaga.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.16.04" n="4"><l n="a">tovin taṅ yajña paśupatidhana,</l>
.<l n="b">heman yan tan tulusakənaṅ ulah;</l>
1150<l n="c">nirdon tekaṅ vidhividhana hana,</l>
.<l n="d">mvaṅ keñjəm saṅ suraṛṣi* viphala.’</l>
.<!--<app> (d) y ṛṣisura.</app>-->
. </lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.16.05" n="5"><l n="a">nāhan liṅ saṅ munivara mapihər.</l>
1155<l n="b">yatnekī* saṅ vinuvusan ahiḍəp;</l>
.<l n="c">cāpa hrū kādbhuta sinalahakən,</l>
.<l n="d">taila mvaṅ taṅ dadhi huti ginəgə̄.</l>
. <!--<app>(b) z yatneka.
. (b) yatnekī &lt; yatneki</app>-->
1160</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.16.06" n="6"><l n="a">garvāhyāṅ rākṣasa paḍa masurak,</l>
.<l n="b">ton tiṅkah saṅ prabhu kahiḍəp alah;</l>
.<l n="c">tuṣṭāmbək saṅ daśamukha mamənaṅ,</l>
.<l n="d">mvaṅ sakvehniṅ balagaṇa magiraṅ.</l>
1165</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="16" met="kaləṅəṅan" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.17">
.<!--Kaləṅəṅan: ~ ~ - | ~ - ~ | ~ ~ - | ~ ~ ~ | ~ ~ ~ | - ~ - | ~ ~-->
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.17.01" n="1"><l n="a">tan ivə̄n satiṅkahira saṅ prabhu taya* masikəp śarottama.</l><l n="b">daśavaktrarāja caritan, lakuniran umareṅ purāntara;</l><l n="c">riṅ ayodhyanāgara mateki dunuṅanira len* balādhika,</l><l n="d">anaraṇya* rakva panəlah saṅ ahulunirikātidigjaya.</l>
1170 <!--<app>(a) y sira; (c) y riṅ Ayodhya rājya kətikeki dunuṅən ika len; (d) v Hanaradya. </app>-->
. </lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.17.02" n="2"><l n="a">atigadgadeki* ruməṅə̄ sira ri ḍatəṅi saṅ mahāsura,</l>
.<l n="b">saha vīrayodhan umijil sira ri ləbuhikaṅ svanāgara;</l>
.<l n="c">kalavan vatək ratu huvus tumihaṅ* ika rumakṣa saṅ prabhu,</l>
1175<l n="d">bala koṭikoṭi gaja len turaga ratha səsə̄k təkeṅ pəkən.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) F -gadgadeka; (c) z matihaṅ.</app> -->
.</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="17" met="sragdharā" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.18">
1180<!--Sragdharā: - - - | - ~ - | - ~ ~ | ~ ~ ~ | ~ - - | ~ - - | ~ - =-->
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.18.01" n="1"><l n="a">ry aṅkat śrī bāṇaputrāmapagakən i siraṅ rāvaṇānindya riṅ praṅ,</l><l n="b">sākṣāt sūrya pradīpteṅ avaṅavaṅ anurun riṅ rathāratnasaṅgha,</l><l n="c">muntab taṅ bhūṣaṇābhrāsəmu kilat alivər* kātarānekavarṇa,</l><l n="d">gāṇḍevādbhūta himpər kuvukuvuṅ* i huvusniṅ javəh bhāsvareṅ rāt.</l>
. <!--<app>(c) y avilət; (d) ABv kuvu-kuvuṅ.</app>-->
. </lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.18.02" n="2"><l n="a">sakvehkvehniṅ* vatək pārthiva paḍa maṅiriṅ, lvir ghanābaṅ pradīpta;</l>
1185<l n="b">sampun prāpteṅ təgal gogṛha ri təpinikaṅ rājya* malvātiśobha,</l>
.<l n="c">kapvātiṅkah sireṅ sakṣaṇa, təlas* agəlar pakṣirājātidurga:</l>
.<l n="d">kamboja dvī* kivākral, daśapati ri təṅən, vallabheṅ aṅga dibya:</l>
. <!--<app>(a) y saṅ; (b) v rāja; (c) v huvus, y sira; (d) y hlar.</app>-->
. </lg>
1190<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.18.03" n="3"><l n="a">mūrdhekiṅ* velarāje patukika ya huvus bhīmakendrādirāja,</l>
.<l n="b">vuntat śry āyodhyanāthākukuh ika kalavan vīra sāmantarāja.</l>
.<l n="c">tan dva prāptekanaṅ* rāvaṇa saka ri ruhur mvaṅ vimānātivega,</l>
.<l n="d">ghoraṅ yakṣāsurak lvir gəlap aruharuhan, durbalaṅ śatru kagyat.</l>
. <!--<app>(a) A mūrdheka; F panutuk; (c) Bv prāpteṅ-.</app>-->
1195 </lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.18.04" n="4"><l n="a">yatnekaṅ vīra rotāṅlaga bala savatək bāṇaputrātiśūra</l>
.<l n="b">dukduk mvaṅ konta yekan pinapagakən ikeṅ* rākṣasāmukmuk iṅ praṅ*</l>
.<l n="c">kapvāvantah silih rok, gaja kuda masahut, sārathinyan tibāṅlah,</l>
.<l n="d">kārun taṅ syandana syuh, ratunika pinupuh denikaṅ yakṣa rodra.</l>
1200 <!--<app>(b) C ike; y rākṣasa riṅ raṇāṅga.</app>-->
. </lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.18.05" n="5"><l n="a">yekāṅsə̄ saṅ vatək bhūpati paḍa lumurug ghūrṇiteṅ sāmajāśva;</l>
.<l n="b">ndah śīghraṅ bajra cakrenayatakən irikaṅ śatru makveh tuməmpuh;</l>
.<l n="c">len tekaṅ byomamārgāṅlayaṅ ika ya tiba, lvir hudan vaṅkay adrəs;</l>
1205<l n="d">kāṅgək saṅ vīradhūmrākṣa təkap i pamanah vallabhendrādirāja.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.18.06" n="6"><l n="a">lāvan kambojarājāmapagakən i pamuk bajramuṣṭy ātighora;</l>
.<l n="b">sobhendrākampana, mvaṅ gaḍipati lumage saṅ virūpakṣayodha;</l>
.<l n="c">mārīcācaṅcaṅan* mvaṅ daśapati, karuhun velarājādinātha,</l>
1210<l n="d">ndā tan dvāṅduk silih duk sira mamapagakən saṅ prahastātidhīra.</l>
. <!-- <app>(c) A -ācācaṅan.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.18.07" n="7"><l n="a">maṅkin taṅ vīra maṅsə̄, surakika gumuruh mvaṅ mṛdaṅgātighūrṇa,</l>
.<l n="b">hetunyaṅ lvaṅ* baṅun parvata śava, rudhirādrəs baṅun sāgarālva.</l>
1215<l n="c">ṅkān tandaṅ saṅ prakopāsurabala bala* saṅ rāvaṇa krūrarūpa,</l>
.<l n="d">muṇḍoṇḍeṅ* tomarāhyāṅuliṅakən i gajahnyan səḍəṅ matta rodra.</l>
.<!--<app> (b) A hetunyālvaṅ; (c) F subala sabala; (d) Aqv muḍonḍe.</app>-->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.18.08" n="8"><l n="a">mātus taṅ vīra sampun kapəñət inidəkan len sinimbatnya bhagna;</l>
1220<l n="b">akveh saṅ pārthivāṅlah pəjah inutitakən denya riṅ nāsikāgra.</l>
.<l n="c">ṅkā tekaṅ* bhīmakendrālara vahu kadəmak riṅ rathāṅdoh lumumpat,</l>
.<l n="d">śīghrāṅsə̄ saṅ narendrāmanah i gulunikaṅ rākṣaseṅ astra divya.</l>
. <!--<app>(c) y honeyekī.</app>-->
.</lg>
1225<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.18.09" n="9"><l n="a">mumbul taṅ rah, məsat mastakanika, matəmah sevu mūrdhātirodra,</l>
.<l n="b">krūrāñaṇḍak musuh, durbala sahananikaṅ rāja sāmantanātha.</l>
.<l n="c">āstām taṅ bhīmakendrādbhuta mati sinahut denikaṅ yakṣamūrdha,</l>
.<l n="d">dudv aṅ maty ātunah deni lavayanika yāṅduk sakeṅ sāmajendra.</l>
.</lg>
1230</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="18" met="śārdūlavikrīḍita" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.19">
.<!--Śārdūlavikrīḍita: - - - | ~ ~ - | ~ - ~ | ~ ~ - | - - ~ | - - ~ | =-->
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.19.01" n="1"><l n="a">saṅ śrī bhūpati bāṇaputra lumihat syuhniṅ vatək pārthiva,</l><l n="b">dhvastaṅ byūha khagendra tan hana malaṅ kānan kirinyan* hilaṅ,</l><l n="c">indrāstrāyudha, bāṇa tuṅgal* atəmah rvaṅ koṭilakṣeṅ raṇa,</l><l n="d">yekan śīghra pamuk* narendran umasə̄ varṣopamanyan katon.</l>
. <!-- <app>(b) B kivanya; (c) y rakva; (d) y mamuk.</app> -->
1235</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.19.02" n="2"><l n="a">cəb cəb cəb, maṅəne mahāsuraśirah, maṅkin matambəh ta ya,</l>
.<l n="b">ghorekan paṅəmah varāstran umalābaṅ vlaṅ liḍahnyādava.</l>
.<l n="c">sar sə̄k riṅ gagaṇāsinaṅ makalaṅan lvir mṛtyu sākṣāt murub,</l>
.<l n="d">śabdanyātri baṅun gəlap mavurahan* molih gunuṅ pāpa ya.*</l>
1240 <!--<app>(d) F mahurahan; y pātaka.</app>-->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.19.03" n="3"><l n="a">krodhāmbək prabhu bāṇaputra ri larutniṅ bāṇa tan pamyati,</l>
.<l n="b">rəp, śīghraṅ giripāvakojvala mijil saṅke* dələsniṅ laras;</l>
.<l n="c">tan dvāṅdagdha rikaṅ mahāsuraśirah sakvehnya məlṭok murub,</l>
1245<l n="d">len tekaṅ lavayan pəjah sahalavan hastīndra sampun gəsəṅ.</l>
. <!-- <app>(b) Aq saṅkeṅ.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.19.04" n="4"><l n="a">hetunyaṅ bala rāvaṇāvrəg, alayū sakveh vatək rākṣasa,</l>
.<l n="b">len tekaṅ hana riṅ laṅit ya kaladan* mūrchānibeṅ bhūtala;</l>
1250<l n="c">ṅhiṅ saṅ rāvaṇa vīra śakti juga tan kevran təkapniṅ hapuy,</l>
.<l n="d">mvaṅ taṅ puṣpaka vāhaneka ya luput deniṅ śarāgny ojvala</l>
.<!--<app> (b) F kalaran.</app>-->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.19.05" n="5"><l n="a">lāvan toya mijil sake* gadaniraṅ yakṣādhipāmah gunuṅ,</l>
1255<l n="b">lvir guntur sumarambah iṅ pabharatan, ghūrṇāṅalun bhīṣaṇa;</l>
.<l n="c">bar pət taṅ giripāvakekan umasə̄ saṅ rāvaṇāhyābutəṅ,</l>
.<l n="d">mvaṅ tekaṅ bala rākṣasāṅhrik asurak, ḍyam taṅ bhuvah svah muṅə̄ṅ.</l>
.<!--<app> (a) Ay sakeṅ.</app>-->
. </lg>
1260<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.19.06" n="6"><l n="a">dhīrāmbək prabhu bāṇaputra maṅadəg muṅgv iṅ salə̄niṅ ratha;</l>
.<l n="b">sakvehkveh para pārthivāṅləpasakən hrū śakti tan popama;</l>
.<l n="c">syuh tekaṅ bala rāvaṇālara dahut kabvaṅ ləvih sāyuta,</l>
.<l n="d">durkāleka pəjah trivighna* sumanāgra mvaṅ subhaṅgānala.</l>
.<!--<app> (d) A Trivaghna.</app>-->
1265 </lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.19.07" n="7"><l n="a">hetu* śrī daśavaktra yatna tuməḍun saṅkeṅ* vimānomasə̄,</l>
.<l n="b">sambut pvaṅ gada cāpalāmrih amupuh sakveh vatək bhūpati;</l>
.<l n="c">ṅkāneṅ rəṅganikaṅ rathāṅga kaguliṅ mvaṅ rəṅganiṅ sāmaja,</l>
.<l n="d">āstām taṅ* bala koṭi lakṣa matumaṅ sampun pəjah denira.</l>
1270<!--<app> (a) y yeka; AC saṅke; (d) y mvaṅ tekaṅ. </app>-->
. </lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.19.08" n="8"><l n="a">prodbhūtaṅ daśavaktra maṅkin aṅamuk lvir siṅha rodreṅ vana,</l>
.<l n="b">rug bhraṣṭaṅ* dinəmaknireṅ gada, baṅun sattvādhamaṅ pārthiva.</l>
.<l n="c">ṅkān maṅsə̄ prabhu bāṇaputra maṅayat rudrāstra bāṇottama,</l>
1275<l n="d">muntab sə̄ṅnya lumə̄ṅ mareṅ laṅit, umuṅ glānaṅ vatək devatā.</l>
.<!--<app> (b) F bhraṣṭa n.</app>-->
. </lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.19.09" n="9"><l n="a">gək gər*, kāṅgək ikaṅ daśāsya kaparah, tuṅgəṅ jajanyātəguh;</l>
.<l n="b">maṅkin krodha mahākrak ahyan umasə̄ muṅsī siraṅ bhūpati;</l>
1280<l n="c">krūrāṅduk riṅ amoghaśakti mamaləs, trus pyah śry ayodhyādhipa,</l>
.<l n="d">rəp, śīghran ri pəjah narendra rumavuh taṅ puṣpa saṅkeṅ tavaṅ.</l>
.<!--<app> (a) q gəntər.</app>-->
. </lg>
.</div>
1285<div type="canto" rend="met" n="19" met="praharṣiṇī" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.20">
.<!--Praharṣiṇi: - - - | ~ ~ ~ | ~ - ~ | - ~ - | =-->
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.20.01" n="1">
.<l n="a">byātītan pəjahira saṅ narendra riṅ praṅ,</l>
.<l n="b">dhvastekaṅ bala para nātha* tan hanāvyat;</l>
1290<l n="c">rəp, śīghrāṅlilir ika saṅ narendra jīvan,</l>
.<l n="d">krodhānāpatha tumudiṅ ri saṅ daśāsya:</l>
. <!-- <app>(b) y paravasa.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.20.02" n="2"><l n="a">`ai koṅ* kuprabhu daśavaktra tucchabuddhi,</l>
1295<l n="b">gə̄ṅ mūrkhāməjahi gatiṅku sādhu riṅ rāt!</l>
.<l n="c">riṅ dlāhāku maləs amatya həntyakən nyu,*</l>
.<l n="d">de saṅ rāghava, sira tusku, keśavāṅśa.’</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) ACqz ko; (c) Aq həntya kanyu.</app> -->
.</lg>
1300<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.20.03" n="3"><l n="a">nāhan liṅnira, tumuluy muvah luməṇḍə̄*.</l>
.<l n="b">saṅsiptan, daśamukha len balātirodra</l>
.<l n="c">sampun rakva sira mare daləm kaḍatvan,</l>
.<l n="d">strīratnārja kanaka taṅ pinet rinampas.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) F lumənḍā.</app> -->
1305</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="20" met="jagadnātha" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.21">
.<!--Jagatnātha: ~ - ~ | ~ ~ - | ~ - ~ | ~ ~ - | ~ ~ ~ | ~ ~ ~ | - ~ - | ~ ~-->
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.21.01" n="1"><l n="a">ta ṅeh yan ucapən sapolahikanaṅ daśamukha kalavan balāsura,</l><l n="b">sukhāmbək atighora, nora* juga tan hilaṅa sahananiṅ purāntara.</l><l n="c">saṅ arjuna sahasrabāhu caritan, prabhu paramaviśeṣa digjaya,</l><l n="d">sireka sinivīṅ* mahispati, kaḍatvanira kadi maheśvarālaya.</l>
1310 <!-- <app>(b) C tapva; (d) BFz sinivī.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.21.02" n="2"><l n="a">anindya subhageṅ triloka, sakaleśvara guṇanira riṅ praṅ adbhuta;</l>
.<l n="b">vidagdha vəkas iṅ maharddhika, sapolahira tinulad iṅ kavīśvara;</l>
.<l n="c">narendra kṛtavīrya rakva makaputra ri sira, ratu* hehayottama,</l>
1315<l n="d">ya hetunikanaṅ jagat praṇata bhakti, karuhun ika saṅ vatək ratu.</l>
.<!--<app> (c) y tuhu.</app>-->
. </lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.21.03" n="3"><l n="a">pitovi ri hajə̄ṅ narendradayitāmuvuhi* haləpireṅ svanāgara;</l>
.<l n="b">smarānəmu ratih, madhubrata lavan səkar, upamaniran tiniṅhalan;</l>
1320<l n="c">savaṅ ləṅəṅiṅ abdhi rakva kalavan vukir inivu ri ramyaniṅ kapat;</l>
.<l n="d">həlaṅ saha lavan rərəb, kadi gaḍuṅ lumuṅ amilət aśokapādapa.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) y narendraduhitā-.</app> -->
.</lg>
.</div>
1325<div type="canto" rend="met" n="21" met="jagaddhita" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.22">
.<!--Jagaddhita: - - - | ~ ~ - | ~ - ~ | ~ ~ - | ~ ~ ~ | ~ ~ ~ | - ~ - | ~ =-->
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.22.01" n="1"><l n="a">devī citravatī praśāsta paṅaran saṅ ahayu pinujīṅ* sanāgara,</l><l n="b">saṅ sākṣāt hyaṅi paṅjrahiṅ kusuma riṅ taman anuruni saṅ nareśvara;</l><l n="c">strī sāmantasuteṅ purāntara təkeṅ surabhavana huvus vinarṇana,</l><l n="d">norāmarpatane hajə̄ṅniran anopama tuhutuhu rājaputrikā.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) ABq pinujī.</app> -->
.</lg>
1330<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.22.02" n="2"><l n="a">siṅgih yan ratuniṅ kalaṅvan amiśeṣani kaləṅəṅaniṅ pasir vukir,</l>
.<l n="b">ekācatra sireṅ raras kusuma, tan hana siriṅanireṅ labuh kapat.</l>
.<l n="c">eñjiṅ māsanireki rakvan umareṅ* taman i huvusirāhyas aṅḍiri,</l>
.<l n="d">mvaṅ sakvehnikanaṅ vvaṅ adyah aṅiriṅ, parəṅ inatag i* gəntəriṅ patər.</l>
.<!--<app> (c) Aqv umare.</app>-->
1335 </lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.22.03" n="3"><l n="a">sakvehniṅ kalaṅə̄n paḍārəs* i hajə̄ṅniran aṅituṅi paṅjrahiṅ səkar:</l>
.<l n="b">luṅniṅ jaṅga lumuṅ baṅun kaləṅəṅan maṅalaya ri təṅahnirāṅrasi,</l>
.<l n="c">nyū dantāsəmu kevran*, eriṅ i gəmuh ri susunira sumə̄k təke jaja,</l>
.<l n="d">tan paṅliṅ manahiṅ puḍak paḍa tumuṅkul akətər i vətisnirālaris.</l>
1340 <!-- <app>(a) C -āṅrəs; (c) y kepvan.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.22.04" n="4"><l n="a">hah, dūran ṅvaṅ anəmva ratnavanitān kadi sira paramādi riṅ hayu,</l>
.<l n="b"> `vitniṅ rāga lavan lulut siran amiṇḍa*,’ kahiḍəpani denikaṅ mulat.*</l>
.<l n="c">pantəs yan ri surup hyaṅ arka, pajaṅiṅ śaśi, maṅadəg i madhyaniṅ natar.</l>
1345<l n="d">ləṅləṅ yan mihat iṅ vulan, kadi təkā havananira mareṅ smarālaya.</l>
.<!--<app> (b) y mamiṇḍa; A miyat.</app>-->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.22.05" n="5"><l n="a">sakvehniṅ marək arja məṇḍək adədə̄* midər asəmu kalaṅvan iṅ tulis,</l>
.<l n="b">guṇḍik mvaṅ kaka len uveña pakamaṅgalaṅ amalihi kūṅnire haji,</l>
1350<l n="c">strīstrīratna sujanma rāsika, baṅun hyaṅi kaləṅəṅan iṅ surālaya,</l>
.<l n="d">lvir tārāṅgaṇa riṅ vulan parək i rūmnyan umarək i siraṅ nareśvarī.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) A aḍəḍə̄ṅ, C adədə̄ṅ, F adədəṅ.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.22.06" n="6"><l n="a">yekāṅdāni lulut narendra ri saṅ adyah arəja kadi tambvaṅiṅ vulan;</l>
1355<l n="b">marmāmakpak asuṅ səpah, lvir aṅure* sphaṭika vulatire nareśvarī;</l>
.<l n="c">cumbv aṅhol təṅah aṅharas pipi, taman panaha ri liṅaniṅ vvaṅ aṅhiḍəp;</l>
.<l n="d">sotniṅ vāhu silih sih iṅ gati, turuṅ bəsur, asamaya muṅgaheṅ jinəm.</l>
. <!-- <app>(b) F aṅare.</app> -->
.</lg>
1360</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="22" met="sragdharā" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.23">
.<!--Sragdharā: - - - | - ~ - | - ~ ~ | ~ ~ ~ | ~ - - | ~ - - | ~ - =-->
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.23.01" n="1"><l n="a">byātītan saṅ haneṅ nāgara səḍəṅ aṅivə̄ rāga lāvan lulut kūṅ.</l><l n="b">ndā śīghraṅ kāla sampun riṅ asuji təkaniṅ kārttikāmah kalaṅvan;</l><l n="c">gəntər mandre du kilyan kadi maṅatagakən paṅjrahiṅ sarvapuṣpa,</l><l n="d">mrik mār sə̄bniṅ ləmah vāhu karirisan aveh harṣaniṅ vvaṅ malintaṅ.</l>
.</lg>
1365<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.23.02" n="2"><l n="a">nkāṅkat śrī bhūmināthāṅḍusun ikan* umareṅ narmadātīrtha śuddha,</l>
.<l n="b">mvaṅ saṅ lvir hyaṅhyaṅiṅ puṣpa sira milu, madan hyas ləyəp riṅ kahayvan*;</l>
.<l n="c">sakvehkveh saṅ vatək bhūpati paḍa* maṅiriṅ mvaṅ vatək vīrasaṅgha,</l>
.<l n="d">saṅkəp riṅ sañjatāvāhanabala, gumərəh ghūrṇitaṅ sāmajāśva.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) ABF -āḍusun; (b) y kalaṅən; (c) y sira.</app> -->
1370</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.23.03" n="3"><l n="a">tiṅkah saṅ vīramantrī balapati mapatih saṅ suvandheka hetu,</l>
.<l n="b">sandehāmbəknirānāgata ri galakiraṅ* rāvaṇan duṣṭa* riṅ rāt,</l>
.<l n="c">varṇan saṅ śrī narendrādhipa siran umijil saṅka riṅ rājya śobha,</l>
.<l n="d">tan sah saṅ śrī sudevīnamərira hana riṅ syandanā ratna muñcar.</l>
1375 <!-- <app>(b) BCqz galakaniṅ; y tuṣṭa.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.23.04" n="4"><l n="a">ndan sakvehniṅ vvaṅ iṅ jro* pura paḍa tumuluy muṅgah iṅ vāhanārja,</l>
.<l n="b">guṇḍik mvaṅ taṅ kakeñāməṅaməṅan arivəg riṅ gajānekavarṇa.</l>
.<l n="c">līlātūt* mārga lampah narapati, ri harəp taṅ rathākveh madədə̄*;</l>
1380<l n="d">ramyākveh taṅ manonton, salakibi kavəṅan ton sirātyadbhuteṅ rāt.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) G i jro; (c) A līlānut; AC madədə̄ṅ.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.23.05" n="5"><l n="a">sampun prāpteṅ təgal mvaṅ savah i təpinikaṅ rājyakaṇṭātiramya,</l>
.<l n="b">kīrṇekaṅ vvaṅ makāryāṅgaru hana maṅurit mvaṅ tikaṅ vahv atandur;</l>
1385<l n="c">rary aṅhvan* riṅ galəṅ sə̄h sapinika malayū ləmbu goñjoṅnya meṅas,</l>
.<l n="d">kagyat deniṅ kudoṣṭrāṅhrik adulur i harəp sāmajanyātirodra.</l>
. <!-- <app>(c) C āṅvan.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.23.06" n="6"><l n="a">deśākveh taṅ kalakvan, hana vahu kaparah raṅkaṅ arjātiśobha;</l>
1390<l n="b">nyagrodhāgə̄ṅ rumambay* ri harəpika, manuknyārəbut vvāhan abyut;</l>
.<l n="c">syuṅnyāganty* āṅucap, prəñjak ika mavurahan, mə̄r silih sambər iṅ paṅ;</l>
.<l n="d">cukcaknyālvaṅ ravuh* riṅ kṣiti kəna tinulup denikaṅ vvaṅ mararyan.</l>
. <!-- <app>(b) Ay ruməmbay; (c) G syūnyā-; (d) y tiba.</app> -->
.</lg>
1395<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.23.07" n="7"><l n="a">luṅhādoh śīghra lampahnira matut* i hujuṅniṅ vukir səṅkasəṅkan;</l>
.<l n="b">vaṅkal seṅvan kukap kayvanika ri təpiniṅ lvah təṅahniṅ vanāgə̄ṅ</l>
.<l n="c">vvat gantuṅ mārga, tūbanya satata gumuruh riṅ juraṅ, kuṅkaṅ iṅ groṅ;</l>
.<l n="d">air tambaṅnyākəcap lvir kəcapiṅ inuvahan svāmi deniṅ bapenduṅ*.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) C manut; (d) A yayenduṅ.</app> -->
1400</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.23.08" n="8"><l n="a">burvanyāvrəg, məsat və̄knika makabarasat denikaṅ vvaṅ təkākveh;</l>
.<l n="b">mraknyāganty āñavuvvaṅ*, satavananikanāṅjrit, həlarnyābra kumram;</l>
.<l n="c">səṅgahnyāmaṅsul iṅ mārga, vəkasan anusup muṅsir iṅ hadri* durga;</l>
.<l n="d">vraynyāṅantīṅ paṅ antuk taruphala kahiḍəp mūlya mās ratnatulya.</l>
1405 <!-- <app>(b) Fy abavuvaṅ, C aṅavuvaṅ; (c) F ṅadri, q rīṅ adri.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.23.09" n="9"><l n="a">ramyāṅjrah* taṅ səkar mār baṅun amapag i rūmniṅ marāṅdon kalaṅvan:</l>
.<l n="b">jaṅgāluṅ, luṅnya himpər luṅayan iṅ aṅave maṇḍəgeṅ mārgatīra;</l>
.<l n="c">andulnyādan məkar lvir gisigisin aṅasə̄* harṣa cumbv āṅalap sor;</l>
1410<l n="d">polahniṅ tuñjuṅ arjeṅ ranu kadi vulatiṅ kāṇḍəhan rāga tībra.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) ABE -ājrah; (c) F sigisigisinaṅasə̄.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.23.10" n="10"><l n="a">meghanyāñavli mātreṅ tavaṅika sahuləsniṅ ləṅəṅ riṅ kisapvan;</l>
.<l n="b">mār aṅras taṅ vuluh danta kavudan i ləsəhniṅ calumpriṅnikāṅsah;</l>
1415<l n="c">sinvam konə̄ṅunəṅ* lvir ləmələməs i ləməsniṅ təṅah kesisan ken;</l>
.<l n="d">hyaṅ candrāvnəs kasə̄ṅan dina, kadi mukhaniṅ vvaṅ pinūrveṅ paturvan.</l>
.<!--<app> (c) F konaṅ-ṅunaṅ.</app>-->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.23.11" n="11"><l n="a">ndan honyāṅ* āśrame tuṅhaniṅ acala, ləyəp, kāmukan saṅhub avrā;</l>
1420<l n="b">tistis, tapvan hanā vuryaniṅ umara, dukutnyādavā sə̄h marəmbun*;</l>
.<l n="c">pintən sampun hilaṅ saṅ munivara, karaṇanyāsamun tan hana vvaṅ;</l>
.<l n="d">raṅkaṅnyākveh, tuhun simbarən i vuvuṅ, ikaṅ dvāra sampun rinaṅkah;</l>
.<!--<app> (a) AF tonyāṅ; (b) A marəmbut.</app>-->
.</lg>
1425<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.23.12" n="12"><l n="a">nyāsanyārje yavāṅuṅgul i* juraṅ adaləm tīraniṅ mārga līla;</l>
.<l n="b">nyū dantāvvah kahimbaṅ sasusuniṅ alaṅə̄ ləṅləṅ amrih kalaṅvan.</l>
.<l n="c">ṅkā taṅ strīratna kālih kavulanika katon lvir tan iṅ rāt vinasvas,</l>
.<l n="d">pintən kāsih təkap saṅ kavi sira tumutur deni gə̄ṅniṅ laronəṅ.</l>
.<!--<app> (a) F -āṅunduli, y aṅuṅkuli.</app>-->
1430</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="23" met="basantatilakā" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.24">
.<!--Vasantatilaka: - - ~ | - ~ ~ | ~ - ~ | ~ - ~ | - =-->
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.24.01" n="1"><l n="a">ṅkāne ruhurnika tapovana saṅ maharṣi</l><l n="b">mvaṅ taṅ paṅubvanan, i pārśvanikaṅ gagākveh;</l><l n="c">ramyaṅ mahantən i samīpanike ḍukuhnya,</l><l n="d">vvay mumbul* ardha ri harəpnya mahātiśuddha.</l>
1435 <!-- <app>(d) y mumbul vvay.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.24.02" n="2"><l n="a">kañcit baṅun hana marā sira lālanāmbək,</l>
.<l n="b">mvaṅ strī viśeṣa parameṅ hayu tan pahīṅan;</l>
.<l n="c">prāpterikā katiga cāraka himyahimyan,</l>
1440<l n="d">byaktan papaṅgihira tan vidhiniṅ bapenduṅ.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.24.03" n="3"><l n="a">sə̄k puṣpa jaṅga pakapuṣpanirātituṣṭa,</l>
.<l n="b">lagy ākisapvan i kakuṅnira saṅ rarāṅras*,</l>
.<l n="c">līlāṅuṅaṅ sahananiṅ vanadeśa riṅ doh</l>
1445<l n="d">mvaṅ habdhideśa, karəṅə̄ ryakikātighūrṇa.</l>
. <!-- <app>(b) E -āṅrəs.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.24.04" n="4"><l n="a">nā hetu saṅ tapitapīriya* sambhramāṅliṅ</l>
.<l n="b">ṅkāne rarasnika kalih paḍa dibyarūpa;</l>
1450<l n="c">duryan sale mara* pasuṅnira marma matvaṅ*,</l>
.<l n="d">mvaṅ taṅ cacah saha sərəh pasəgəhnirārja.</l>
.<!--<app> (a) y tapa-tapīkiya; (c) y tiki; ABqv patvaṅ.</app>-->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.24.05" n="5"><l n="a">ndan riṅ samāntara ḍatəṅ kaka saṅ rarāmet,</l>
1455<l n="b">liśyākasaṅ vuluṅ*, anis tumutur saṅ antən.</l>
.<l n="c">vruh saṅ harīki ri ḍatəṅnira, bhakty anəmbah,</l>
.<l n="d">mvaṅ saṅ kakūṅ inapuraṅ* kaka divya tuṣṭa.</l>
. <!-- <app>(b) F liṅśyā-, y lesya-; (d) Fy hinapura, ABDv ṅinapura.</app> -->
.</lg>
1460<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.24.06" n="6"><l n="a">ndah maṅkaneki kalaṅə̄nya vinarṇanāna</l>
.<l n="b">de saṅ kalaṅvan i ləyəpnikanaṅ vanādri.</l>
.<l n="c">lampah narendra vuvusən kalavan sudevī,</l>
.<l n="d">mvaṅ vīrasaṅgha maṅiriṅ saha pārthivākveh.</l>
.</lg>
1465</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="24" met="kaləṅəṅan" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.25">
.<!--Kaləṅəṅan: ~ ~ - | ~ - ~ | ~ ~ - | ~ ~ ~ | ~ ~ ~ | - ~ - | ~ ~-->
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.25.01" n="1"><l n="a">tad anantareki ri ləpasnira matut i pəluknikaṅ gunuṅ,</l><l n="b">tumurun mareṅ* valahar adrəs adaləm atiśuddha nirmala;</l><l n="c">kuməḍapkəḍap lajarikālivər* asəmu maṇīndra bhāsvara,</l><l n="d">taya vanya rakva malaperiya*, pilih ika vanva* kahyaṅan.</l>
. <!-- <app>(b) C mare; (c) y lajər; (d) A malameriya; y varṇa.</app> -->
1470</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.25.02" n="2"><l n="a">vəki sə̄k maraṅ ratha, paḍāṅdyusi kudanikanaṅ susārathi;</l>
.<l n="b">paḍa garjiteki manahiṅ vvaṅ arəja təkap iṅ aiśān katon,</l>
.<l n="c">karuhun narendradayitā sira sukha kalavan nareśvara*,</l>
.<l n="d">sahajānuduhnuduhi rakva sira kadi tumiṅhalīṅ tulis.</l>
1475 <!--<app>(c) y naresvarī.
. (b) təkap iṅ aiśān unmetr.</app>-->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.25.03" n="3"><l n="a">vəkasan lumampah, adulur larini rathaniran təkeṅ ḍarat;</l>
.<l n="b">təgal amba bhīṣaṇa sayojana katəmu təkap nareśvara,</l>
1480<l n="c">mahijau dukutnyan atapakgajah* alalaṅ i tuṅhaniṅ gəgər,</l>
.<l n="d">rvi sisirvi* tañjaṅ arukət rvinika gula gumantuṅ iṅ ləbak.</l>
. <!-- <app>(c) y matapak; (d) C misī, y sisir.</app> -->
.</lg>
.</div>
1485<div type="canto" rend="met" n="25" met="bhramaravilasita" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.26">
.<!--Bhramaravilasita: - - - | - ~ ~ | ~ ~ ~ | ~ =-->
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.26.01" n="1"><l n="a">nyagrodhāgə̄ṅ kayu ri təṅahika,</l><l n="b">bodhi mvaṅ hambulu* kəpuh ajajar;</l><l n="c">raṅrə̄ govoknika kadi vivara,</l><l n="d">gəṅ bləṅ, śabdanya ya katub iṅ aṅin.</l>
. <!-- <app>(b) Cqy ṅambulu.</app> -->
.</lg>
1490<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.26.02" n="2"><l n="a">parnah lor vetan ika vahu katon</l>
.<l n="b">deśālit ramya katəmu subhaga;</l>
.<l n="c">tal nyū makveh, gədaṅika* mahijau,</l>
.<l n="d">`gopālasthāna,’ paṅucap iriya.</l>
. <!--<app>(c) y səḍəṅ.</app>-->
1495</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.26.03" n="3"><l n="a">paṅliṅgan, gonika* sumək i təgal,</l>
.<l n="b">mvaṅ saṅ vipreśvara təka* malivər,</l>
.<l n="c">kapvāmintaṅ dadhi siran umulih,</l>
.<l n="d">kīrṇekā saṅ təka parəṅ atuku.</l>
1500 <!-- <app>(a) Bqz goh-; (b) A sira.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.26.04" n="4"><l n="a">tan vaktan taṅ sakamatan iṅ ayun;</l>
.<l n="b">thāny akveh mvaṅ kuvu kahalivatan,</l>
.<l n="c">katyāgan maṇḍala kuṭi suməlap,</l>
1505<l n="d">jaṅgan tasyan kidul ikan alaṅə̄.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.26.05" n="5"><l n="a">dharmānindyādbhuta vahu katəmu,</l>
.<l n="b">koṅaṅ saṅke* gəgərika kahavan,</l>
.<l n="c">bapra mvaṅ gopuranika maruhur,</l>
1510<l n="d">len taṅ nyāse harəp aṅalunalun.</l>
. <!-- <app>(b) BCqy saṅkeṅ.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.26.06" n="6"><l n="a">ṅkāraryan śrī narapati sakarəṅ;</l>
.<l n="b">sakvehniṅ syandana parəṅ adədə̄*,</l>
1515<l n="c">aśva mvaṅ sāmaja sama marivəg</l>
.<l n="d">ṅkāne hə̄bniṅ kayu manəki pəkən.</l>
. <!--<app>(b) C adədə̄ṅ.</app>-->
.</lg>
.</div>
1520<div type="canto" rend="met" n="26" met="suvadanā" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.27">
.<!--Suvadanā: - - - | - ~ - | - ~ ~ | ~ ~ ~ | ~ - - | - ~ ~ | ~ =-->
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.27.01" n="1"><l n="a">ambək śrī nātha harṣāsəmu jəṅər i təkapnyānraṅ purasabhā,</l><l n="b">mvaṅ saṅ śrī rājapatnī sira vahu tumurun saṅkeṅ ratha maṇik;</l><l n="c">ndan sakvehkvehnikaṅ* vvaṅ ri daləmika marək sampun masaniga,</l><l n="d">tan sah ramyāṅiriṅ rakva lakunira mareṅ dharmānuli ləṅəṅ,</l>
. <!-- <app>(c) y sakveh nikanaṅ.</app> -->
.</lg>
1525<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.27.02" n="2"><l n="a">tan varṇan, śīghra sampun sira kahalivat iṅ dvārāparimita;</l>
.<l n="b">caṇḍy āgə̄ṅ rvātiśobhe daləm ikaṅ inukir śelārja vinaṅun;</l>
.<l n="c">śobhājimbar* natarnyāsana surabhi pənuh mvaṅ nāgakusuma;</l>
.<l n="d">yekāṅde harṣaniṅ vvaṅ paḍa vijah aṅalap kambaṅ sakasənəṅ.</l>
.<!--<app> (c) Aq -āgimbar.</app>-->
1530</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.27.03" n="3"><l n="a">riṅ prāsādordha parnah narapati kalavan nāthendraghariṇī,</l>
.<l n="b">tiṅkahniṅ lod lurahniṅ vukir ika kamatan, ndā tan kahuniṅā;</l>
.<l n="c">ṅhiṅ saṅ hyaṅṅ arca pinrih siran inanumatā dibyāsamasama,</l>
.<l n="d">hetu śrī bhūmināthātaña sira ri siraṅ vipreśvara tumut:</l>
1535</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.27.04" n="4"><l n="a">`bhoh bhoh*, saṅ vipra,’ liṅ saṅ prabhu, ’mapa karikiṅ dharmāparimita?*’</l>
.<l n="b">`om om om, bauddhadharmākuśala,’ sahurire saṅ śrī narapati.</l>
.<l n="c">`saṅ hyaṅ vairocanātyanta jinapati vinimbārcāgəṅ i təṅah,</l>
.<l n="d">līlābodhyagrimudrānupama* sira katon sākṣāt śivasadā*.</l>
1540 <!--<app>(a) AB bho bho; C -karakiṅ dharma n parimita; (d) ADv -bodhyaśrimudrā-.</app>-->
.</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="27" met="basantatilakā" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.28">
.<!--Vasantatilaka: - - ~ | - ~ ~ | ~ - ~ | ~ - ~ | - =-->
1545<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.28.01" n="1"><l n="a">akṣobhya pūrva sira teki bhaṭāra rudra,</l><l n="b">hyaṅ ratnasambhava ri dakṣiṇa dhātṛdeva,</l><l n="c">saṅ śry āmitābha sira pāścima deva māha,*</l><l n="d">śry āmoghasiddhi sira lor harimūrtideva*.</l>
. <!-- <app>(c) F mahādeva; (d) y Haridevatulya.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.28.02" n="2"><l n="a">ndah kantənanya, haji, tan hana bheda* saṅ hyaṅ:</l>
.<l n="b">hyaṅ buddha rakva kalavan śiva rājadeva,</l>
1550<l n="c">kālih sameka* sira saṅ pinakeṣṭi dharma,</l>
.<l n="d">riṅ dharma sīma tuvi yan ləpas advitīya.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) y deva; (c) y sireki.</app> -->
.</lg>
.</div>
1555<div type="canto" rend="met" n="28" met="vaṅśastha" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.29">
.<!--Vaṅsastha: = - ~ | - - ~ | ~ - ~ | - ~ =-->
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.29.01" n="1">
.<l n="a">nihan tikaṅ* dharma ləpas ya tojarən:</l>
.<l n="b">bhūdāna* parnahnya təkapni saṅ prabhu,</l>
1560<l n="c">yinogyakən riṅ ṛṣi śaiva saugata,</l>
.<l n="d">naivedya donyan pakajīvitaṅ vaneh.</l>
.<!--<app> (a) A tikā; (b) F bhūṭāna. </app>-->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.29.02" n="2"><l n="a">kunaṅ tikaṅ dharma hajīki yan sinuk,*</l>
1565<l n="b">prāpteṅ mahāvaṅśa satūsni saṅ prabhu;</l>
.<l n="c">sameka dharmānupameṅ ləpas sinuk,*</l>
.<l n="d">dibyottamaṅ dharma, viśeṣa riṅ sarāt.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) A tinūt; (c) F vinūk.</app> -->
.</lg>
1570<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.29.03" n="3"><l n="a">apan jugā rehnira saṅ prabhūttama,</l>
.<l n="b">ramyāmaṅan mvaṅ suta vandhu len ghara;*</l>
.<l n="c">muvah tikaṅ vīrabalan vineh səkul,</l>
.<l n="d">donyan surakṣeki ya hetuniṅ maveh*.</l>
. <!-- <app>(b) AqF ḍara; (d) y masuṅ.</app> -->
1575</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="29" met="śārdūlavikrīḍita" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.30">
.<!--Śārdūlavikrīḍita: - - - | ~ ~ - | ~ - ~ | ~ ~ - | - - ~ | - - ~ | =-->
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.30.01" n="1"><l n="a">ndā tan maṅkana rakva de saṅ amaṅun dānānurāgeṅ jagat!</l><l n="b">tan saṅkeṅ hana kāraṇanya vinahan bhojāna māṅsāpəṭar*,</l><l n="c">lūd hīnālpaguṇārdha sādhu katunan byāpāra doniṅ vineh;</l><l n="d">saṅ sambe rika rakva dibya kahiḍəp saṅ hyaṅ jagatkāraṇa.</l>
1580 <!-- <app>(b) q pətar.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.30.02" n="2"><l n="a">nāhan hetuni saṅ narendra riṅ uśānāṅgə̄ṅ sudharmeṅ para,</l>
.<l n="b">āpan rakva mahātidāna vəkas iṅ kīrtīnucap saṅ viku,</l>
.<l n="c">tan sor deni kadibyaniṅ ratu matī* praṅ śūrasiṅheṅ ayun;</l>
1585<l n="d">byakta svarga mahāviśeṣa katəmun* de śrī mahābhūpati.</l>
.<!--<app> (c) Aq matīṅ; (d) E1 matəmun, E2 patəmun.</app>-->
.</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="30" met="jagadnātha" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.31">
1590<!--Jagatnātha: ~ - ~ | ~ ~ - | ~ - ~ | ~ ~ - | ~ ~ ~ | ~ ~ ~ | - ~ - | ~ ~-->
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.31.01" n="1"><l n="a">nda hayva juga maṅkaneki kaharəpkv iri kita pinakeṣṭiniṅ hati:</l><l n="b">ndatan panuka* dharma kevala, tikaṅ huvus iki pahajə̄ṅ nareśvara;</l><l n="c">kitāmriha ri denya tan kaparahe* para, taləra* subhuktya saṅ viku.</l><l n="d">kabauddhan ika bauddha saṅ suṅana dharma kuṭikuṭi ləpas kaṣadpadan,</l>
. <!-- <app>(b) y panuti; (c) F kaparaheṅ; y parata.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.31.02" n="2"><l n="a">kaśaivan ika śaiva saṅ suṅana tasyan aṅalapa kalagyan uttama,</l>
1595<l n="b">kaṛṣyan ika valkalīka sira saṅ suṅana saphala riṅ vanāśrama,</l>
.<l n="c">apan hilahileki rakva, yadiyan salaha para təkap nareśvara;</l>
.<l n="d">pitovi daṭəṅeṅ mahābala, taha prabhu, niyata təkeṅ upadrava.</l>
.<!--<app> 2d and 3abc are missing in F.</app>-->
.</lg>
1600<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.31.03" n="3"><l n="a">* nda yekaṅ agave viyoga, yadiyan hənəṅakəna təkap nareśvara*;</l>
.<l n="b">sadānakiti sarvaloka, maṅahah maṅuhuh ika ri madhyaniṅ ləbuh;</l>
.<l n="c">prakopa kadi kālabhūta* sumaput mamahi ya purihiṅ salah paṅan,</l>
.<l n="d">təkeṅ tusika tan pakāla vulaṅun pravala pamatəkiṅ kaduryaśan.</l>
. <!--<app>(a) v narendra; (c) y Kālarupa.</app>-->
1605</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.31.04" n="4"><l n="a">praśasta mara* liṅṅiṅ āgama, nihan: viṣa mamati ya tan viṣottama,</l>
.<l n="b">ikaṅ kəna jugeka bhasmi ya təkapnika, pəjah atiduhkha kāsihan;</l>
.<l n="c">kunaṅ viṣa mahā ṅaranya dhana saṅ vikun apituvi dṛvya kahyaṅan,</l>
.<l n="d">nda yeka təka riṅ svaputra kula potraka sahana dinenya pātaka.’</l>
1610 <!-- <app>(a) C para.</app> -->
.</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="31" met="śārdūlavikrīḍita" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.32">
.<!--Śārdūlavikrīḍita: - - - | ~ ~ - | ~ - ~ | ~ ~ - | - - ~ | - - ~ | =-->
1615<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.32.01" n="1"><l n="a">nāhan liṅnira saṅ dvijendra, mavuvus* marmāmrahāse haji;</l><l n="b">yāṅde tuṣṭani saṅ narendra kaparah sampun minuṣṭīṅ hiḍəp,</l><l n="c">təkvan dharmani saṅ viśeṣa masiheṅ sarvāsakit riṅ jagat,</l><l n="d">siṅ bhraṣṭeki ya siṅ rubuh ya pahayun de saṅ narendrādhipa.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) y sumahur.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.32.02" n="2"><l n="a">`ai saṅ vipra purohitāgra, kita hayvāṅgə̄ṅ manah saṅśaya.</l>
.<l n="b">maṅgəh ṅvaṅ karaṇanya tan kasalaheṅ vīrānuteṅ śāsana,</l>
1620<l n="c">yadyan dhairya makīrtya kārya manukaṅ* dharmāku tan laṅghana,</l>
.<l n="d">denyānambəhaneki bhūmiyaśa saṅ nātheṅ atītālama.</l>
. <!-- <app>(c) F manuta, y manute.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.32.03" n="3"><l n="a">lāvan rakva haneki mātra hivaṅ iṅ rājālpa dharme* para,</l>
1625<l n="b">yan tan dharma ləpas jugeki ya gəṅən de saṅ pramāṇeṅ jagat;</l>
.<l n="c">nirbhagnopama vah dhaneki makuməd, bhuktyanya lagy āpərəd;</l>
.<l n="d">maṅkā kṣatriya bhūmipāla, yadiyan tan dharmapārāyaṇa.*</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) F dharmeṅ; (d) y -pārānaya.</app> -->
.</lg>
1630<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.32.04" n="4"><l n="a">saṅsiptanya, ri sampun iṅ ləṅəṅ apetpet ramya tākvan dhana,</l>
.<l n="b">kapvāmrihmriha dharma kīrti gavayən mvaṅ yajña tan popama.’</l>
.<l n="c">nāhan liṅnira saṅ narendra, kalavan saṅ śrī supatnīśvarī</l>
.<l n="d">sampun bhakti ri saṅ hyaṅ arca tumurun, mvaṅ taṅ kakeñāṅdulur.</l>
.</lg>
1635<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.32.05" n="5"><l n="a">prāpteṅ caṇḍi kaśaivan adbhuta sira mvaṅ saṅ mahābrāhmaṇa.</l>
.<l n="b">tan varṇan sira, riṅ kṣaṇekin umijil saṅ śrī mahābhūpati;</l>
.<l n="c">sampun prāpta sireṅ yavānuli manuṅgaṅ riṅ rathārjenapi,</l>
.<l n="d">mvaṅ sakvehnikanaṅ vvaṅ adyah i daləm sampun haneṅ vāhana.</l>
.</lg>
1640<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.32.06" n="6"><l n="a">līlālon lariniṅ rathātut i ləbuhniṅ dharma kīrṇāṅalor;</l>
.<l n="b">ramyākveh tikanaṅ tumiṅhali siran strīstrī maniñjo kabeh;</l>
.<l n="c">len tekaṅ tumut iṅ ratheka ya turuṅ varsih* tumonton sira,</l>
.<l n="d">kapvātambak avarṇa polahiṅ anonton rājakāryeṅ purī.</l>
. <!-- <app>(c) C varsi, E varśih.</app> -->
1645</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.32.07" n="7"><l n="a">ndah śīghran təka riṅ pasaṅgrahan anindyāvarṇa rūmniṅ purī</l>
.<l n="b">tiṅkahtiṅkahi gopuranya, ri harəp sākṣāt vaṅuntur katon;</l>
.<l n="c">ṅkāne jronya panaṅkilan muvah ikānnah* saṅ vvaṅ iṅ jro purī,</l>
.<l n="d">endah lvir siluman paṅipyan anurun ṅgvan śrī mahābhūpati.</l>
1650<!--<app> (c) Bv ikānaṅ, y ikaṅgvan.</app>-->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.32.08" n="8"><l n="a">nāhan hetunikaṅ tumiṅhal aṅəṭək* ta pvāṅlalər* kapnətan;</l>
.<l n="b">vvaṅ vvaṅ thāni ḍusun samekin umarək ndā tan pəgat sə̄k təka;</l>
.<l n="c">ramyāganti mahurhuran* sama mavastrārjāṅaḍəp rin ləmah,</l>
1655<l n="d">sakvehkvehnya mahātituṣṭa lumihat polah narendrādhipa.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) F aṅətək, C aṅəṭik; C pvāṅlalə̄; (c) C mavurvuran.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.32.09" n="9"><l n="a">yekāṅde sukha* saṅ narendra kalavan saṅ śrī supatnīśvarī,</l>
.<l n="b">təkvan deni kabhīnabhīnavanikaṅ sāmyādi jurv āsəgəh;</l>
1660<l n="c">sīma mvaṅ kuvu nātha rakva salakistrīnyan praṇāmye haji,</l>
.<l n="d">kapvāvvat mahabhojanāsirasiran, ndā tan hanāpty ādhama.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) y duhkha.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.32.10" n="10"><l n="a">akveh saṅ mahaturhatur saha lavan gəṇḍiṅ mṛdaṅgāṅiriṅ;</l>
1665<l n="b">mevvivvaṅ vvaṅ amuṇḍumuṇḍut amavaṅ tumpəṅ* səkul mvaṅ hulam;</l>
.<l n="c">tvak baḍyag* varagaṅ pəṭar* tal inapi ṅkāne gucinyāhirəṅ,</l>
.<l n="d">tampo mvaṅ paṅasih* kilaṅ saha lavan brəm bras jaguṅ mvaṅ gaḍuṅ;</l>
.<!--<app> (b) q tumpər; (c) v badyas; v pəṭaṅ; (d) C paṅalih.</app>-->
.</lg>
1670<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.32.11" n="11"><l n="a">vvahvvāhan: ri harəp pucaṅ saha səḍah, laṅsəb pisaṅ poh ñaman,</l>
.<l n="b">maṅgis duryan ikātikīrṇa, kalavan dodol vajik sə̄k kətan;*</l>
.<l n="c">lyan tekaṅ vijil iṅ pasir: kraṅika len bandəṅ makādin hana;</l>
.<l n="d">hetunyaṅ mahabhojaneka kahiḍəp guntur lavan sāgara.</l>
.<!--<app> (b) y sək təka.</app>-->
1675</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.32.12" n="12"><l n="a">ndah yekan panaḍah narendra kalavan saṅ śrī supatnīśvarī;</l>
.<l n="b">sāmantaprabhu vīrayodhan umarək sampun sinuṅ bhojana,</l>
.<l n="c">mvaṅ vīrādhika saṅ suvandha pinakottuṅgāgra muṅgv iṅ harəp,</l>
.<l n="d">lumrākveh təka riṅ balādhika pənuh prāpteṅ yavā tan kuraṅ.</l>
1680</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.32.13" n="13"><l n="a">len tekāṅ akaṭik* masārathi gaja mvaṅ sārathi syandana,</l>
.<l n="b">dudv ekaṅ magaməl mṛdaṅga kalavan goṅ kəṇḍaṅ atyadbhuta,</l>
.<l n="c">guṇḍik vval vujil atri kuñja sahananyan vah mahābhojana;</l>
.<l n="d">tan hopən tikanaṅ vvaṅ adyah i daləm sampun pinik taṅ səkul.</l>
1685 <!-- <app>(a) y makaṭik.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.32.14" n="14"><l n="a">norāṅsal niki* sə̄k kabeh kavarəgan, ndātan hanekālapa,</l>
.<l n="b">sakvehkveh bala saṅ vatək ratu varəg mvaṅ pekayodhakrama;</l>
.<l n="c">len taṅ bras balabur mijil ya, karaṇanyan tan prakopeṅ* manah,</l>
1690<l n="d">hetunyaṅ bala tan haneka marusuh riṅ thāni tuṣṭottama.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) niki: y vəki; (c) v prakoṣeṅ.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.32.15" n="15"><l n="a">təkvan deni piṅit* narendra, sumalah maṅkveṅ susenādhika,</l>
.<l n="b">sthity aṅrakṣa ri polahiṅ bala lavan sāmyānuvartāpagəh;</l>
1695<l n="c">yekāṅdāni rəsəpnikaṅ vvaṅ umara mvaṅ saṅ parān iṅ maṅə̄,</l>
.<l n="d">kanyārjāpapagan* vərəhvərəh anindyāmbəknikaṅ vah sukha.</l>
. <!--<app>(a) B miṅit, z viṅit; (d) A apapagən.</app>-->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.32.16" n="16"><l n="a">ndah yekan ri huvus narendra manaḍah, tuṣṭaṅ balākveh marək,</l>
1700<l n="b">sakvehkveh para sāmya jurv akuvu nāthātuṅgu dharmādhara;</l>
.<l n="c">ṅkā rakvan sinuṅan suvastra, sama bhakty amvit ri jə̄ṅ saṅ prabhu,</l>
.<l n="d">mvaṅ saṅ sthāpaka śaiva bauddha karuhun sampun vineh paṅrəṇa.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.32.17" n="17"><l n="a">maṅkā tiṅkahireki yan paməgil iṅ deśa pradeśālaṅə̄;</l>
1705<l n="b">ramyāmbəknikanaṅ kamārga paḍa tan vvantən manah duhkhita.</l>
.<l n="c">tan varṇan sira riṅ vəṅīki, vəki sə̄k taṅ vīrayodhākəmit.</l>
.<l n="d">rəp, prāptaṅ dina, maṅkat eñjiṅika saṅ śrī bhūmināthan laku.</l>
.</lg>
.</div>
1710<div type="canto" rend="met" n="32" met="jagaddhita" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.33">
.<!--Jagaddhita: - - - | ~ ~ - | ~ - ~ | ~ ~ - | ~ ~ ~ | ~ ~ ~ | - ~ - | ~ =-->
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.33.01" n="1"><l n="a">sampun prāpta sireṅ təgaltəgal alas jurajuraṅ i samīpaniṅ savah,</l><l n="b">tan sah śrī parameśvarīki pakarovaṅira dinulur iṅ balakrama;</l><l n="c">katyāgan hana maṇḍaleki jinajahnira kuṭikuṭi* dharma kahyaṅan,</l><l n="d">ndah yekā* pinaran vinurṣita dinānanira saha lavan nareśvarī.</l>
. <!-- <app>(c) y kuṭi hana; (d) F yekan.</app> -->
.</lg>
1715<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.33.02" n="2"><l n="a">vvantən dharma ləpas rubuh katəmu denira kahavan i piṅgiriṅ vukir;</l>
.<l n="b">caṇḍy āgə̄ṅ pupak iṅ təṅah, pənuh ikaṅ kayu halalaṅ i madhyaniṅ natar;</l>
.<l n="c">vvadnyāket amilət hyaṅ arca harirūpa masəmusəmu nāgabhūṣaṇa,</l>
.<l n="d">mvaṅ saṅ hyaṅ śivavimba rakva kasihan sira saha gaṇa tan pakolulan.</l>
.</lg>
1720<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.33.03" n="3"><l n="a">ṅkāne* vāṇḍira yar pararyan ika saṅ prabhu saha balakośavāhana,</l>
.<l n="b">sakvehkveh bala vīra rovaṅira yan pamahayu varadharma* kālasan;</l>
.<l n="c">eṅgal rakva huvus muvah hinənahan bukur arəja ləyəp kadīṅ daṅū,</l>
.<l n="d">thāny akveh pakahaṅśadharma ya sinūṅakənira tinut iṅ śalāpagəh*.</l>
. <!--<app>(a) AC ṅkāneṅ; (b) y kuṭidharma; (d) AB balāpagəh.
1725 (c) hinənahan &lt; inənahan
. (d) sinūṅakənira &lt; sinuṅakənira</app>-->
. </lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.33.04" n="4"><l n="a">nāhan hetunirā titir mahas adoh ləṅəṅ amahayu dharma siṅ rusak,</l>
.<l n="b">mvaṅ tan dharma kasaugatan hana kaṛṣyanika pinahajə̄ṅ nareśvara.</l>
1730<l n="c">byātītan ri lavasnireki lurahiṅ jalanidhi ya huvus kakendriya,</l>
.<l n="d">ghūrṇaṅ ryak karəṅə̄ humuṅ mavurahan*, tinut i lakuniran təkeṅ pasir.</l>
. <!-- <app>(d) B havurahan, C mahurahan.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.33.05" n="5"><l n="a">eñjiṅ lampahireki, vāhu kuməñar hyaṅ aruṇa kadi tejaniṅ tasik;</l>
1735<l n="b">līlātūt təpiniṅ pasir, kisikisiknyan arəsik aputih tiniṅhalan;</l>
.<l n="c">len tekaṅ kadi mutyahāra rinəmuk marakata sumənə̄ nirantara,</l>
.<l n="d">mvaṅ tekaṅ kadi vastra mañjəṭi hanan kadi taluki rinəṅga riṅ tatur.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.33.06" n="6"><l n="a">maṅkin ləṅləṅ aninditeki kalaṅə̄nyan amarəṅi* kalaṅvaniṅ kapat,</l>
1740<l n="b">sə̄k tekaṅ kusumānəḍəṅ sama məkar* baṅun inatag i gəntəriṅ patər;</l>
.<l n="c">ramyātūt sisiniṅ samudra hana rājasa kanigara campakāsana,</l>
.<l n="d">tañjuṅ len kayu mās tahən puriṅ aśoka sama vinilət iṅ vəlasharəp.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) A mamarəṅi; (b) sama məkar: y ya masəkar.</app> -->
.</lg>
1745<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.33.07" n="7"><l n="a">yekāṅde sukhaniṅ vvaṅ adyah i daləm paḍa vahu tumurun sakeṅ ratha;</l>
.<l n="b">guṇḍik mvaṅ kaka len uveña tumurun kavigaran i kalaṅvaniṅ səkar;</l>
.<l n="c">āstām taṅ vahu sah sakeṅ gaja kalih kavula ḍatəṅ aliṅgih iṅ karaṅ,</l>
.<l n="d">lagy āṅə̄m ri vətisnya riṅ bañu, baṅun puḍak arəja muḍoḍa* riṅ paruṅ*.</l>
. <!--<app>(d) F ṅuḍoḍa; C paraṅ.</app>-->
1750</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.33.08" n="8"><l n="a">akveh bhāvanikaṅ vaneh: hana mareṅ bukur arəja ri duṅhus iṅ pasir,</l>
.<l n="b">ləṅləṅ lāgi tumiṅhali* ryak amagut karaṅ asəmu javuh tibeṅ natar;</l>
.<l n="c">len tekaṅ makaraṅkaraṅ vagəd arumpukan asana lavan səkar gaḍuṅ,</l>
.<l n="d">siñjaṅnyārja mirir katon ri palajəṅnyan asəmu malagāmapag* harus*.</l>
1755 <!--<app>(b) Cq tumaṅhali ṅ; (d) F palaga-; y guruh.</app>-->
. </lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.33.09" n="9"><l n="a">lor vetanya haneki vāhu magəluṅ* luput*, aṅadəg i tuṅhaniṅ karaṅ;</l>
.<l n="b">madhya lvir pəpəs aṅgaluṅgaṅ araṅin ləṅəṅ, asəmu kalaṅvan iṅ tulis;</l>
.<l n="c">prajñānvām, anulis ṭikānakanakan puḍak, inamər i layvan iṅ gəluṅ;</l>
1760<l n="d">pantəs teki hajə̄ṅnya yan suṅakəneṅ kavi manulisa bhāṣa riṅ karas.</l>
. <!--<app>(a) B magəlar, v magəlaṅ; B lumut, A tumut.
. (c) prajñānvām &lt; prajñānvam</app>-->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.33.10" n="10"><l n="a">vvantən lvir siluman baṅun mətu sakeṅ jaladhi hayunikāmaṅun laṅə̄;</l>
1765<l n="b">mombak lvīr i təṅahnya keṅis i səḍəṅnyan amahayu ri luṅsuriṅ tapih;</l>
.<l n="c">ramyāṅras makaraṅkaraṅ susu baṅun jumahatakəna rāganiṅ rimaṅ,</l>
.<l n="d">lagy āgəntər i paṅrəṅihrəṅih i polahikan arəs i paṅgyat iṅ kilat.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.33.11" n="11"><l n="a">honyaṅ nyāsa sinoṅan iṅ priyaka məmbaṅ i təpinikanaṅ karaṅ sumoṅ,</l>
1770<l n="b">ṅkā toṅgvan rasikātiduhkha manahən lara saha kavulāṅavin səkar;*</l>
.<l n="c">pintən* ṅganya huvus sinūkṣma kinirim səpah inapi təkap nareśvara,</l>
.<l n="d">marmāṅdāni lulutnya rakva matəmah kakavin inuparəṅga riṅ taṅis.</l>
. <!--<app>(b) y sərəh; (c) y pantəs.</app>-->
.</lg>
1775<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.33.12" n="12"><l n="a">`hah saṅ kepi təkāṅisapvakən aṅol təṅah anuculi sandhiniṅ tapih,</l>
.<l n="b">petpet harṣa vicakṣaṇeṅgita baṅun bhramara marək i gandhaniṅ səkar;</l>
.<l n="c">lvir tan svapna hiḍəpku denta vinaveṅ pasir i valakaṅ iṅ karaṅ liman,</l>
.<l n="d">vāhv ānūt ṅvaṅ i* kūṅta, mogha kadinan, dadi hilaṅ i pataṅhiniṅ hulun.</l>
. <!-- <app>(d) F vahv antuk vaṅi.</app> -->
1780</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.33.13" n="13"><l n="a">hah saṅ lot makirim palambaṅ alaṅə̄, bəsur asamaya tan tulus təka,</l>
.<l n="b">tontonən ṅvaṅ i rehta riṅ svapəna yan katəkana ri sapolahiṅ hulun;</l>
.<l n="c">jaṅgāluṅ lumuṅ iṅ tavaṅ, riṅ apa yan vənaṅ amiləta vimbaniṅ vulan?</l>
.<l n="d">maṅkā kūṅku ri rūmta*, dūran ika yan katəkana saharas lavan kita.’</l>
1785 <!-- <app>(d) ACq kuṅkuṅ i rumta.</app> -->
.</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="33" met="jagadnātha" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.34">
.<!--Jagatnātha: ~ - ~ | ~ ~ - | ~ - ~ | ~ ~ - | ~ ~ ~ | ~ ~ ~ | - ~ - | ~ ~-->
1790<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.34.01" n="1"><l n="a">nahan rasani deny asambat alaṅə̄ tinulisakən i paṅhrət iṅ yaśa.</l><l n="b">nda tan huniṅanən gatinya; caritan nṛpati sira lavan nareśvarī,</l><l n="c">huvusnira haneṅ karaṅ garuḍavaktra sinaput i kalaṅvaniṅ səkar,</l><l n="d">baṅun məsata rakva rūpanira len kakakaka muliheṅ surālaya.</l>
. <!--<app>(a) deny asambat &lt; denyāsambat</app>-->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.34.02" n="2"><l n="a">ləṅəṅ kaləṅəṅan manahnira, ləṅəṅ təkap i ləṅəṅi ramyaniṅ pasir:</l>
.<l n="b">manuknya manavatnavat kuməḍap asriṅ asəmu halisiṅ kəneṅ unəṅ;</l>
1795<l n="c">puḍaknyan aṅuḍoḍa riṅ bañu baṅun* vətisiṅ arəja kesisan* tapih;</l>
.<l n="d">patərnya hana mātra mandra* karəṅə̄ sarəṅihiṅ avədin kapiṅrvana;</l>
. <!-- <app>(c) y pilih; C kesinan; (d) y mandra mātra.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.34.03" n="3"><l n="a">taṭitnya kuməḍapkəḍap sakəḍapiṅ vvaṅ apicala ri sampun iṅ gati;</l>
1800<l n="b">limutlimut ikeṅ tavaṅ sapaṅureniṅ* asidəha manīsakən huyaṅ;</l>
.<l n="c">kuvuṅkuvuṅikāsmu vastra* sinusur turuturutan i saṇḍiṅiṅ rəməṅ,</l>
.<l n="d">baṅun vahu sakeṅ bahitra pasuṅ iṅ puhavaṅika ri jə̄ṅ nareśvara.</l>
. <!-- <app>(b) F samaṅure; (c) F vaktra.</app> -->
.</lg>
1805<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.34.04" n="4"><l n="a">tiliṅtiliṅ iṅ arka rakva huvus iṅ javuh anirami paṅjrah iṅ səkar,</l>
.<l n="b">hilaṅ pətəṅ ikaṅ pasir kasuluhan dinakara sumənə̄ prabhāsvara;</l>
.<l n="c">pradeśa təpi lor kidul paḍa katon, mari kahiman avor lamadlamad,</l>
.<l n="d">ikan vvaṅ amayaṅ hamañciṅ alivər parahu makakurambaṅ* iṅ bañu.</l>
. <!-- <app>(d) y parahu nika kurambaṅ.</app> -->
1810</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.34.05" n="5"><l n="a">nda sakṣaṇa haneka nūsa ya katon kaparək i kahanan nareśvara,</l>
.<l n="b">baṅun mətu sakeṅ samudra, kalaṅə̄nya kadi vahu ḍatəṅ sakeṅ tavaṅ;</l>
.<l n="c">bukurnya ri samīpaniṅ bhujagapuṣpa paḍa vinilət iṅ vəlas harəp;</l>
.<l n="d">limutnyan akuseṅ* pucaṅ gaḍiṅ avarṇa saput i susuniṅ səḍəṅ rara;</l>
1815 <!--<app>(d) AF akuśeṅ AF, BCqv akuseṅ, y akuṣeṅ.
. (d) akuseṅ &lt; akuśeṅ</app>-->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.34.06" n="6"><l n="a">karaṅ limanike təpinya kadi miṅguta təkap i panəmpuhiṅ* halun,</l>
.<l n="b">bañunya kumucur sakeṅ tulalay adbhuta masəmu gajendra gə̄ṅ galak.</l>
1820<l n="c">samantaji haneki ratnavanitāhañutan aṅadəg iṅ karaṅ sumoṅ,</l>
.<l n="d">mukhanya gumavaṅ sumə̄ṅ, riṅ apa yan hilaṅa ri surupiṅ divākara* ?</l>
. <!--<app>(a) A patəmpuh; (d) F divākara.
. (d) divākara &lt; divaṅkara</app>-->
.</lg>
1825<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.34.07" n="7"><l n="a">sumār vaṅini kenyan eñjuh anipis kadi jalada ri sampun iṅ riris;</l>
.<l n="b">təṅahnya kadi pādapāṅlih, araras susunika kadi moṇḍuhoṇḍuhan;</l>
.<l n="c">maṅañjali mahāṅure gəluṅan āpti lumabuha ri* durganiṅ pasir,</l>
.<l n="d">amogha təka taṅ limut malimunan* muvah anapihi tiṅhaliṅ mulat.</l>
. <!-- <app>(c) A lumabuhika; (d) ACqv masiluman.</app> -->
1830</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.34.08" n="8"><l n="a">ya hetuni təñuhnikaṅ vvaṅ i daləm sahanahananikaṅ macaṅkrama</l>
.<l n="b">paḍāhəlahəle* hayunya, riṅ apan kəna pihərana riṅ mahas maṅə̄?</l>
.<l n="c">muvah nṛpavadhū sireki kalavan nṛpati mavəlas aṅrəs* iṅ hati,</l>
.<l n="d">tayenucapireki rakva sakarīriya suməlap i citta tan bəsur.</l>
1835 <!-- <app>(b) F -āṅhəla-həle; (c) Aq aṅhrəs.</app> -->
.</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="34" met="śārdūlavikrīḍita" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.35">
.<!--Śārdūlavikrīḍita: - - - | ~ ~ - | ~ - ~ | ~ ~ - | - - ~ | - - ~ | =-->
1840<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.35.01" n="1"><l n="a">byātītan gati saṅ narendra kalavan saṅ lvir hyaṅiṅ campaka,</l><l n="b">ramyāsiṅ sakatə̄nireka pinaran mvaṅ taṅ kakeñāṅiriṅ.</l><l n="c">tis tis, meh tumibeṅ ḍavuh lima, madan saṅ śrī mahābhūpati;</l><l n="d">sampun prāpta tikaṅ* gajāśvan umarək, maṅkat narendrādhipa.</l>
. <!-- <app>(d) A rika ṅ.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.35.02" n="2"><l n="a">lagy ālon lariniṅ rathāsirasiran tūt piṅgiriṅ sāgara,</l>
.<l n="b">vval vuṅkuk hana riṅ dvipāṅga karuhun mvaṅ* taṅ vvaṅ iṅ jro purī.</l>
1845<l n="c">śīghra prāpta ri jə̄ṅnikaṅ giri, juraṅnyājro pəṅuṅ bhīṣaṇa,</l>
.<l n="d">koṅaṅ taṅ paraneki tīrtha maṅaran riṅ narmadālvādaləm.</l>
. <!--<app>(b) y len.</app>-->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.35.03" n="3"><l n="a">sə̄k tekaṅ kusumāṅjrah arja masinaṅ ṅkāne təpinyāmijah;</l>
1850<l n="b">ramya vvahvvahan iṅ gəgər sama matə̄b: poh danta len poh cəməṅ,</l>
.<l n="c">duryan maṅgis aneka laṅsəb anəḍəṅ vuṅlvan kacapy ambavaṅ,</l>
.<l n="d">kīrṇekaṅ panasā ḍuvət macalakət lyan taṅ kapuṇḍuṅ jirək.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.35.04" n="4"><l n="a">hetu śrī naranātha garjita mihat mvaṅ śrī supatnīśvarī.</l>
1855<l n="b">sampun prāpta sireki tan dva tumurun saṅkeṅ* rathārjādhika;</l>
.<l n="c">mvaṅ sakvehnira* saṅ vvaṅ adyah i daləm sampun təkeṅ narmadā,</l>
.<l n="d">hyunhyun deni laṅə̄nya mombak aṅalun lvīr umbakiṅ sāgara.</l>
. <!-- <app>(b) F saṅke; (c) F nika.</app> -->
.</lg>
1860<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.35.05" n="5"><l n="a">gambhīrāhniṅ ike bañunyan umilī*, siṅgih sutīrtheṅ* sarāt,</l>
.<l n="b">sə̄h layvāniṅ atīrtha muṅgu ri təpinyāglar sumə̄k iṅ natar;</l>
.<l n="c">kuntulkuntulikāṅadəg ri kalakahnya, mvaṅ mayūrāṅigəl,</l>
.<l n="d">haṅsākveh ḍara cakravāka salakistrīnyādulur tan kasah.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) y bañunya humijil; y patirtheṅ.</app> -->
1865</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.35.06" n="6"><l n="a">ramyaṅ vvaṅ paḍa tuṣṭa garjita təkapnyātyanta riṅ nirmala,</l>
.<l n="b">kīrṇāṅ adyusike təpinya juga tan prāpte* təṅahnyādaləm;</l>
.<l n="c">guṇḍik mvaṅ paricārikeki masibu, vval kuñja ramyāsivo,</l>
.<l n="d">strīstry anvam kaka len uveña ri ruhur sampun samyādus kabeh.</l>
1870<!--<app> (b) qy prāpteṅ. </app>-->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.35.07" n="7"><l n="a">akveh lvir curigenunus təṅahika lvir polahiṅ pādapa,</l>
.<l n="b">māyākārani vṛttivṛttinika* mār maṅras təkeṅ* sor katon;</l>
.<l n="c">lyan tekaṅ təka sāhasānuculi kenya lvir kaḍatvan sayat,</l>
1875<l n="d">dudvekaṅ* vahu məntas eñjuh atukup hastātapih riṅ ḍarat.</l>
. <!-- <app>(b) Bq vṛtti once; Cq katəke; (d) A dudvekaṅ, others: dudvīkaṅ.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.35.08" n="8"><l n="a">honyekā manəṅah, pilih kavula yāṅlaṅhuy samyāgyārəbut,</l>
.<l n="b">tuñjuṅ baṅ tarate pinetnya kalavan tuñjuṅ biru mvaṅ pəṭak;</l>
1880<l n="c">mvaṅ tekaṅ maṅalap* puḍak matut i piṅgirniṅ lvah ardhenivə̄,</l>
.<l n="d">yekā pavvatike tuhanya, karəṇan sampun tinaṅgap pinəm.</l>
. <!--<app>(c) ACqv aṅalap, B haṅalap.
. (a) samāgyārəbut &lt; samyāgyārəbut, but see OJED s.v. kavula (samagry ārəbut).</app>-->
.</lg>
1885<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.35.09" n="9"><l n="a">ndah* sampun paḍa məntas, amrih umareṅ nyāsa prakīrṇeṅ ḍarat;</l>
.<l n="b">lyan tekaṅ maṅusī* mahantən aṅure veny āsəkar campaka,</l>
.<l n="c">dudvekaṅ vahu mahyas arja masalin siñjaṅnikāṅasturi,</l>
.<l n="d">mvaṅ tekaṅ binurat jajanya linulur prāpte* təṅahnyāṅligā.</l>
. <!--<app>(a) F ndā; (b) F maṅusir; (d) ACq prāpteṅ. </app>-->
1890</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.35.10" n="10"><l n="a">parnah lornya haneka parvata ləyəp piṅgirnikaṅ narmadā,</l>
.<l n="b">raṅkaṅ mās ri pucaknya bhāsvara lumə̄ṅ sūryopamanyan katon;</l>
.<l n="c">sə̄h taṅ puṣpa hane təpinya kalavan nyū danta jaṅgāmilət,</l>
.<l n="d">ṅkāneṅ* pārśva baṅun tapovana bukurnya, lvir ḍukuh riṅ tulis.</l>
1895 <!--<app>(d) F ṅkane.</app>-->
.</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="35" met="aśvalalita" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.36">
.<!--Aśvalalita: ~ ~ ~ | ~ - ~ | - ~ ~ | ~ - ~ | - ~ ~ | ~ - ~ | - ~ ~ | ~ =-->
1900<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.36.01" n="1"><l n="a">nṛpati hanerikā nda ri təlasnirāsuji* lavan narendradayitā;</l><l n="b">ləṅəṅ alaṅə̄ maṅə̄maṅən i ramyaniṅ paramatīrtha sindhu sakala,</l><l n="c">makarakaraṅ śilā drəs i bañunya rakva kahiḍəp harus vahu təka;</l><l n="d">sahaja sirəmsirəm saha riris gərəh hana munī dukilyan alaṅə̄.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) y huvus.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.36.02" n="2"><l n="a">ri surupiṅ arka, maṅkin alaṅə̄ rikāṅḍaḍari taṅ vulan* makalaṅan,</l>
.<l n="b">parəṅ uməkar tikaṅ kumuda riṅ lvah, asmu manahiṅ vvaṅ onəṅ alavas*;</l>
1905<l n="c">sumar umidəm* mənurnya, hana nāgapuṣpa masuhun səkar mrik avaṅi;</l>
.<l n="d">riniṅariṅeki rakva kadi mə̄ra muṅsiran umilva riṅ vulan avā.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) CE kaṅ vulan; (b) F alaṅə̄; (c) A amadəm.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.36.03" n="3"><l n="a">prasamasamātiramya midəriṅ mahantən i samīpa saṅ narapati,</l>
1910<l n="b">ya karaṇa saṅ narendradayiteki rakva tumurun marāmupu səkar;</l>
.<l n="c">sasiki pinetnirānukhani citta, tan hana muvah siriṅnya ya, pinəm,</l>
.<l n="d">sinarisarīki raśminika, rājasūnv asupuan ṅaranya subhaga.</l>
. <!--<app>(d) em. asusupan &lt; asupuan folloving OJED (s.v. raśmi) ?</app>-->
.</lg>
1915<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.36.04" n="4"><l n="a">sahananikaṅ vvaṅ adyah umarək samāmvaṅ i rarasnirāṅapi laṅə̄,</l>
.<l n="b">makin alaṅə̄ hane vitiṅ aśoka sāmaja sirāṅikət səkar arūm*;</l>
.<l n="c">narapati garjitāmbək umulat baṅun karavuhan hyaṅiṅ masa kapat,</l>
.<l n="d">ri hayunireki rakva kadi mukṣa riṅ tavaṅ amora riṅ śaśadhara.</l>
. <!-- <app>(b) y sirāmikət mənur arum.</app> -->
1920</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.36.05" n="5"><l n="a">ya karaṇa saṅ narendra mañuluhñuluh siran aṅəmban* aṅhariharih;</l>
.<l n="b">saṅ ahayu kepvan iṅ daya sireki rakva vinaveṅ svaveśma* kanaka;</l>
.<l n="c">sumar i huvusnya rakva kinənan sugandha jinəm arja marbuk umirir;</l>
.<l n="d">pravala haneṅ smarālaya hiḍəpni rūmnira ri ramyaniṅ vukir anak.</l>
1925 <!-- <app>(a) y huməmban; (b) y suveśma.</app> -->
.</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="36" met="jagaddhita" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.37">
.<!--Jagaddhita: - - - | ~ ~ - | ~ - ~ | ~ ~ - | ~ ~ ~ | ~ ~ ~ | - ~ - | ~ =-->
1930
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.37.01" n="1"><l n="a">*ndan saṅ śrī parameśvarī* masəmu suṅkava miṅay aṅəsah vimūrchita,</l><l n="b">suṅsutsuṅsutirārdha deni paṅikətnira səkar asuluh niśākara;</l><l n="c">heman rakva rarasnya tan tulus, amogha kahavara təkap nareśvara;</l><l n="d">yekā hetuni luhnirādrəs umilī tumus i jaja, məhah pinaṅkvakən.</l>
. <!--<app>(a) A saṅ śrī devi parameśvarī.
. This stanza is missing in q.</app>-->
.</lg>
1935<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.37.02" n="2"><l n="a">`hah dyah, vruh ṅvaṅ i duhkha rakryan i gatiṅku vavaṅ i səḍəṅ iṅ mapet laṅə̄;</l>
.<l n="b">āpan kenaka niṅ madhubrata maṅantyakəna ri huvus iṅ puḍak sumār*;</l>
.<l n="c">mvaṅ hyūniṅ taḍaharṣa rakva mamalarmalara ri kəñariṅ niśākara,</l>
.<l n="d">mvaṅ taṅ cātaka riṅ tavaṅ ləṅəṅ aṅantyakəna riris i gəntəriṅ patər.</l>
. <!--<app>(b) y məkar.
1940 2d and 3abc are missing in q.</app>-->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.37.03" n="3"><l n="a">*ndā tan maṅkana tāku, kevala valat səkar aṅamər i rūmta riṅ tilam,</l>
.<l n="b">tan vruh yan carikənta riṅ kuku təka praṅən i luṅidi tuṅtuṅiṅ halis;</l>
.<l n="c">deniṅ kūṅ sumaput manahku ri hajə̄ṅta kavulaṅunan aṅgəgə̄ smara,</l>
1945<l n="d">maṅgākun pəjahāsiluṅluṅa* laraṅku rurubana ri luṅsuriṅ tapih.</l>
. <!-- <app>(d) F asiluṅluṅ i.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.37.04" n="4"><l n="a">lāvan masku, baṅun tan iṅ rat i panonkv iri kita kadi tan kavastvana,</l>
.<l n="b">lvir hyaṅniṅ kusumāśarīra kita tan pakaraṇa mavilāsa lālana;</l>
1950<l n="c">marmaṅkun kadi kapnətan kalatahan, vədi kaluputanāməkul təṅah,</l>
.<l n="d">āpan deni hayunta rakva kahiḍəp hilaṅa ri silibiṅ kakāṅhaḍəp.’</l>
.</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="37" met="kusumavilasita" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.38">
1955<!--Kusumavilasita: - ~ ~ | - ~ - | ~ ~ ~ | - ~ ~ | ~ ~ ~ | ~ - ~ | - ~ =-->
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.38.01" n="1"><l n="a">maṅkana denirāṅlipurakən turida vuyuṅi* saṅ pinaṅkvakən,</l><l n="b">maṅgəh i kakvan iṅ turida rāga masəmu salagāṅrəṅə̄ gərəh;</l><l n="c">lagy aṅudaṅhudaṅ susu sirāṅiduṅ akakavin aṅharas pipi,</l><l n="d">ñə̄r pyah i saṅ minaṅkana, baṅun kumuda məkar i tambvaṅiṅ vulan.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) A huyuṅ.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.38.02" n="2"><l n="a">vahv anut iṅ gatī gatinirānuti mari matulak* vineh səpah.</l>
1960<l n="b">tan huniṅe rarasniṅ aməḍar* tapih asəmu viraṅ katiṇḍihan;</l>
.<l n="c">ramya parəṅ silih pulət ikaṅ luṅayan, asəmu luṅgahiṅ gaḍuṅ</l>
.<l n="d">mvaṅ ləməsiṅ vəlas harəp, aket patəmunira, ləyəp samālaṅə̄.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) Fy manulak; (b) C nirāməḍar.</app> -->
.</lg>
1965</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="38" met="kaləṅəṅan" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.39">
.<!--Kaləṅəṅan: ~ ~ - | ~ - ~ | ~ ~ - | ~ ~ ~ | ~ ~ ~ | - ~ - | ~ =-->
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.39.01" n="1"><l n="a">adavān kavarṇana ri polahira rəsəp amukti saṅgama;</l><l n="b">vəkasiṅ vəkas mari silih silih ujar iṅ akuṅ, nda tan humuṅ;</l><l n="c">smaratantrayoga kinəñəpnira samavatiniṅ karāsikan;</l><l n="d">ya tinut saṅ adyah umənəṅ gupay, asəmu kaləṅgak iṅ tilam.</l>
.</lg>
1970<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.39.02" n="2"><l n="a">vəkasan sirāṅlih aturū, paḍa haripira, kālihan* huləs;</l>
.<l n="b">sira saṅ narendradayitāṅipi* maməṅaməṅ iṅ smarālaya.</l>
.<l n="c">tumuluy mataṅhi sira rakva ri huvus i kapiṅrvaniṅ gati;</l>
.<l n="d">rahineki rakva, muni taṅ manuk avurahan* iṅ vvahan ratəṅ.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) F haripa makālihan, y maharip akalihan; (b) qF narendraduhitā-; (d) A ahurahan.</app> -->
1975</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.39.03" n="3"><l n="a">sumar ambabar mayaṅikaṅ pucaṅ arəja ri saṇḍiṅ iṅ vuṅu,</l>
.<l n="b">kalavan gaḍuṅ vahu mure vaṅinika katəke nareśvara*,</l>
.<l n="c">*sumirir baṅun mamapag* iṅ karahinan akusut sakeṅ jinəm;</l>
.<l n="d">pupusiṅ gəḍaṅ vahu məkar, satapih alulunan haneṅ dagan;</l>
1980 <!--<app>(b) y nareśvarī; (c) A mapag.
. From the second half of 3a to 4a are missing in v.</app>-->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.39.04" n="4"><l n="a">jaladāraṅ asmu hayatan susu, malimunan iṅ səpət gaḍiṅ;</l>
.<l n="b">hana maṅgis arja tumibeṅ kṣiti, kadi laṭiniṅ vineh səpah.</l>
1985<l n="c">lalu māsa, śīghran umijil hyaṅ aruṇa, sumuluh riṅ ambara;</l>
.<l n="d">sira saṅ narendra vuvusən, lakibi təlas aśucy abhūṣaṇa.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.39.05" n="5"><l n="a">paḍa sampun akrama tikaṅ vvaṅ i daləm umarək ri jə̄ṅnira;</l>
.<l n="b">kaka len uveña, karuhun saṅ amalihi lulut nareśvarī,</l>
1990<l n="c">paḍa kasrəpan lumihat iṅ vvay ahəniṅ atiśuddha nirmala;</l>
.<l n="d">paramottameka karəṅə̄ bañunikan umijil sakeṅ śaśi.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.39.06" n="6"><l n="a">atidurgamaṅ vvay adaləm jalanidhi sama ghūrṇitāṅalun;</l>
.<l n="b">vəki sə̄k ivaknya viparīta vənaṅ alapən iṅ macaṅkrama,</l>
1995<l n="c">ri gatinya tan hana pasimpaṅan iṅ anata, nora sambhava;</l>
.<l n="d">pravalāmaṅun vival i denya tan anuvuki buddhi niṅ maṅə̄.</l>
.</lg>
.
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.39.07" n="7"><l n="a">*ika rakva liṅnya ri narendra təka hirəṅ* i jə̄ṅ nareśvarī,</l>
2000<l n="b">tinut iṅ viraṅrvaṅ, apa tan sahur inamər anikvakən taṅan;</l>
.<l n="c">sira saṅ narendra vihikan sira ri manahi* saṅ nareśvarī</l>
.<l n="d">ri haturnya maṅkana, nimittanira mavacanāpriyambada*:</l>
. <!--<app>(a) y marək; (c) A manaha; (d) ACq -āmriyambada.
. This stanza is missing in v.</app>-->
2005</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.39.08" n="8"><l n="a">’ibu, hayva saṅśaya manahta, yayi, satanikaṅ lvah adbhuta!</l>
.<l n="b">tuvi sāgarālva kavənaṅ satakəna, bibi, yan kitāharəp.</l>
.<l n="c">yadi muṅsireṅ amaraloka ya karəpa* təkeṅ śivālaya,</l>
.<l n="d">riṅ apekin evəha təkapku tuməkakəna siṅ prayojana?</l>
2010 <!-- <app>(c) ya karəpa: y Haripada.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.39.09" n="9"><l n="a">ṅhiṅ ateki dūra kita, masku, vənaṅ umulate səḍəṅ vibhū;</l>
.<l n="b">ndah anugrahaṅkv i kita, vastu, tan arəsa ri rūpaniṅ hulun.</l>
.<l n="c">nda muvah tikaṅ vvaṅ i daləm sahanahananiṅ aṅgane* purī.</l>
2015<l n="d">təkan iṅ pravīra bala tan gumirisina nirakṣayeṅ manah.’</l>
. <!-- <app>(c) Ay aṅganeṅ.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.39.10" n="10"><l n="a">na vuvusnireka*; tumuluy saka ri pamarəkan nareśvarī</l>
.<l n="b">krama saṅ narendra, maṅadəg sira ri vəlahaniṅ lvah adbhuta;</l>
2020<l n="c">bala vīrasaṅghan umarək pramukha sahana saṅ vatək ratu,</l>
.<l n="d">caturāśrameki pakamaṅgala* sira kadi devatākrama.</l>
. <!--<app>(a) y narendra; (d) Fz makamaṅgala.</app>-->
.</lg>
.</div>
2025<div type="canto" rend="met" n="39" met="śārdūlavikrīḍita" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.40">
.<!--Śārdūlavikrīḍita: - - - | ~ ~ - | ~ - ~ | ~ ~ - | - - ~ | - - ~ | =-->
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.40.01" n="1"><l n="a">ambək śrī naranātha garjita mihat lvāniṅ mahānarmadā,</l><l n="b">gambhīrādaləmiṅ təṅah sama lavan jroniṅ mahāsāgara;</l><l n="c">ndah yekā* sira yan trivikrama, magə̄ṅ lvir meru sākṣāt katon,</l><l n="d">dīrghaṅ hasta* sahasra ghora ya lumuṅ tulyāṅrəgəp* sañjata.</l>
. <!-- <app>(c) F yeka n; (d) E2 dīrgha ṅ hasta, others: dīrghā hasta; tulyā-: q hatyā-.</app> -->
.</lg>
2030<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.40.02" n="2"><l n="a">huṅ huṅ huṅ, svaraniṅ varastuti, lavan puṣpārja saṅke vihat,</l>
.<l n="b">mvaṅ saṅ brāhmaṇa siddhy aśānti; humarəp* ḍyam saṅ vatək pārthiva,</l>
.<l n="c">kapvānəmbah i jə̄ṅ narendra, karuhun tekaṅ vvaṅ iṅ jro purī,</l>
.<l n="d">mukhya śrī parameśvarīki sira harṣāṅañjalī jə̄ṅ prabhu*.</l>
. <!-- <app>(b) C humarək; Fy n umarək; (d) y haji.</app> -->
2035</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.40.03" n="3"><l n="a">tindak, lvir bubulaṅ mahītala bəlah, guntur tikaṅ parvata;</l>
.<l n="b">tan dvekan tuməḍun sirāguliṅ anəṅkə̄ lvahnikaṅ narmadā;</l>
.<l n="c">sampunyan kasirəp kabeh, sira baṅun tambak malaṅ riṅ nadī;</l>
.<l n="d">ghūrṇaṅ matsya kabəntur* avrəg uməsat deyāṅga* saṅ bhūpati.</l>
2040 <!-- <app>(d) B kabəntar; F denaṅa. Stanza 4 becomes 5 and vice versa in y.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.40.04" n="4"><l n="a">hyunhyun taṅ bala pekayodha maṅalap matsyānikəp riṅ bañu;</l>
.<l n="b">mvaṅ tekaṅ mamariṅ, hanāməcaməcak, ramyā maṅañco maner,</l>
.<l n="c">len tekaṅ manusug, hanan paṅarakad, kīrṇāṅjalākveh ḍatəṅ,</l>
2045<l n="d">ṅkāne sornya lahātipalva pacikurnyākveh, hulamnyārivəg.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.40.05" n="5"><l n="a">kīrṇaṅ praṅpraṅ agə̄ṅ, tajinya lumarap lvir khaḍga tīkṣṇojvala;</l>
.<l n="b">ləmborādbhuta baṅkapə̄nya kasatan mvaṅ taṅ mumul sumbilaṅ</l>
.<l n="c">buntək pe vaḍukaṅ* pəsutnya malivər totok kakap mvaṅ lajar*,</l>
2050<l n="d">bandəṅ mvaṅ balanak lumumpat aṅavur* himpər javəh* riṅ tavaṅ.</l>
. <!-- <app>(c) q ṣevaḍukaṅ, y pevatukaṅ; A lajur; (d) y alivər; y javuh.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.40.06" n="6"><l n="a">ramyaṅ vvaṅ marəbut, hanāṅduk anujah mīnāgəṅ atyadbhuta,</l>
.<l n="b">len tekaṅ vinatəknya rakva katəke ṅgvan śrī supatnīnivə̄;</l>
2055<l n="c">sakvehkvehnika nora kantun atumaṅ lvir parvatānak ḍatəṅ;</l>
.<l n="d">tiṅkah saṅ mapatih suvandha karaṇanyākveh təmən lvaṅnika.</l>
.</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="40" met="jagaddhita" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.41">
2060<!--Jagaddhita: - - - | ~ ~ - | ~ - ~ | ~ ~ - | ~ ~ ~ | ~ ~ ~ | - ~ - | ~ =-->
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.41.01" n="1"><l n="a">ndan saṅ śrī parameśvarī sira haneṅ bukur i təpinikaṅ lvah uttama,</l><l n="b">guṇḍik mvaṅ paricārikekan umarək kakakakanira len uvāṅdulur;</l><l n="c">lvir kady elik i kīrṇaniṅ hikan* atumpuk i harəpira, tan sinanmata,</l><l n="d">deniṅ mās maṇi ratnasaṅgha kasatan kadi karaṅ i samīpa saṅ prabhu.</l>
. <!-- <app>(c) ABqG niṅ akan, C -ikan, y -hivak.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.41.02" n="2"><l n="a">endah lvir dviradā tatur*, hana baṅun makara caviri liṅgarūpaka;</l>
2065<l n="b">vaiḍūryāsəmu caṇḍi kahyaṅan, avarṇa kabuyutan i madhyaniṅ bañu;</l>
.<l n="c">muntab sə̄ṅ i mirahnya rakva kahiḍəp hyaṅ anala tumurun sakeṅ tavaṅ;</l>
.<l n="d">hintən vidruma kuśyarāga ya hənīnika, mavatu saghaṇṭa len paval;</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) F dviradāhatur.</app> -->
.</lg>
2070<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.41.03" n="3"><l n="a">len tekaṅ kadi ləmbu śuddha rajatanya kuməḍap anaruh divākara*;</l>
.<l n="b">sākṣāt hyaṅ parameśvarāruhur anindita maṇi kuməñar prabhāsvara;</l>
.<l n="c">lvir saṅ hyaṅ giriputrikopamani nāgapanavaṅika* pīta tan kasah;</l>
.<l n="d">kṛṣṇāgə̄ṅ kadi hastivaktra saha śaiśuka marək i bhaṭāra śaṅkara;</l>
.<!--<app> (a) AB divaṅkara, y dinakara; (c) nāga: y kāya. </app>-->
2075</lg>
