.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.41.04" n="4"><l n="a">rukmālvāmbaḍavaṅ nalāṅaladalad* pavulatanika muntab ujvala;</l>
.<l n="b">sə̄k ratnādhika bhāsvare təpi məluk kadi sisikiṅ urāgarāja ya.</l>
.<l n="c">tan ṅeh yan huniṅan gatinya kahiḍəp ḍasari vəkasikaṅ mahītala,</l>
.<l n="d">vvai mumbul kumucur sake* rəṅatikāsəmu tutukika rodra gə̄ṅ galak.</l>
2080 <!-- <app>(a) BCD -āmbadavānalā-, in E ṅ in brackets; (d) F sakeṅ.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.41.05" n="5"><l n="a">yekāṅde sukhaniṅ vvaṅ adyah i daləm, makahulu hayu saṅ nareśvarī,</l>
.<l n="b">lagy aṅgo mirah indranīla maṅalap kanaka luru baṅun sakeṅ bañu,</l>
.<l n="c">len tekaṅ kadi ciṇḍagāgaligiran kadi pisaṅ arəjoləroləran;</l>
2085<l n="d">dudvekaṅ marəbut maṇīndra gumavaṅ suməṅ i mukha baṅun vulan tiba.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.41.06" n="6"><l n="a">tan tuṅgal rva mateki polahikanaṅ vvaṅ apəniṅan amet dhaneṅ* bañu;</l>
.<l n="b">honyaṅ nohan uməntas olihika ratna paḍa paḍa suteja bhāsvara,</l>
.<l n="c">hetunyāmuni tan haneki vinarah, vədi vihikana saṅ nareśvarī,</l>
2090<l n="d">āpan rakva duvəg pakocalani kəṇḍitika karaṇaniṅ sinūkṣmakən;</l>
. <!--<app>(a) ABF dhane.</app>-->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.41.07" n="7"><l n="a">anyat taṅ vara mutyahāra kinəñəp pinilihan ika riṅ śilārəmuk,</l>
.<l n="b">mvaṅ ratnādhika rovaṅanya ya təkəktəkəkan ika mənen pabhūṣaṇa;</l>
2095<l n="c">len taṅ nīla viniṅkis arja pakasimsimanika* pinakeṣṭiniṅ hati;</l>
.<l n="d">kṛṣṇālvārəja pahyasanya kaharəpnya gavayakəna yan təkeṅ umah.</l>
. <!-- <app>(c) A makasimsima.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.41.08" n="8"><l n="a">vvantən lvir tələṅiṅ samudra mahəniṅ bañunika ri harəp nareśvara*;</l>
2100<l n="b">siṅgroṅ siṅgvan ikā śilā maṇi suteja sumarasah i duṅhusiṅ paruṅ;</l>
.<l n="c">ṅkā toṅgvānira saṅ narendradayitādyus aṅuray, atiśuddha nirmala,</l>
.<l n="d">eñjuh yan paṅusuk payodhara təkeṅ vətis inisuhan* iṅ kakāṅamər.</l>
. <!--<app>(a) A nareśvarī; (d) C inisutan.</app>-->
.</lg>
2105<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.41.09" n="9"><l n="a">maṅkin ləṅləṅ i rūmnirāṅligaligāraras apatələsan putih mirir,</l>
.<l n="b">lvir devī mahas iṅ mahāmṛta, baṅun rati* maśuci mareṅ* taladhvaja.</l>
.<l n="c">meh tan dhairya narendra rakva lumihat ri sira, harəp amuktya saṅgama,</l>
.<l n="d">sākṣāt hyaṅ tripurāntakārdha kasəkan turida ri paṅigəl maheśvarī*;</l>
. <!-- <app>(b) A rari; A mare; (d) y nareśvarī.</app> -->
2110</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.41.10" n="10"><l n="a">ndan saṅ hyaṅ gaṇa riṅ svadanta pakaśalya, karaṇanira tan pacumbana*</l>
.<l n="b">mvaṅ saṅ śrī giriputrikāṅdani kuməl paśupati tinut iṅ manah ləṅəṅ.</l>
.<l n="c">maṅkā teki manah narendra vavaṅ aṅhrəti ri* lulutire nareśvarī;</l>
.<l n="d">byaktekaṅ mavilāsa bhasmi təkap iṅ vari* babal* i pataṅhya saṅ prabhu.</l>
2115 <!--<app>(a) ACqv macumbana; (c) C aṅhrətira; (d) v vara; E1 baṇal, E2 baghal.</app>-->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.41.11" n="11"><l n="a">yekā hetunirāṅamər juga ri saṅ vvaṅ ahayu pinakesiniṅ purī,</l>
.<l n="b">lagy āmaṅkvakən iṅ jajāsəmu śilānayana jajaniran tiniṅhalan;</l>
.<l n="c">hastākveh kadi kayvan iṅ gəgər, ikaṅ maṅamər, asəmu luṅgahiṅ gaḍuṅ,</l>
2120<l n="d">marmāṅhol təṅah, aṅgaməl susu, baṅun rarasira kadi ṅūni riṅ jinəm.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.41.12" n="12"><l n="a">āpan yan vuvusən hajə̄ṅnira baṅun ləṅəṅ i valakaṅ iṅ karaṅ liman,</l>
.<l n="b">sakvehniṅ marək arja rakva kahiḍəp maməṅaməṅ i surudniṅ ampuhan.</l>
.<l n="c">saṅsiptan, ri huvusnirāhyas asalin tapih arəja ginātra riṅ tatur,</l>
2125<l n="d">mvaṅ vastrārja sugandha bhūṣaṇa huvus ḍatəṅ ika ya təkap nareśvara.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.41.13" n="13"><l n="a">buddhi śrī naranātha harṣa lumihat sira ri sukhaniraṅ nareśvarī;</l>
.<l n="b">mvaṅ strī jro pura* śuddha tan hana vikalpan umulat i sirātikādbhuta,</l>
.<l n="c">ṅhiṅ holihnika ratna kāñcana ginoṣṭhi, lavan ika bhinukti tan kuraṅ;</l>
2130<l n="d">hetu śrī naranātha mojar amanismanisira ri manis nareśvarī:</l>
. <!--<app>(b) y puri.</app>-->
.</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="41" met="śikhariṇī" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.42">
2135<!--Śikharini: ~ - - | - - - | ~ ~ ~ | ~ ~ - | - ~ ~ | ~ = -->
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.42.01" n="1">
.<l n="a">`tuhankv induṅ, saṅ lvir hyaṅi ləṅəṅ i ləṅləṅniṅ udadhi,</l>
.<l n="b">marāṅicchāṅantī jaja masəmu muṅgv iṅ karaṅ arəs;</l>
.<l n="c">masaṅhub* romāvrāhirəṅ akila* kady ātəmaha rəm;</l>
2140<l n="d">kəḍapniṅ socānraṅ taṭit umətu saṅkeṅ* śaśadhara;</l>
. <!-- <app>(c) F asaṅhub; AqF asila, By aśila; (d) CF saṅke.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.42.02" n="2">
.<l n="a">urojārjānraṅ nyū gaḍiṅ i təpiniṅ sāgara ləyəp;</l>
2145<l n="b">təṅah maryak kady aṅjahatakəna* kūṅniṅ vvaṅ umulat.</l>
.<l n="c">nda saṅsiptan, siṅgih kita, bibi, putusniṅ lituhajə̄ṅ,</l>
.<l n="d">— `ulihniṅ hyaṅ ṅuny āmutər,’ ika hiḍəpniṅ vvaṅ alaṅə̄.</l>
. <!--<app>(b) ABq kadyājahatakəna.</app>-->
.</lg>
2150<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.42.03" n="3">
.<l n="a">kapūhan tan mātrāku təkap i manahteṅ hulun, ibu,</l>
.<l n="b">ndatan gupgūpən*, tan gumirisina deniṅ tanu magə̄ṅ;</l>
.<l n="c">usānākveh devāsura gaṇa mahāyakṣa ya pəjah,</l>
.<l n="d">kavəsvəs glānan ton luṅayani kakantādbhuta lumuṅ.</l>
2155 <!-- <app>(b) F tan supsupən.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.42.04" n="4">
.<l n="a">kalīṅanyekin tan hana maḍani rūmteṅ* tribhuvana,</l>
.<l n="b">vəkasniṅ strī siddhīṅ hayu kita hiḍəpniṅ hulun, ibu!’</l>
2160<l n="c">sahur saṅ lvir hyaṅniṅ kusuman umaləs*: `ḍū, taha, kaka,</l>
.<l n="d">vidhintekī hetuṅkv i tan arəs i rūmtāmahi laṅə̄.</l>
.<!--<app> (a) A rumta ṅ, B rumta; (c) B umaləm.</app>-->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.42.05" n="5">
2165<l n="a">* ndi teki vvantən bhūpati kadi kitānindya saphala,</l>
.<l n="b">surūpānvam lvir hyaṅ smara, paśupatī śakti subhaga?’</l>
.<l n="c">ndatan varṇan tiṅkahnira silih aləm tan kaputuṅan;</l>
.<l n="d">vivakṣan śrī ləṅkeśvara sira haneṅ nūsa ri ruhur.</l>
. <!--<app>One palm leaf is missing in D, i.e. p. 109 from silih (5c) to byakta (9b).</app>-->
2170</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.42.06" n="6"><l n="a">səḍəṅ dhīrāmūjā sira, saha japā yoga dharaṇa,</l>
.<l n="b">ri saṅ hyaṅ liṅgārca pratima maṇi tejomaya lumə̄ṅ;</l>
.<l n="c">muvah sakvehniṅ rākṣasabala paḍāmurṣita kabeh,</l>
.<l n="d">apan sākṣāt jīvānugama* saparan saṅ daśamukha.</l>
2175 <!-- <app>(d) F jivanupama.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.42.07" n="7"><l n="a">saroṣāvrəg sakvehnya haruhara deniṅ bañu magə̄ṅ;</l>
.<l n="b">gəgər, lyab taṅ lvah miṇḍuhur ika təkap śry arjuna lumah,</l>
.<l n="c">gumuntur prāpteṅ* thāni vana kahavan mvaṅ təgal ayun,</l>
2180<l n="d">muvah taṅ nūsa sthāna daśamukha sampun kasaputan.</l>
. <!-- <app>(c) C prāpte.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.42.08" n="8"><l n="a">ya hetunyaṅ vvil ghūrṇita mavurahan riṅ laṅit umuṅ,</l>
.<l n="b">kinon de saṅ yakṣādhipa guməməteṅ bhūmi, parana</l>
2185<l n="c">ikaṅ saṅkan mvaṅ hetuni bañunikaṅ lvah mamalapar*,</l>
.<l n="d">apan ṅūnin tapvan hana vənaṅ amaṅpaṅ lakunira.</l>
. <!-- <app>(c) y mamalabar.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.42.09" n="9"><l n="a">inoṣṇa* mvaṅ bāyv adrəs ika təka maṅde* sira jəmur,</l>
2190<l n="b">surādi byaktārəs kuməl akətəran tan hana mulat;</l>
.<l n="c">balik taṅ vvay duṣṭānaputi sira riṅ nūsa maṅəbək*,</l>
.<l n="d">ya hetu śrī ləṅkeśvara sira musī* jə̄ṅniṅ acala.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) F inoṣṭa; Fy maṅde; (c) q paṅəbək; (d) C musir.</app> -->
.</lg>
2195</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="42" met="jagadnātha" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.43">
.<!--Jagatnātha: ~ - ~ | ~ ~ - | ~ - ~ | ~ ~ - | ~ ~ ~ | ~ ~ ~ | - ~ - | ~ ~-->
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.43.01" n="1"><l n="a">byatīta, ri huvus daśāsya maṅalih maṅusir i hujuṅiṅ vukir maṇi,</l><l n="b">ḍatəṅ sahananiṅ balāsura kinon juməjəpa mahaseṅ vanāntara,</l><l n="c">makāśya sukhaśāraṇeka humatur ri* hananiṅ agave gəṅ iṅ bañu:</l><l n="d">`saṅ arjuna sahasrabāhu pakanāma rasika ratu hehayottama.</l>
.<!--<app> (c) ABCqv humatūr i. </app>-->
2200</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.43.02" n="2"><l n="a">sumeru girirāja rakva rəbah iṅ jalanidhi saha vṛkṣa sə̄k rubuh,</l>
.<l n="b">ya topamanireṅ* lvah adbhuta sahasrabhuja malaṅ i madhyaniṅ bañu.</l>
.<l n="c">ya hetunikanaṅ vvay adbhuta maluy, bəbəṅ ika ya təkap nareśvara;</l>
.<l n="d">i sornyan atiramya mīna kasatan vəki lagi paran iṅ macaṅkrama.</l>
2205 <!-- <app>(b) Bq -nire.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.43.03" n="3"><l n="a">baṅun ləṅəṅ i ramyaniṅ pasir ateki sahanahananiṅ vvaṅ iṅ purī,</l>
.<l n="b">muvah sahana saṅ vatək ratu masomahan anuvuki tiṅkahiṅ maṅə̄,</l>
.<l n="c">paḍāsirasiran prayatna mamaṅan maṅinum ika rumakṣa saṅ prabhu,</l>
2210<l n="d">sahāstra bala kośa vāhana pənuh kadi manahiṅ amūka riṅ musuh.’</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.43.04" n="4"><l n="a">daśāsya sira gadgadeka ruməṅə̄: ’tak atakut i gatinya maṅkana,</l>
.<l n="b">parāna juga.’ liṅnirādbhutan umaṅkata maməjahane saṅ arjuna.</l>
.<l n="c">nda śīghra humatur* prahasta mara tan tut i manahikanaṅ* dasānana,</l>
2215<l n="d">pramāṇa ri suśakti saṅ ratu mahispatinagara mahāpravīra ya.</l>
. <!-- <app>(c) y sumahur; (c) F ika saṅ.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.43.05" n="5"><l n="a">`ahā prabhu daśāsya, bhoh laki, hade bapa, vuruṅakənaṅ* prayojana!</l>
.<l n="b">saṅ arjuna ṅaranya, dūran ika yan kavənaṅa təkap iṅ mahāsura;</l>
2220<l n="c">usāna riṅ usāna dhīra suyaśan turuṅ aviraṅ i madhyaniṅ raṇa,</l>
.<l n="d">apan sakala rudramūrti dadi mānuṣa kuməmit i hayvaniṅ jagat.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) q vuruṅakəna.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.43.06" n="6"><l n="a">vatək ratu mahātirodra saha vāhana bala kadi devatakrama:</l>
2225<l n="b">praśasta varaviśvabajra sinivī* magadha, sakala keśavopama;</l>
.<l n="c">avaṅgapati sūryaketu panəlahnira subhaga, savaṅ prajāpati;</l>
.<l n="d">śry avantipura candraketu, kahiḍəp hyaṅ amarapati vīra digjaya*;</l>
. <!--<app>(b) C sinivīṅ; (d) vīra digjaya: y digjayeṅ raṇa.</app>-->
.</lg>
2230<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.43.07" n="7"><l n="a">kaliṅgapati dharmaghoṣa, yamatulya sira tan avədīṅ parāṅmukha;</l>
.<l n="b">ri siṅhala narendra ghorabala, bāyusakala sira riṅ parākrama.</l>
.<l n="c">taṅeh yan ucapən kabeh sahana saṅ para ratu, kadi mṛtyu yar hiḍəp,</l>
.<l n="d">pravīrabala koṭikoṭi, para rājatanaya paḍa śakti siddhimān.</l>
.</lg>
2235</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="43" met="sragdharā" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.44">
.<!--Sragdharā: - - - | - ~ - | - ~ ~ | ~ ~ ~ | ~ - - | ~ - - | ~ - =-->
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.44.01" n="1"><l n="a">nā tojar saṅ prahastākrama; dadi sumahur saṅ daśāsyāpyak ahyā:</l><l n="b">`bhoh bhoh, ndī deva yakṣāsura vənaṅa manone mukhaṅkv ātirodra?</l><l n="c">yadyan saṅ hyaṅ trirājyāntaka lagana kunaṅ, mon ikaṅ viṣṇumūrtya*,</l><l n="d">tan byaktā niścita ṅvaṅ pəjaha*; tuvin ikā sy arjunāmatyanāku!</l>
. <!-- <app>(c) F Viṣṇumūrti; (d) F rərəha, v məjaha.</app> -->
2240</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.44.02" n="2"><l n="a">lāvan dūran juga ṅvaṅ kavənaṅa təkap iṅ śatru śūrātirodra,</l>
.<l n="b">deniṅ brahmāvarānugraha turuṅ aməpəg śaktiniṅ yoga hetu;</l>
.<l n="c">acchedyābhedya, sampun hana ri kami kabeh sthūlarūpāṅgakāra,</l>
.<l n="d">sūkṣmānindyāprameyeṅ guṇa matəmahanāneka rūpaṅku dadya.</l>
2245</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.44.03" n="3"><l n="a">təkvan tan matya deniṅ ripu sahananikaṅ vīra riṅ bhūr bhuvah svah;</l>
.<l n="b">sakvehnin deva yakṣāsura garuḍa lavan daitya bhūtāṅga nāga,</l>
.<l n="c">mvaṅ taṅ gandharva vidyādhara gaṇa, riṅ apan laṅghane pādukaṅku?</l>
.<l n="d">tovin yan mānuṣāsambhava maməjahaneki̇ṅ daśāsyātirodra!’</l>
2250</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="44" met="śārdūlavikrīḍita" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.45">
.<!--Śārdūlavikrīḍita: - - - | ~ ~ - | ~ - ~ | ~ ~ - | - - ~ | - - ~ | =-->
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.45.01" n="1"><l n="a">ṅkā rakryan mapatih prahasta mavuvus* marman praṇamye haji</l><l n="b">`dū saṅ rāvaṇa, tan haneki calaniṅ vīrālah ambək mati,</l><l n="c">tan sor deni kadibyaniṅ para mənaṅ sthīrānurāgeṅ jagat;</l><l n="d">vāhyādhyātmika rakva yogya gavayən de saṅ mahāyuddhaga.</l>
2255 <!-- <app>(a) A mahuvus.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.45.02" n="2"><l n="a">təkvan tan hana rakva vīrya kadi polahniṅ sukīrtī sarāt;</l>
.<l n="b">sə̄k riṅ svarga makādi deva maṅaləm, sakvehnikaṅ vvaṅ kabeh,</l>
.<l n="c">āstām taṅ kulavandhu varga mamuji, stry ānak putunyābuṅah;</l>
2260<l n="d">maṅkāṅ vīra matī raṇaṅgaṇa yadin śūrātidhīrottama.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.45.03" n="3"><l n="a">ṅhiṅ tekaṅ mati tan panūt ri rasaniṅ śāstrātipāpeṅ jagat,</l>
.<l n="b">nirdon teki patinya rakva kahiḍəp valyan paratrātigas;</l>
.<l n="c">yadyan jīvana, yan curibrata, hilag* boṅ ləs, matiṅgal musuh,</l>
2265<l n="d">tovin rakva manuṅkulāti macəmər, byaktāṅhəteṅ raurava.</l>
. <!--<app>(c) hilag: y tikaṅ. </app>-->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.45.04" n="4"><l n="a">saṅkṣepan*, prabhu, sojariṅ hulun ike saṅ rākṣasendrādhipa:</l>
.<l n="b">hayva vruhvruh i don mahāsura yadin tan matya deniṅ musuh.</l>
2270<l n="c">tonən saṅ garuḍeki tan mati təkap saṅ hyaṅ mahākeśava,</l>
.<l n="d">deniṅ buddhi mahāvamāna kasilib, ndah mūlaniṅ vāhana.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) q sakṣepan, F saṅkṣepa.</app> -->
.</lg>
.</div>
2275<div type="canto" rend="met" n="45" met="basantatilakā" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.46">
.<!--Vasantatilaka: - - ~ | - ~ ~ | ~ - ~ | ~ - ~ | - =-->
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.46.01" n="1"><l n="a">yekāmaṅun halihalinkviki*, saṅ daśāsya,</l><l n="b">yar gə̄ṅ prabhaṅga ri siraṅ prabhu hehayāṅśa,</l><l n="c">āpan vidagdha tuvi śakti mahāprabhāva,</l><l n="d">tan sor dahat juga təkap madhusūdaneṅ praṅ.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) F halinalinkv.</app> -->
.</lg>
2280<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.46.02" n="2"><l n="a">paṅliṅganaṅ guṇa: vənaṅ tumahə̄n ikaṅ vvay,</l>
.<l n="b">dehātikādbhuta sahasrabhuja pva hetu.</l>
.<l n="c">toh ndy āta śaktinira, yan mulateṅ* musuh sə̄k,</l>
.<l n="d"> byaktāməvəh sumək i sālvaniṅ aṣṭadeśa*.</l>
. <!--<app>(c) y mihateṅ; (d) y agradeśa.</app>-->
2285 </lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.46.03" n="3"><l n="a">ndah yogya tan ya juga, hayva mahāvamāna</l>
.<l n="b">maṅkveṅ* musuh guṇa, balanya duvəg vivakṣan!</l>
.<l n="c">yan sora, nora phalaniṅ laga yogya gə̄ṅən;</l>
.<l n="d">heman yaśanta riṅ uśāna mahəlya lajjā.</l>
2290 <!--<app>(b) y mvaṅ taṅ.
. (a) tan ya &lt; tānya
. (c) gə̄ṅən &lt; gəṅən</app>-->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.46.04" n="4"><l n="a">tovin narendra sira saṅ musuheka dibya,</l>
2295<l n="b">tan mūrkhabuddhi sira, kevala lālanāmbək,</l>
.<l n="c">siṅgih mateki sira hetuni gə̄ṅnikaṅ vvay,</l>
.<l n="d">yapvan huməntas ika niścaya satnya śobha.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.46.05" n="5"><l n="a">maṅke pva rakva rəvəkən sira patyananta!</l>
2300<l n="b">nirdoṣa rakva sira tan ya ta matya denta.</l>
.<l n="c">saṅsipta, yogya pakamitra* siraṅ* narendra,</l>
.<l n="d">paṅgil sirāvaraha riṅ laku dibya tūtən.’</l>
. <!-- <app>(c) ABC makamitra; F risaṅ.</app> -->
.</lg>
2305<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.46.06" n="6"><l n="a">nā liṅ prahasta; sumahur daśavaktrarāja:</l>
.<l n="b">`hah dhik* ta koṅ asura tuccha mahātipāpa,</l>
.<l n="c">akveh vuvusnya* juga tan rəṅən iṅ pravīra;</l>
.<l n="d">sep glis, valik kamu mareṅ* ripu yar takut ko!</l>
.<!--<app> (b) y dhik hah; (c) E2 vuvusnyu, y vuvusmu; (d) AF mare.</app>-->
2310</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.46.07" n="6"><l n="a">* he he kamuṅ bala mahāsura vīrayodha,</l>
.<l n="b">toh ndy aṅ sinādhyamu kabeh, mapa tolahanta?</l>
.<l n="c">yadyan tayeki tumutery aku, mon patiṅgal,</l>
.<l n="d">maṅgəh ṅhulun pva tan umatyanaṅ arjuneṅ praṅ.</l>
2315 <!--<app>This stanza is missing in F.</app>-->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.46.08" n="8"><l n="a">yan śakti śūra kətikaṅ* ripu viṣṇutulya,</l>
.<l n="b">akv īki rakva lavananya tumampuheṅ praṅ;</l>
.<l n="c">mon sora, mon amənaṅeṅ raṇa tan dadi jrih;</l>
2320<l n="d">ndah srəbya tākv anulareṅ* garuḍātituccha.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) śuraktikaṅ: A śurantikaṅ; F ri tikaṅ; (d) F anulare.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.46.09" n="9"><l n="a">tovin ya pakṣy adhama hīna kuraṅ prabhāva,</l>
.<l n="b">hetunya yan kadi vimāna vimānani ṅvaṅ.</l>
2325<l n="c">āścarya buddhi mami de harimūrtideva,</l>
.<l n="d">yan vany amaṅpaṅa hələm ry aku dibya riṅ rāt.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.46.10" n="10"><l n="a">ndah yan huvus pəjah ikaṅ prabhu hehayāṅśa,</l>
.<l n="b">sakvehnya bhasmya təkapiṅ hulun iṅ raṇāṅga,</l>
2330<l n="c">ṅkā tāku muṅsira mareṅ hariloka donən,</l>
.<l n="d">āpan musuh kaliliran ri gatinya maṅka.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.46.11" n="11"><l n="a">lāvan ta hetuniṅ atə̄n muburaṅ triloka,</l>
.<l n="b">hyaṅ viṣṇu rakva pinakeṣṭi sinādhya tan len;</l>
2335<l n="c">āpan hiḍəpkv atuluṅeṅ dhanarāja ṅūni,</l>
.<l n="d">riṅ svarga rakva səḍəṅ iṅvaṅ adaṇḍadaṇḍan.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.46.12" n="12"><l n="a">saṅsipta rakva paran iṅ hṛdayātiguhya:</l>
.<l n="b">ṅvaṅ matya denyan aku matyana yeṅ raṇāṅga.</l>
2340<l n="c">siddhaṅ prayojana hiḍəpku, yadin samaṅka;</l>
.<l n="d">maṅgəh makol agada* śakti lavan bhaṭāra.’</l>
. <!--<app>(d) z aguṇa.</app>-->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.46.13" n="13"><l n="a">nā liṅnirālpa sumavak ri bhaṭāra viṣṇu;</l>
2345<l n="b">krodhāpyak ahya matəmah daśavaktrarūpa,</l>
.<l n="c">krūrātiviṅśatibhujākrama sarvaśāstra;</l>
.<l n="d">cət, tan katon sira katon tutug* iṅ nabhāhyā.</l>
. <!-- <app>(d) F tuhug.</app> -->
.</lg>
2350<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.46.14" n="14"><l n="a">liṇḍuṅ mahītala, rəṅat gumivaṅ sakāmbah;</l>
.<l n="b">saṅhāra tulyani vuvusnira, rāvaṇeṅ rāt:</l>
.<l n="c">`hay hay prahasta, lihateki manahku dibya!</l>
.<l n="d">ndiṅ deva tan pəjaha deṅku yadin prasaṅga?</l>
.</lg>
2355<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.46.15" n="15"><l n="a">byaktaṅ sumeru kaləbur* pususəṅkva* bhasman,</l>
.<l n="b">mvaṅ saptasāgara ya dadyanaṅ ekasindhu.’</l>
.<l n="c">maṅkāmbəkiṅ mihat i saṅ daśavaktrarāja,</l>
.<l n="d">krūra* pravīratararākṣasa bhakty anamya.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) y kakəbur; ABCqz pususəṅku; (d) A krura ṅ, y yatna.</app> -->
2360</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.46.16" n="16"><l n="a">ṅkā bajramuṣṭi makamaṅgalaniṅ* prakopa*,</l>
.<l n="b">dhūmrākṣa durmukha suparśvaṅ anīla daṇḍa,</l>
.<l n="c">mārīca kampana sumatta si yajñagopa,</l>
.<l n="d">suptaghna saṅhati lavan praghasātirodra.</l>
2365 <!-- <app>(a) F pakamaṅgala; F prakoṣa.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.46.17" n="17"><l n="a">sakveh pravīrabala rākṣasa garjitāhyā*,</l>
.<l n="b">āścarya yan mulat i saṅ prabhu ghorarūpa;</l>
.<l n="c">hetunya yan paḍa makon ḍatəṅeṅ* musuh sə̄k.</l>
2370<l n="d">ṅhiṅ saṅ prahasta juga tan pakabuddhi maṅka.</l>
. <!--<app>(a) A garjitā ya; (c) A ḍatəṅe, y maraheṅ.</app>-->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.46.18" n="18"><l n="a">`bhoh, ndin musuhta riṅ* usāna tumaṅgəheṅ praṅ?</l>
.<l n="b">śrī bāṇaputra saha pārthivasaṅgha naṣṭa,</l>
2375<l n="c">mvaṅ saṅ dhaneśvara kakāṅgəhiran pacuṇḍaṅ,</l>
.<l n="d">de rākṣasendra putus iṅ varaśakti riṅ rāt.</l>
. <!--<app>(a) y musuh rikaṅ.</app>-->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.46.19" n="19"><l n="a">kailāsaparvata muvah ta ya hīna denta,</l>
2380<l n="b">syuh bhasmi rakva* yadi tan tuluṅən bhaṭāra;</l>
.<l n="c">śrī māruteki sira rakva təlas manuṅkul,</l>
.<l n="d">tuṅkulnirekin aliṅan kṛtadikṣitāṅga.’</l>
. <!--<app>(b) y ya pva.</app>-->
.</lg>
2385</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="46" met="kilayu manəḍəṅ" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.47">
.<!--Kilayu manədəṅ: - - ~ | ~ ~ ~ | ~ ~ - | ~ - ~ | ~ ~ - | ~ ~ ~ | ~ ~ ~ | =-->
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.47.01" n="1"><l n="a">ahyā daśamukhan atigarjite* pamujiniṅ* bala paḍa suməgut,</l><l n="b">maṅkin guragaḍa kadi kālarudra* maharəp mamaṅana bhuvana.</l><l n="c">rəp, riṅ kṣaṇa vavaṅ atisaumya śobhita sahāstra muśala ginəgə̄,</l><l n="d">ṅkāne ruhur i valakaṅiṅ vimāna sira śīghran umibər i tavaṅ.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) A paḍa garjite, C hatigarjite papuji; (b) y Kālarūpa.</app> -->
2390</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.47.02" n="2"><l n="a">ghoraṅ gaja kuda ratha* sevu lakṣa maṅiriṅ; kṣititala gumətər,</l>
.<l n="b">gunturṅ acala, rəṅat ikaṅ sumeru kahiriṅ tribhuvana gumivaṅ,</l>
.<l n="c">dhvas taṅ kayukayu paḍa bhasmibhūta, vatu śīrṇa kaparah arəmuk;</l>
.<l n="d">lvir megha mamaḍəmi sənə̄ hyaṅ arka lakuniṅ bala gaganacara.</l>
2395 <!-- <app>(a) Ay ratha kuda.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.47.03" n="3"><l n="a">byātīta ri gatinira saṅ daśānana; mahispatibala caritan,</l>
.<l n="b">sampun vruh i ḍatəṅani* saṅ mahāsura dumona tuməkana haji;</l>
.<l n="c">paṅliṅgana: ṅ asurabaleki* kīrṇaṅ anilib* titir aṅiṅətakən,</l>
2400<l n="d">strīrūpa hana jalu vaneh haneki matəmah yati vara kamatan.</l>
.<!--<app> (b) A ḍatəṅ i; (c) A paṅliṅga asura-; y manilib.</app>-->
.</lg>
. <lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.47.04" n="4"><l n="a">* yatnaṅ para ratu paḍa gadgadekin umuvah balagaṇa sahana,</l>
.<l n="b">rakryan patih ika pinakādi, nāgata pataṅhya narapati sira,</l>
2405<l n="c">deniṅ ripu niyata təkāṅhalaṅhalaṅi* polahiṅ aṅapi laṅə̄.</l>
.<l n="d">ndah yeka karaṇanira śīghra yan mapagakən daśamukha rəvəkən.</l>
. <!--<app>This stanza is missing in y.
. (c) AE təkāṅalāṅalaṅi.</app>-->
.</lg>
2410<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.47.05" n="5"><l n="a">sampun ləpasika katəkeṅ təgal pravaga, bhūmi samara katəmu;</l>
.<l n="b">ṅkā tākuvukuvu sira saṅ vatək ratu, saha dhvaja kalaha* humuṅ.</l>
.<l n="c">śrī māgadhapati pakamaṅgalādhipatiniṅ para nṛpati ḍatəṅ,</l>
.<l n="d">muṅgv iṅ ratha kanaka, baṅun hyaṅ arka sumənə̄ buṅahi mukhanira;</l>
. <!--<app>(b) F kalala, y kahala.</app>-->
2415</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.47.06" n="6"><l n="a">gāṇḍeva ri kiva, śara bhāsvareki təṅən, titir inayatakən,</l>
.<l n="b">— ndiṅ rākṣasa vənaṅ amuke pamuknira məneṅ raṇa, niyata gəsəṅ;</l>
.<l n="c">lakṣevu balanira, suraknya ghūrṇita mahārṇavasama* karəṅə̄,</l>
.<l n="d">huṅniṅ gaja ratha kudaṅ oṣṭra, śaṅkha tinulup, bhuvana* haliliṅən.</l>
2420 <!--<app>(c) F maṅarṇava; (d) F kuvana.
. (a) unmetrical. 1 syllable missing</app>-->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.47.07" n="7"><l n="a">śry āvaṅgapati hana ri rəṅganiṅ ratha, sabhūṣaṇanira kuməñar;</l>
.<l n="b">śvetāmbaranira kinənan tulis kanaka parvacarita kinəñəp;</l>
2425<l n="c">cakrāṅəpər i taṅanireki dīpta, kahiḍəp vulan anuluhi rāt;</l>
.<l n="d">kīrṇaṅ curiga bala sahāstra, vintaṅ upamanyan aṅibəki tavaṅ.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.47.08" n="8"><l n="a">śry āvantipura muśala sañjatāgra rinəgəpnira suməṅ i jaja,</l>
.<l n="b">muṅgv iṅ ratha maṅadəg, anindya bhāsvara tutup gəluṅiran umurub</l>
2430<l n="c">sə̄k taṅ bala paḍa kavəṅan tumiṅhal i sabhūṣaṇanira* dumilah,</l>
.<l n="d">kady aṅgəsəṅana muburaṅ jagat lakuniran paśupati sakala.</l>
. <!-- <app>(c) C subhūṣaṇa.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.47.09" n="9"><l n="a">ndan śrī narapati ri kaliṅga dibya hana riṅ ratha maṇi lumarap*,</l>
2435<l n="b">catra rva suməkar aputih baṅun katurunan śaśadhara mapalih*;</l>
.<l n="c">raktadhvajanira kuməlab lumə̄ṅ kadi kilat, saha gəlap anitir,</l>
.<l n="d">deniṅ balagaṇa paḍa ghūrṇitākrak alapāgya* mamuka riṅ ayun.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) y lumurug; (b) F maṅalih; (d) A amapagya.</app> -->
.</lg>
2440<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.47.10" n="10"><l n="a">śrī siṅhala balapati* koṭilakṣa gumuruh miriṅ i lakunira,</l>
.<l n="b">ṅkāneṅ gajapati sira kādbhutāmutər i daṇḍanira kavigaran;</l>
.<l n="c">krūrāṅgətəm asəmu təkāmukāsva juga yan daśamukha ḍatəṅa;</l>
.<l n="d">prodbhūta salakunira tan haneka karəs* iṅ hatin inaṅənaṅən.</l>
. <!--<app>(a) balapati; y patibala; (d) A harəs.</app>-->
2445</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.47.11" n="11"><l n="a">tan ṅeh yan ucapakəna saṅ vatək ratu; muvah para nṛpatisuta:</l>
.<l n="b">sodhātmaja magadhasuteki kardhasuta siṅhalapatitanaya,</l>
.<l n="c">mvaṅ śaiśuka subala kaliṅgaputra, paḍa vīra suyaśa malaga,</l>
.<l n="d">mātus dulurira paḍa rājaputra səḍəṅ iṅ guṇa tan imaniman.</l>
2450</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="47" met="śārdūlavikrīḍita" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.48">
.<!--Śārdūlavikrīḍita: - - - | ~ ~ - | ~ - ~ | ~ ~ - | - - ~ | - - ~ | =-->
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.48.01" n="1"><l n="a">ṅkā rakryan mapatih suvandha pinakāgraprāṇaniṅ sañjata,</l><l n="b">sākṣāt śry arjuna muṅgu riṅ* ratha maṇīndrātyanta riṅ śobhita;</l><l n="c">sə̄k garvaṅ bala sevulakṣa maṅiriṅ kapvāsusun ghūrṇita.</l><l n="d">ndah sampun mapagəh. daśāsya vuvusən, mārgāmbarāglis ḍatəṅ.</l>
2455 <!-- <app>(b) y muṅguh iṅ.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.48.02" n="2"><l n="a">kaṅgək* taṅ bala rākṣasāsurak avū deniṅ musuh kādbhuta,</l>
.<l n="b">sākṣāt parvata sevu rakva kahiḍəp sakveh vatək pārthiva,</l>
.<l n="c">lvir guntur sumarambah iṅ raṇa balanyāṅde təgəgniṅ manah;</l>
2460<l n="d">maṅkāmbək prabhu hehayāṅśa lumihat kvehniṅ musuh rākṣasa.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) y kagyat.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.48.03" n="3"><l n="a">ndan saṅ rāvaṇa ghora yākuliliṅan muṅgv iṅ vimānākila*,</l>
.<l n="b">harṣan ton ri gəṅiṅ musuh: `riṅ apa yan tan bhasmya!’ liṅ rāsika.</l>
2465<l n="c">ṅkā rakryan mapatih cumuṇḍuk irika mvaṅ vīrayodhādhika;</l>
.<l n="d">āścaryaṅ* daśavaktra denya kahiḍəp śrī hehayāṅśaprabhu,</l>
. <!--<app>(a) F vimanānila; (d) C āscarya ṅ, others: āscaryā.</app>-->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.48.04" n="4"><l n="a">deniṅ bhūṣaṇa sarvabhūṣa* paṅasih saṅ śrī narendrādhipa,</l>
2470<l n="b">riṅ rūpādhika, riṅ guṇeki juga tan sor ardha de saṅ prabhu.</l>
.<l n="c">nāhan hetunireki rakva mavuvus gə̄ṅ māna, bhinnāṅkəna,</l>
.<l n="d">garvāmbək paṭu* nirbhayāṅamahamah lvīr antakāṅiṇḍarat:</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) y sarva: rāja; F bhūṣaṇa; (d) Ay paḍu, C paṭa, F paḍa.</app> -->
.</lg>
2475<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.48.05" n="5"><l n="a">`ai koṅ arjunarāja, rājanikanaṅ sāmantarājādhipa,</l>
.<l n="b">lvāmbək teki vəkasmu rakva lumihat riṅ candrasūryakrama.</l>
.<l n="c">bhoh, pembuh śatakoṭilakṣa ratu len devāśrayantoṅsirən,</l>
.<l n="d">maṅgəh tan surudāku matyana ri ko, koṅ mānuṣātyādhama*.</l>
. <!-- <app>(d) ACqv mānuṣatvādhama.</app> -->
2480</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.48.06" n="6"><l n="a">saṅsiptan, laku yuh nihan, bapa, panəmbah ṅke ri jə̄ṅniṅ hulun!</l>
.<l n="b">sakvehkvehmu narendra hayva jaga tan bhaktīṅ* mahārāvaṇa;</l>
.<l n="c">mvaṅ strīratna suputrikādi vavanən paṅhəlya jīva prihən.</l>
.<l n="d">yan tan maṅkana, hah harah, papagakən śaktiṅku tan popama!’</l>
2485 <!-- <app>(b) F bhaktī.</app> -->
.</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="48" met="basantatilakā" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.49">
.<!--Vasantatilaka: - - ~ | - ~ ~ | ~ - ~ | ~ - ~ | - = -->
2490<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.49.01" n="1"><l n="a">nojar daśāsya; sumahur* saṅ anindyamantrī,</l><l n="b">śūrātidhīra juga tan hana rəsniṅ ambək:</l><l n="c">`ai rākṣasendra, huniṅan da təkapku mojar!</l><l n="d">tan śry arjunāku, tuvi tan vəka vandhuvarga.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) A sumavur.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.49.02" n="2"><l n="a">mantrī viśeṣa pakanaryamaniṅ sarājya</l>
.<l n="b">parnahku deny aji mahāprabhu bhūmipāla*;</l>
2495<l n="c">mvaṅ donku yar mapagakən ri təkanta maṅke,</l>
.<l n="d">dhairyāpti rakva mihateṅ* daśavaktrarūpa.</l>
. <!-- <app>(b) y parnahku de nira saṅ Arjuna bhūmipāla; (d) F mihate.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.49.03" n="3"><l n="a">lāvan muvah karaṇaniṅ təka tan dadi jrih,</l>
2500<l n="b">hamham ruməṅvakən i donta mahātiduhkha,</l>
.<l n="c">deniṅ vvay adbhuta bəbəṅ təka riṅ vanādri,</l>
.<l n="d">hetunta yan harəp amuṅva* ri saṅ narendra.</l>
. <!-- <app>(d) F karəpa muṅvi.</app> -->
.</lg>
2505<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.49.04" n="4"><l n="a">ndā hayva maṅkana təkap prabhu rāvaṇāmbək*,</l>
.<l n="b">krūrāptya maṅhalaṅaneṅ avilāsa ramya.</l>
.<l n="c">yapvan sake* gəṅiṅ apakṣa makīrtya riṅ praṅ,</l>
.<l n="d">mah praṅ! ṅhulun pəjahi yan kamu vīra rodra.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) y Rāvaṇe rat; (c) BFz sakeṅ.</app> -->
2510</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.49.05" n="5"><l n="a">kīrṇaṅ vatək ratu kabeh paḍa śūra dhīra,</l>
.<l n="b">dūran harəpharəpa mātra manuṅkuleṅ praṅ.</l>
.<l n="c">saṅsipta, bhoh, ləpasakən tikaṅ astra dibya,</l>
.<l n="d">brahmāstra konta hala len gada cakra bajra.’</l>
2515</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="49" met="indrabajra" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.50">
.<!--Indravajra: - - ~ | - - ~ | ~ - ~ | - =-->
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.50.01" n="1">
2520<l n="a">liṅ saṅ sumantrī paramātidhīra;</l>
.<l n="b">sakrodha saṅ rāvaṇa kādbhutojar:</l>
.<l n="c">`dhik hah ta koṅ vīrabalātituccha,</l>
.<l n="d">āḍācəmər, lvir tuhu vāni garva.</l>
.</lg>
2525<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.50.02" n="2"><l n="a">ndīkaṅ mahāvīra viśeṣayodha,</l>
.<l n="b">mvaṅ taṅ mahāpārthiva devarāja,</l>
.<l n="c">donyan tuməṅhery aku riṅ raṇāṅga?</l>
.<l n="d">yāvatnya tāvat niyatanya bhasmya.</l>
.</lg>
2530<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.50.03" n="3"><l n="a">ko pvātipāpādhama vīra tiryak,</l>
.<l n="b">dūran vənaṅ jīvanaṅ aṅga pūrṇa.</l>
.<l n="c">prit trik masove pəjahanya durga,</l>
.<l n="d">ndah sopadin patyamu deṅku maṅke.</l>
.</lg>
2535<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.50.04" n="4"><l n="a">hīṅanya vandhyāku tumarjanā ko,</l>
.<l n="b">tan sāphalāñampuri sañjatāgra.</l>
.<l n="c">ṅhiṅ sy arjunāntin* lavanaṅku dibya,</l>
.<l n="d">nā* pekavadvāṅku lavanmu tan len.’</l>
. <!--<app>(c) q -āntən; (d) Aq naṅ.</app>-->
2540</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.50.05" n="5"><l n="a">nojarniraṅ rāvaṇa, śīghra luṅha</l>
.<l n="b">muṅsir giri sthānanireka ṅūni;</l>
.<l n="c">sampun kinon taṅ bala vīrayodha</l>
.<l n="d">kapvāmukekaṅ bala hehayāṅśa.</l>
2545</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.50.06" n="6"><l n="a">ghorāsikəp* taṅ vvil aneka rodra,</l>
.<l n="b">tan dvācucuk mvaṅ bala hehayāṅśa;</l>
.<l n="c">mevvivvaṅ* aśva dvipa len turaṅga,</l>
.<l n="d">guntur lavan sāgara topamānya.</l>
2550 <!--<app>(a) A -āṅsikəp; (c) </app>-->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.50.07" n="7"><l n="a">lumrāṅəbək riṅ raṇabhūmimadhya</l>
.<l n="b">yakṣādhipa mvaṅ para rājasaṅgha;</l>
.<l n="c">taṅkəpnikī tulya mahāprakampa,</l>
2555<l n="d">goṅ bheri ginval kahalātri ghūrṇa.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.50.08" n="8"><l n="a">krodhaṅ* vatək hehaya śīghra maṅsə̄,</l>
.<l n="b">dukduk panah gaṇḍi vataṅ prakīrṇa,</l>
.<l n="c">len taṅ tuhuk tomara candrahāsa,</l>
2560<l n="d">cakrāyudha mvaṅ hala sañjatanya.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) q koddha.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.50.09" n="9"><l n="a">bhraṣṭaṅ vatək rāvaṇa durbalāhya;</l>
.<l n="b">krodhaṅ vvil atyadbhuta vīra rodra,</l>
2565<l n="c">mohāṅəmah khaḍga mahāstra dīpta,</l>
.<l n="d">len* taṅ gadā cakra ya tenələ̄nya.</l>
. <!-- <app>(d) y mvaṅ.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.50.10" n="10"><l n="a">sə̄k taṅ mahāsañjata bhasmi denya,</l>
2570<l n="b">nāgendra śārāgni śilādri cūrṇa.</l>
.<l n="c">nā hetuniṅ hehayavīra mavrəg,</l>
.<l n="d">kagyat vinuk* durbala naṣṭa māgap*.</l>
. <!--<app>(d) y dinuk; F mapag.</app>-->
.</lg>
2575<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.50.11" n="11"><l n="a">vvantən mahāvīra ri hehayāṅśa</l>
.<l n="b">tan* jrih təkapniṅ ripu kālatulya;</l>
.<l n="c">yekan təḍun saṅka rikaṅ rathādrəs*,</l>
.<l n="d">prəp, təṇḍasiṅ rākṣasa tan dva bəntar.</l>
. <!--<app>(b) ACqv tar; (c) C -ādras. </app>-->
2580</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.50.12" n="12"><l n="a">maṅkin tikaṅ praṅ, paḍa śūra dhīra;</l>
.<l n="b">len taṅ silih duk paḍa śaktimānta,</l>
.<l n="c">mvaṅ taṅ silih kaṇḍaga timbul alvat,</l>
.<l n="d">dudvaṅ paḍāmvah taravaṅ ḍaḍanya.</l>
2585</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.50.13" n="13"><l n="a">yekāpagut tan hana sor iṅ ambək,</l>
.<l n="b">astranya sampun makularkalīran;</l>
.<l n="c">glānan yayan dhīra silih ḍuḍat tvas,</l>
.<l n="d">rotāṅḍuḍuk hampru paḍāñavuk rah.</l>
2590</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.50.14" n="14"><l n="a">honyaṅ mahāvīra madaṇḍadaṇḍan,</l>
.<l n="b">guntur marāṅ adri təpin katəmbuṅ*;</l>
.<l n="c">len taṅ silih tomara riṅ gajendra,</l>
.<l n="d">len taṅ silih betala* riṅ kudoṣṭra.</l>
2595 <!-- <app>(b) Aq katambuṅ; (d) y rotala.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.50.15" n="15"><l n="a">kīrṇaṅ mahāvīra macāpacāpan,</l>
.<l n="b">yakṣāmanah bāṇa sahasralakṣa,</l>
.<l n="c">hrū saṅ vatək pārthiva koṭilakṣa,</l>
2600<l n="d">cəb cəb, tumañcəb maṅəne musuh sə̄k.</l>
.</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="50" met="sragdharā" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.51">
.<!--Sragdharā: - - - | - ~ - | - ~ ~ | ~ ~ ~ | ~ - - | ~ - - | ~ - =-->
2605<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.51.01" n="1"><l n="a">tatkālaṅ vīrasenāpraṅ apagut asuve, lvaṅnikāmarvatākveh;</l><l n="b">yekāvrəg durbalaṅ hehayabala katəḍun riṅ gətih sindhutulya;</l><l n="c">puh tan vriṅ de təkapniṅ karaṅ iṣu masusun bajra cakran tinūtnya,</l><l n="d">tovin pinrih* təkapniṅ vvil agulagul amuk riṅ mahādaṇḍa konta.</l>
. <!-- <app>(d) C pindrih.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.51.02" n="2"><l n="a">ghoraṅ yakṣeṅ laṅit ghūrṇita, garuḍa sahasrādbhutā sadṛśanya,</l>
.<l n="b">tan dvānambut musuh rvā təlu pitu vinaveṅ ambaraṅ śatru śakti;</l>
2610<l n="c">akveh bhāvanyan anyat: hana kadi mamunuh sūkara śvāna* tulya,</l>
.<l n="d">dudvaṅ kady āmunuh minda hariṇa gavaya mvaṅ krəvag carva donya.</l>
. <!-- <app>(c) q kvana.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.51.03" n="3"><l n="a">kīrṇekaṅ hehayāṅśaprabhu pinukapukaṅ denikaṅ yakṣa rodra;</l>
2615<l n="b">yekāṅde vrinvriniṅ pārthivabala malayū mvaṅ vatək rājaputra.</l>
.<l n="c">ṅkā saṅ śrī māgadhendrāṅgəgər anihaṅakən* sarvabāṇeṅ rathāṅga,</l>
.<l n="d">mvaṅ tekaṅ bajra saṅke panahiran umijil ghūrṇitaṅ śatru kagyat.</l>
. <!--<app>(c) ABCqv aniyaṅakəṅ.</app>-->
.</lg>
2620<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.51.04" n="4"><l n="a">syuh bhraṣṭaṅ rākṣasa, lvir javəh ika* tumibeṅ* bhūmi deniṅ varāstra;</l>
.<l n="b">təṇḍas məlṭok təkapniṅ gəlap ika maṅañaṅ saṅka riṅ megha-bāṇa;</l>
.<l n="c">kagyat taṅ rākṣasāvū, kabarasat ikanaṅ vvil haneṅ byoma luṅhā,</l>
.<l n="d">prāpteṅ svargālayū pūh tinut ika pinupuh denikāṅ indrabajra.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) Fy javuh; q tumibā, E2 tumibaṅ.</app> -->
2625</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.51.05" n="5"><l n="a">lāvan sakveh vatək pārthiva paḍa tumitih mvaṅ vatək rājaputra,</l>
.<l n="b">biṅkas rvaṅkoṭilakṣāṅ asurabala dahut pinrih iṅ bajra konta*.</l>
.<l n="c">ṅkan maṅsə̄ taṅ mahārāvaṇabala gumuruh ghora śabdanya mahyā,</l>
.<l n="d">len taṅ muṅgv iṅ ratha syandana mapahidəṅan mvaṅ pravīrasaṅgha.</l>
2630 <!--<app>(b) y cakra.
. (d) unmetrical: pravīrasaṅgha, one long missing.</app>-->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.51.06" n="6"><l n="a">prodbhūtaṅ praṅ, baṅun syūhaṅ acala kapupuh denikaṅ vīra rodra,</l>
.<l n="b">rug bhraṣṭaṅ vṛkṣa, kagyat kənasika, malayū moṅnya len siṅha barvaṅ.</l>
2635<l n="c">ṅkā maṅsə̄ saṅ supārśvātut i təpinikanaṅ parvata mvaṅ balanya,</l>
.<l n="d">lāvan saṅ bajramuṣṭy āgajahika* kaparah ṅgvāniran māgadhendra.</l>
. <!--<app>(d) Cqv āgaja.</app>-->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.51.07" n="7"><l n="a">dhīrāmbək saṅ narendrādbhuta mamanahakən hrū sahasrāprameya;</l>
2640<l n="b">dhvas tekaṅ rākṣasālah rəbah ika katəvək* riṅ juraṅ durgamājro.</l>
.<l n="c">krodhākrak* saṅ supārśvāpulih amava gadāmuk vatək hehayāṅśa;</l>
.<l n="d">ṅkan muṅgah riṅ rathāṅgānavat i mukhaniraṅ bhūpatī, tan kadaṇḍa;</l>
. <!--<app>(b) y kavatək; (c) y krodhāmbək.</app>-->
.</lg>
2645<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.51.08" n="8"><l n="a">siṅlar, dhīrāṅdədəl pyah narapati, katibaṅ* rākṣaseṅ bhūmi maṅlah;</l>
.<l n="b">yekan pinrih tinūt riṅ kṣititala, tinujah māti de saṅ narendra.</l>
.<l n="c">krūrekaṅ bajramuṣṭy ābutəṅ aṅayatakən cakra riṅ śrī narendra;</l>
.<l n="d">saṅ sodhan ton ləpasnyan pinanahira, tikəl syūh rəmuk* tan təkeṅ don.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) Aq katibā, y tumibeṅ; (d) A pamuk.</app> -->
2650</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.51.09" n="9"><l n="a">nā hetunyaṅ mahārākṣasa tumudiṅ i saṅ śrī narānāthaputra,</l>
.<l n="b">dhairya krodhātiśīghrāṅdəmakakən i gajahnyan ri saṅ vīrasodha*;</l>
.<l n="c">rəmpak syūh taṅ ratha, ndah nṛpasuta tuməḍun riṅ ləmah dhīra maṅsə̄;</l>
.<l n="d">trus tvasniṅ* rākṣasa glāna pəjah i pamanah śrī narānāthaputra*.</l>
2655 <!-- <app>(b) By vīra yodha; (d) y trus pyah; F narendrasuteṅ praṅ.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.51.10" n="10"><l n="a">ṅhiṅ tekaṅ hasti mattāgalak aburu ri saṅ vīrasodhātivega*;</l>
.<l n="b">saṅ sodhātyadbhutāmraṅ* tulalay ika tugəl, rahnikādrəs manəmbur;</l>
.<l n="c">maṅkin krodhāṅusī* saṅ nṛpasuta, muyəṅ iṅ vitnikaṅ vāṇḍirāgə̄ṅ;</l>
2660<l n="d">ṅkā saṅ śrī viśvabajrāmupuh i cəṅəlikaṅ sāmaja glāna līna.</l>
. <!--<app>(a) y vīra yodhā-; (b) A -āpraṅ; (c) BEz aṅusir.</app>-->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.51.11" n="11"><l n="a">varṇan śry āvaṅgarājādhipa sira malage tīraniṅ narmadālva,</l>
.<l n="b">lāvan śry āvantināthāparimitan inasə̄ denikaṅ rākṣasākrak;</l>
2665<l n="c">mevvivvaṅ vvil humuṅ riṅ vihat* aruharuhan, parvatāgə̄ṅ inuṇḍa;</l>
.<l n="d">dhvas tekaṅ śatru meṅas girimisən alayun ton ri yātyadbhuteṅ rāt.</l>
. <!--<app>(c) y laṅit.</app>-->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.51.12" n="12"><l n="a">ndā tan dvaṅ hrū śatākoṭi luməpas ika de saṅ rva moghātirodra,</l>
2670<l n="b">yekānyuh parvatāstrārəmuk i taṅanikaṅ rākṣasāheva mona;</l>
.<l n="c">len tekaṅ yakṣa muṅgv iṅ kṣiti sama katiban denikāṅ adri cūrṇa,</l>
.<l n="d">akveh jeṅkel pəñət syuh śirahika təkapiṅ hīrapātānuvarta.</l>
. <!--<app>(c) denikāṅ &lt; denikaṅ</app>-->
.</lg>
2675</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="51" met="śārdūlavikrīḍita" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.52">
.<!--Śardūlavikrīḍita: - - - | ~ ~ - | ~ - ~ | ~ ~ - | - - ~ | - - ~ | = -->
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.52.01" n="1"><l n="a">maṅkin ghūrṇita tekanaṅ vvil alayū; krodhaṅ mahārākṣasa,</l><l n="b">sə̄k sarvāstra sakeṅ panahnya kalavan saṅkeṅ gadā bhīṣaṇa;</l><l n="c">maṅgəh śrī nṛpa sūryaketu maṅayat hrū bāyubajrāmapag;</l><l n="d">dhvas tekaṅ śarasaṅgha kabvaṅ umare jroniṅ mahāsāgara.</l>
.</lg>
2680<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.52.02" n="2"><l n="a">krūrekaṅ danuja sy akampana sudhīrāmrih mamuk riṅ raṇa,</l>
.<l n="b">śry āvantiprabhu riṅ rathāṅgaṅ usirən, yatnāṅduk iṅ tomara;</l>
.<l n="c">gək ghər*, təmpuhike* jajanya kavalik tuṅgəṅ tibeṅ bhūtala;</l>
.<l n="d">dhīrātaṅhi ya, tan dva māti pinanah de śrī narendrādhipa.</l>
. <!--<app>(c) C gəntər; A tampuh.
2685 (c) tuṅgəṅ &lt; tuṅgə̄ṅ.</app>-->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.52.03" n="3"><l n="a">dhūmrākṣābutəṅ ahya ghora tuməḍun saṅkeṅ* gajendran masə̄,</l>
.<l n="b">daṇḍāgə̄n pinutərnya, yeka ruməmuk sakveh vatək hehaya*.</l>
.<l n="c">ṅkā rakryan mapatih suvandha maṅabən riṅ cakra saṅkeṅ* ratha,</l>
2690<l n="d">rug taṅ rākṣasa koṭilakṣa ri pəjah dhūmrākṣa vīrottama.</l>
. <!--<app>(a) F saṅke; (b) A parthiva; (c) F saṅke.</app>-->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.52.04" n="4"><l n="a">lāvan saṅ praghasātirodra ya pəjah de sūryaketv adbhuta;</l>
.<l n="b">mārīceki pəjah kaliṅgapati saṅ vīrāṅduk iṅ lāṅgala*;</l>
2695<l n="c">saṅ śrī bhūpati siṅhalendra mamatī suptaghna mattānala*;</l>
.<l n="d">hetunyaṅ bala rākṣasāvri malayū* muṅsir siraṅ rāvaṇa.</l>
. <!-- <app>(b) Cv saṅgala, y tomara; (c) F Mātā-; (d) y rākṣasāmrih alayu.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.52.05" n="5"><l n="a">tan varṇan ri gatinya teki; caritan sakveh vatək hehaya,</l>
2700<l n="b">ṅkāraryan sira ri vvitiṅ* taru latā ramyātituṣṭaṅ manah;</l>
.<l n="c">bheda mvaṅ bala rākṣasosah* aṅəsah deniṅ musuh śaktimān,</l>
.<l n="d">— gandharvādhipa devaśakti kahiḍəp sor iṅ mahākādbhuta.</l>
. <!--<app>(b) AF riṅ vit; (c) F rākṣasāsah.</app>-->
.</lg>
2705<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.52.06" n="6"><l n="a">yekā hetuni saṅ daśāsya lumurug prāpteṅ təgal papraṅan,</l>
.<l n="b">mvaṅ sakveh balavīraśeṣa maṅiriṅ, kapvāṅrəgəp sañjata;</l>
.<l n="c">rakryan saṅ mapatih prahasta ri harəp muṅgv iṅ gajānindita;</l>
.<l n="d">ndā* yekan pinapag riṅ astra pinanah de saṅ vatək hehaya.</l>
. <!-- <app>(d) F ndān.</app> -->
2710</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.52.07" n="7"><l n="a">prodbhūtaṅ bala rākṣasākrak umasə̄ sākṣāt gəlap rvaṅyuta,</l>
.<l n="b">kapvāṅduk mamukul* sakeṅ avaṅavaṅ, dhvas taṅ mahākṣatriya;</l>
.<l n="c">saṅ sodhālara, śaiśukāgra kadəmak, rəmpak rathanyan rihək,</l>
.<l n="d">de rakryan mapatih prahasta maṅidək krūrānujah riṅ liman;</l>
2715 <!-- <app>(b) y maṅamuk.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.52.08" n="8"><l n="a">mātus taṅ kapəñət, vaneh tinulalay, glānaṅ vatək hehaya,</l>
.<l n="b">akveh bhūpati māti vīra ya dinuk de saṅ sumantry āsura.</l>
.<l n="c">tandaṅ saṅ prabhu viśvabajra mamupuh təṇḍas prahasteṅ* liman,</l>
2720<l n="d">pakṣāmiṅrvana, saṅ daśāsya mamanah, syuh taṅ gadā bhīṣaṇa.</l>
. <!-- <app>(c) BF Prahaste.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.52.09" n="9"><l n="a">sondur saṅ prabhu, saṅ prahasta kapəṅəl, ramyaṅ praṅ atyadbhuta*.</l>
.<l n="b">ṅhiṅ saṅ rāvaṇa vīra rodra hinirup* de saṅ vatək pārthiva;</l>
2725<l n="c">krūrākāra haneṅ rathāṅga maṅagəm konta pradīptojvala,</l>
.<l n="d">morṇānūpura* bhūṣaṇābhran umurub sākṣāt gunuṅ pāvaka;</l>
. <!--<app>(a) C adyadbhuta; (b) y ṅ inirup; (d) A morṇaṅnupura, q morṇanumura.</app>-->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.52.10" n="10"><l n="a">līlā tan hana rəsnireka rinəbut de saṅ vatək hehaya.</l>
2730<l n="b">sāmantaprabhu vīrayodhan umasə̄ muṅgv iṅ gaja mvaṅ ratha;</l>
.<l n="c">sə̄k tekaṅ mamanah, manūla, maṅarug riṅ bajra cakrāyudha,</l>
.<l n="d">ndātan pamyati riṅ daśāsya, kavaluy sakvehnikaṅ sañjata.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.52.11" n="11"><l n="a">nāgendrādbhuta pakṣirāja luməpas mvaṅ taṅ śarāgny ojvala,</l>
2735<l n="b">len tekaṅ kadi sāgarāṅavaṅavaṅ mvaṅ bāyubajrāṅasut;</l>
.<l n="c">lvir guntur maṅalih parəṅ* sahananiṅ sarvāstra tejomaya,</l>
.<l n="d">brahmāstrā divabāṇa bāṇa, karuhun taṅ rudrabāṇottama.</l>
. <!--<app>(c) A ḍatəṅ.</app>-->
.</lg>
2740<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.52.12" n="12"><l n="a">gək ghor, ghūrṇita bhasmibhūta tumame sthūlāṅga saṅ rāvaṇa,</l>
.<l n="b">sumyuk lvir javəhiṅ* kasapta* tumibeṅ vuṅkal, vināśaṅ śara;</l>
.<l n="c">rəmpak syandana saṅ daśāsya pinanah de sūryaketuprabhu,</l>
.<l n="d">mvaṅ tekaṅ turagāṅrəpālara, tinūt saṅ rāvaṇāhyāḍarat*.</l>
. <!-- <app>(b) Fy javuh; y kasaṅa; (d) F ahyāḍara.</app> -->
2745</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.52.13" n="13"><l n="a">ndā tan dvan pamupuh* vatək ratu, hilaṅ sakveh vatək hehaya,</l>
.<l n="b">lvaṅnyātumpuk, aneka rāja marəmuk* mvaṅ pekayodhan pəjah.</l>
.<l n="c">yatna śrī nṛpa viśvabajra mamanah riṅ pañcaśūlādbhuta,</l>
.<l n="d">syuh tekaṅ gada, saṅ daśāsya maṅamuk, mavrəg vatək pārthiva.</l>
2750 <!-- <app>(a) C papupuh; (b) y ya rəmuk.</app> -->
.</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="52" met="śikhariṇī" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.53">
.<!--Śikharinī: ~ - - | - - - | ~ ~ ~ | ~ ~ - | - ~ ~ | ~ =-->
2755<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.53.01" n="1">
.<l n="a">ya hetu śry āvaṅgādhipa sira lavan māgadhapati,</l>
.<l n="b">muvah saṅ sodhāmrih riṅ iṣu paramānindya luməpas;</l>
.<l n="c">nda tan kevran saṅ rāvaṇa manikəp aṅlvāṅi mamapas,</l>
.<l n="d">sudhīrāmrəp, tan jrih rinəbut, amupuh sarvaniśita.</l>
2760</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.53.02" n="2">
.<l n="a">prayatnāmbək śry āvantipura masikəp tomara murub,</l>
.<l n="b">vavaṅ duk pyah saṅ rāvaṇa, kasidəkuṅ tuṅgəṅ atəguh;</l>
.<l n="c">kaliṅgāṅlud mvaṅ siṅhala sira muvah dhīra mamupuh,</l>
2765<l n="d">kasambut kānan keri kalihika de saṅ daśamukha.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.53.03" n="3">
.<l n="a">nda śīghrāṅsə̄ śrī māgadhapati lavan sodha mamanah,</l>
.<l n="b">śry avaṅga mvaṅ sakveh para ratu mamuk dhīra matuluṅ;</l>
2770<l n="c">ndatan saṅkan saṅ rāvaṇa matakutā yan ginurumuṅ,</l>
.<l n="d">umaṅguh dhīrāṅdhik cuməkəl i* gulu śrī narapati.</l>
. <!--<app>(d) C cuməkəla.</app>-->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.53.04" n="4">
2775<l n="a">tikəl taṅ daṇḍa syuh kapəlaṅ i pupū* saṅ daśamukha,</l>
.<l n="b">sudhīrāmrəp saṅ rvālara tinəkuk iṅ bhūmi dinəkuṅ;</l>
.<l n="c">gupe pūh cūrṇāṅ aṅga, rudhira mijil saṅka riṅ iruṅ,</l>
.<l n="d">satākuyv aṅlih rakva samanira, dūran pamənaṅa.</l>
. <!--<app>(a) q pupuh.
2780 (c) gupe pūh (em.) &lt; gupəpu</app>-->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.53.05" n="5">
.<l n="a">samaṅkojar saṅ rāvaṇa guragaḍa lvir gəlap ahə̄m:</l>
.<l n="b">`nda paṅlampū koṅ alpaguṇa, mamapag vūkku riṅ ayun,</l>
2785<l n="c">arah, sambat tekiṅ gumavay i tuvuhmv iṅ janapada!</l>
.<l n="d">aḍā, lvāmbəkmu, ndin luputamu təkapkv iṅ pabharatan?’</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.53.06" n="6"><l n="a">nahan liṅ saṅ yakṣādhipa, maṅadu minde narapati,</l>
.<l n="b">rəmuk syūh bəntar karva śirahira, rahnyotək uməsat;</l>
2790<l n="c">vimūrchālək saṅ siṅhala pəjah i jə̄ṅ saṅ daśamukha,</l>
.<l n="d">kaliṅgekī sampun dinukakənireṅ arjunabala.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.53.07" n="7"><l n="a">nda yekālahniṅ hehayabala, larut kabvaṅ atakut*,</l>
.<l n="b">vinuk pinrih; len māgadhapati murud mvaṅ para ratu,</l>
2795<l n="c">umuṅsī priṅgāhritniṅ acala guhā groṅ* juraṅ arəs,</l>
.<l n="d">vaneh prāptoṅgvan saṅ ṛṣi, tinutikā deniṅ asura.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) F kapva matakut; (c) y jro.</app> -->
.</lg>
.</div>
2800<div type="canto" rend="met" n="53" met="jagaddhita" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.54">
.<!--Jagaddhita: - - - | ~ ~ - | ~ - ~ | ~ ~ - | ~ ~ ~ | ~ ~ ~ | - ~ - | ~ =-->
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.54.01" n="1"><l n="a">ndan rakryan mapatih suvandha sira mojar i sahananikaṅ balānana:</l><l n="b">`ai sakvehta viśeṣayodha, karuhun para ratu pinakādimaṅgala,</l><l n="c">paṅher, hayva murud manahta maharəp matilara ri kaśaktiniṅ musuh,</l><l n="d">āpan rakva pinetta rakva pinakeṣṭiniṅ apəniṅan iṅ raṇāṅgaṇa.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.54.02" n="2"><l n="a">maṅka pveki təkaṅ prayojana, baṅun salahaśa ri katəmvan iṅ hiḍəp;</l>
2805<l n="b">ndā tan dharmani saṅ pravīra makaṅūni manahanira saṅ nareśvara;</l>
.<l n="c">nirdon taṅ paramāstra tīkṣṇa ginəgə̄*, yadi vavanən ikan curī raṇa,</l>
.<l n="d">byaktekānəmu pāpa yan pəjaha jīvana* tuvi niyataṅ kapātaka.</l>
. <!-- <app>(c) y rinəgəp; (d) A jīnava.</app> -->
.</lg>
2810<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.54.03" n="3"><l n="a">saṅsiptanya sudhīrabuddhi gavayənta, gumavaya tapeṅ praṅ adbhuta,</l>
.<l n="b">lagy āhoma ri madhyaniṅ samara: kuṇḍanika pagəlariṅ musuh ḍatəṅ,</l>
.<l n="c">kapvāvṛkṣa śarīra dibya, masavit dhvaja, macaru rathādivāhana,</l>
.<l n="d">sarvāstrāgni mahojvalāṅarabarab, rudhirajaladhi taila kottama,</l>
.</lg>
2815<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.54.04" n="4"><l n="a">huṅniṅ goṅ kahalātri* ghaṇṭa ya, humuṅ `jaya, jaya’ ri jayanta riṅ musuh,</l>
.<l n="b">dhyāyīkī ripu śūnyamārga ri səḍəṅta kavənaṅa ri śaktiniṅ musuh;</l>
.<l n="c">tan dvekan patəmah śaśāṅka ravi bhāsvara tapakani saṅ matīṅ raṇa,</l>
.<l n="d">drak, śīghran mulih iṅ maharddhikapada pravala kita mamiṇḍa keśava.’</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) Cqv kalaha.</app> -->
2820</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="54" met="sragdharā" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.55">
.<!--Sragdharā: - - - | - ~ - | - ~ ~ | ~ ~ ~ | ~ - - | ~ - - | ~ - =-->
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.55.01" n="1"><l n="a">nā liṅ saṅ vīramantrī*; prasamasama masə̄ saṅ vatək hehayāṅśa,</l><l n="b">mvaṅ sakveh saṅ vatək bhūpati sama lumurug maṅrəṅə̄ vākya hetu.</l><l n="c">śry āvaṅgānindya riṅ praṅ* samaratha rinəgəp tandaṅ iṅ vīra rodra,</l><l n="d">līlāyajñeṅ raṇāṅgājapa sukha pəjahā deniraṅ yakṣanātha.</l>
2825 <!-- <app>(a) y vīrarāja; (c) CE ri praṅ.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.55.02" n="2"><l n="a">hetunyaṅ yakṣa rodrāṅhudani śaravara mvaṅ triśūla pradīpta;</l>
.<l n="b">syuh bhraṣṭālvaṅ salakṣāṅ asurabala vinuk deniraṅ sūryaketu;</l>
.<l n="c">pakṣāmūke* siraṅ rāvaṇa maṅayatakən daṇḍa muṅsī rathāṅga,</l>
2830<l n="d">krūrāmbək saṅ daśāsyāṅduk i jajanika saṅ bhūpatī, tan dva līna.</l>
. <!--<app>(c) C -āmune.
. (c) pakṣāmūke &lt; pakṣāmuke
. (d) bhūpatī &lt; bhūpati</app>-->
.</lg>
2835<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.55.03" n="3"><l n="a">ry aṅkat* śrī māgadhendrārdharatha ya kinəñəp tiṅkah iṅ vīra riṅ praṅ,</l>
.<l n="b">mvaṅ saṅ śry āvantināthātiratha taṅ inivə̄ tiṅkah iṅ dharmayuddha;</l>
.<l n="c">maṅgəh matye harəpniṅ dhvaja, ri təpi kunaṅ, karva pinrih riṅ ambək,</l>
.<l n="d">āpan byaktaṅ mahāpātaka katəmu, yadin matya riṅ ketupṛṣṭha.</l>
. <!--<app>(a) ry aṅkat: y maṅka.</app>-->
2840</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.55.04" n="4"><l n="a">nā hetu śrī narendrāmanah amahi masə̄ tan jrih iṅ śatru śakti;</l>
.<l n="b">trus pyah śry āvantināthātəkən i dhanuhiran māti śūreṅ raṇāṅga,</l>
.<l n="c">lāvan saṅ māgadhendrādbhuta sama pinanah māti de saṅ daśāsya;</l>
.<l n="d">ndah* sampun pūrṇa pūjānira, tinut i larut saṅ vatək hehayāvrəg.</l>
2845 <!-- <app>(d) A ndā.</app> -->
.</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="55" met="mattarāga" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.56">
.<!--Mattarāga: - - ~ | - ~ ~ | ~ - ~ | - ~ ~ | ~ - ~ | - ~ ~ | ~ =-->
2850<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.56.01" n="1"><l n="a">ṅkā saṅ suvandha sira vīra rota juga tan tumut kapalayū,</l><l n="b">līlāṅadəg sira ri rəṅganiṅ ratha, mahārathādi kinəñəp;</l><l n="c">dūran sirāharəpa matya tan panuta dharmaniṅ balapati;</l><l n="d">sampun sirāṅayatakən varāstra, śara dibya śakti luməpas</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.56.02" n="2"><l n="a">śūlāstra bajra hala tomarāṅarabarab sake* taṅanira,</l>
.<l n="b">mvaṅ bāyubajra saha parvatāgni tutug iṅ nabhastala murub;</l>
.<l n="c">dhvas hīnaśakti ri siraṅ daśāsya, kadi guntur iṅ jalanidhi,</l>
2855<l n="d">lvir parvatāgəṅ aruhur tinubniṅ anila pracaṇḍa kumusuh.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) AF sakeṅ.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.56.03" n="3"><l n="a">krūraṅ* mahāsurapati, nda sah sira sakeṅ svavāhana masə̄;</l>
.<l n="b">syuh taṅ pravīra ya vinuknireṅ kṛtala dīpta mṛtyu sakala.</l>
2860<l n="c">yatnaṅ suvandha madhusūdanāstra ginəgə̄* hane taṅanira;</l>
.<l n="d">gək ghraṅ, tikəl curiga saṅ daśāsya ya təkap suvīra mamanah.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) Cv krūrā; (c) y rinəgəp.</app> -->
.</lg>
.</div>
2865<div type="canto" rend="met" n="56" met="śārdūlavikrīḍita" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.57">
.<!--Śārdūlavikrīḍita: - - - | ~ ~ - | ~ - ~ | ~ ~ - | - - ~ | - - ~ | =-->
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.57.01" n="1"><l n="a">yekā hetuni saṅ daśāsya masikəp sy āmoghaśakty ujvala*,</l><l n="b">pakṣāmə̄ka* ri saṅ suvandha kaharəp, sampun təkeṅ sārathi;</l><l n="c">ndā tan dvan dinuk iṅ triśūla, kumətug kaṅgək tibeṅ bhūtala;</l><l n="d">de rakryan mapatih tinūtnira, məsat saṅ rāvaṇātyadbhuta.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) y tikṣṇojvala; (b) y kapvāmə̄ka.</app> -->
.</lg>
2870<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.57.02" n="2"><l n="a">yekākrak, matəmah sahasra, maṅuhuh* saṅkeṅ* laṅit ghūrṇita,</l>
.<l n="b">sə̄k lumreṅ daśadeśa ghora maṅagəm brahmāstra devāntaka;</l>
.<l n="c">avrəg taṅ bala hehayan katavurag sakveh vatək pārthiva</l>
.<l n="d">deniṅ rāvaṇarūpa, hetunika yar tan vriṅ paranyālayu.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) FE2 maṅuvuh; y ṅkaneṅ.</app> -->
2875</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.57.03" n="3"><l n="a">yatnekiṅ* mapatih suvandha juga tan kevran təkapniṅ musuh,</l>
.<l n="b">vruh yan māya gatinya, liṅganika yan dhīrātivīrottama;</l>
.<l n="c">rəp, śīghraṅ śara pañcaveda* luməpas hrū saṅ susenādbhuta,</l>
.<l n="d">təmpuhnyan maṅəne daśāsya, kaləṅər ṅkāneṅ laṅit, pūh tibā.</l>
2880 <!-- <app>(a) Cqv yatnekī, A yatna saṅ, y yatnekā; (c) F pañcadeva.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.57.04" n="4"><l n="a">liṇḍuṅ bhūmi, məsat śilānya kaparah, gək ghor, karəṅv iṅ laṅit;</l>
.<l n="b">tan dvāṅlah kadi parvatendra rumavuh, kagyat vatək rākṣasa.</l>
.<l n="c">ṅkā rakryan mapatih sireki tuməḍun saṅkeṅ rathānindita,</l>
2885<l n="d">dhīrāmbək suməgut harəp tumigase təṅgəkniraṅ rāvaṇa.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.57.05" n="5"><l n="a">krūrātaṅgal ikaṅ daśāsya; kasikəp saṅ vīramantrīnivə̄*,</l>
.<l n="b">sampun rakva gəluṅnirekin inuləṅ de saṅ mahārāvaṇa.</l>
.<l n="c">`oyuh koṅ bala tucchabuddhi, sumalah jñānāvamānery aku.</l>
2890<l n="d">yadyan sy arjuna, mon bhaṭāra, riṅ apan jīvan ya deṅkv iṅ raṇa?’</l>
. <!--<app>(a) A saṅ suvīra-.</app>-->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.57.06" n="6"><l n="a">* nāhan liṅnira yan sumambut irikaṅ khaḍge taṅan saṅ patih,</l>
.<l n="b">yekan rakva pamə̄knire gulunikaṅ śatrv ātisiṅhākṛti;</l>
2895<l n="c">mumbul rahnya, yayan sudhīra mamaləs śūraṅ kavandhāṅamuk,</l>
.<l n="d">kapvāmrəp kuṭilāṅdədəl, tan inivə̄ de śrī mahārākṣasa.</l>
. <!--<app>From 6c to 61.7c are missing in v.</app>-->
.</lg>
.</div>
2900<div type="canto" rend="met" n="57" met="madhulinda" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.58">
.<!--Madulinḍa: ~ - ~ | ~ ~ - | ~ - ~ | ~ ~ - | ~ - ~ | ~ ~ - | ~ - ~ | ~ ~ =-->
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.58.01" n="1">
.<l n="a">byatīta; ri pəjah suvandha, gumuruh dahut sahananiṅ pravīra malayū,</l>
.<l n="b">makāsya para bhūminātha sira puh gəyuh təkap i śakti saṅ daśamukha.</l>
2905<l n="c">amogha ri surup hyaṅ arka, tinut iṅ sapih ya, karaṇanya rakva mahurip;</l>
.<l n="d">daśāsya sira tan kathākəna haneṅ gunuṅ maṇi suramya meru sakala.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.58.02" n="2">
.<l n="a">narendrasuta sodha śaiśuka sireki rakva mahurip; nda yeka vuvusən,</l>
2910<l n="b">lavan sahana saṅ vatək ratu sahehayāṅśabalaśeṣa* mepu kapəgan,</l>
.<l n="c">ri tan ḍatəṅi* saṅ narendra ri mahispati, prabhu viśeṣa śakti subhaga;</l>
.<l n="d">sireki karaṇanya rakva maləs aṅrugaṅ ripu, makolihaṅ daśamukha.</l>
. <!-- <app>(b) sa: y ri; (c) F ḍatəṅa.</app> -->
.</lg>
2915<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.58.03" n="3">
.<l n="a">tuvin* hana maṅənhaṅən muliha bhaktya maṅśulakəne siraṅ narapati,</l>
.<l n="b">umantuka mareṅ svarājya kaharəpnya rakva sira tan tumandaṅ amuka*,</l>
.<l n="c">savetni gəṅi saṅśayanya təkap iṅ musuh sakala rudramūrti kahiḍəp,</l>
.<l n="d">prasaṅga ri kaparjayanya, karaṇanyan osah aṅəsah prapañca sivuhən.</l>
2920 <!-- <app>(a) y vaneh; (b) y amuvah.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.58.04" n="4">
.<l n="a">taṅeh yan ucapən gatinya; huvusiṅ ḍavuh rva ri kəjəpnikaṅ balagaṇa,</l>
.<l n="b">gəlāna malageka rakva karaṇanya nimna juga tan paśabda maturū;</l>
2925<l n="c">kunaṅ ryakikaṅ abdhi śoṇita karəṅv anəmpuh amagut karaṅ śava humuṅ,</l>
.<l n="d">lavan panaṅisiṅ kənātri ya turuṅ pəjah salisu karṇa mandra karəṅə̄.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.58.05" n="5">
.<l n="a">nda tan kahuniṅan gatinya; caritan saṅ arjuna sahasrabāhu mavuṅu,</l>
2930<l n="b">lavan nṛpavadhū sirekin inamər; nda tan dva sira saumyarūpa vəkasan,</l>
.<l n="c">uməntas umareṅ mahantən i samīpaniṅ lvah atiśuddha, ramya pinarək;</l>
.<l n="d">muvah sahananiṅ macaṅkrama sameka məntas amavaṅ* suratna kanaka.</l>
. <!--<app>(d) A amavā.
. 5a to 6d are missing in y.</app>-->
2935</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.58.06" n="6"><l n="a">nda śīghra vinarah sire tayanikaṅ suvandha mamapag ri saṅ daśamukha,</l>
.<l n="b">lavan nṛpati rājarāja patuduh suvandha sira rakṣake narapati.</l>
.<l n="c">ya hetunira gadgadāgaravalan, kuləm sira yayan saroṣa lumurug,</l>
.<l n="d">təgaltəgal ayun gunuṅ juraṅ arəs kalalvanika* deniraṅ narapati.</l>
2940 <!-- <app>(d) C kalakvan-.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.58.07" n="7"><l n="a">samāntara ri mehaniṅ dina, ḍatəṅ* saṅ arjuna sireṅ raṇāṅgaṇa huvus*,</l>
.<l n="b">lavan sahana saṅ vatək ratu surakṣa kāri surasena mukhya maṅiriṅ*.</l>
.<l n="c">siraṅ magadhaputra* siṅhalasuteki sampun umarək ri jə̄ṅ saṅ ahulun,</l>
2945<l n="d">paḍājar i təlas vatək ratu muvah suvandha kavənaṅ təkap daśamukha.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) A ḍataṅ; y -Arjunasahasrabāhu tumutut; (b) BD haṅiriṅ, E ṅ aṅiriṅ; (c) A Magadhasuta.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.58.08" n="8"><l n="a">narendra sira śūra dhīra juga tan vikalpa, makin ujvalaṅ tvas apagəh,</l>
.<l n="b">prakopa kadi siṅha rodra magalak harəp mihata riṅ gajāgəṅ aruhur.</l>
2950<l n="c">nda śīghra təka tan pasaṅkan inucap maharṣi varanāradāṅanumata,</l>
.<l n="d">maśānti ri harəp narendra majayājayāstu karəṅə̄ pamurṣitanira:</l>
. <!--<app>(a) apagəh &lt; apegəh</app>-->
.</lg>
.</div>
2955<div type="canto" rend="met" n="58" met="basantatilakā" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.59">
.<!--Vasantatilaka: - - ~ | - ~ ~ | ~ - ~ | ~ - ~ | - =-->
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.59.01" n="1"><l n="a">`ḍū saṅ narendra paramarddhika bhūmipāla,</l><l n="b">riṅ rūpa dibya kahiḍəp kusumāyudheṅ rāt,</l><l n="c">riṅ vīrya tulya parameśvara tan pahīṅan,</l><l n="d">devādi tan hana vənaṅ mihate* guṇanta.</l>
. <!-- <app>(d) A mihateṅ, y mulateṅ.</app> -->
.</lg>
2960<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.59.02" n="2"><l n="a">solah svabhāva haji tan hana topamanya*,</l>
.<l n="b">śāstrajña sādhu nipuṇeṅ hayu dharmabuddhi;</l>
.<l n="c">yekāmaṅun həlahəlaṅku ri saṅ narārya*,</l>
.<l n="d">hetuṅkv i yan ḍatəṅ inaṇḍəhan* iṅ sih ardha*.</l>
. <!--<app>(a) A topamanta; (c) narendra; (d) E2 ḍatəṅa kaṇḍəhan; A sirārdha.</app>-->
2965</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.59.03" n="3"><l n="a">sambandha deni guṇa śaktini saṅ daśāsya,</l>
.<l n="b">dūran vənaṅ maḍana śaktini saṅ narendra;</l>
.<l n="c">ṅhiṅ tan samāsani patinya, maveh viyoga;</l>
.<l n="d">sih hyaṅ caturmukha ya hetuniṅ adbhuteṅ rāt.</l>
2970</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.59.04" n="4"><l n="a">bhraṣṭaṅ vatək ratu hilaṅ paḍa bhasmi denya,</l>
.<l n="b">mvaṅ sarvadeva matakut sahaneṅ triloka,</l>
.<l n="c">ndā tan hanāmapaga vuknika vīra rodra*,</l>
.<l n="d">hyaṅ viṣṇu tovin akətər sira tan vadeya.</l>
2975 <!-- <app>(c) vīra rodra: A riṅ raṇāṅga.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.59.05" n="5"><l n="a">riṅ dlāha rakva sira yan janarūpa riṅ rāt,</l>
.<l n="b">mvaṅ vānarendrabala vānarasaṅgha rodra,</l>
.<l n="c">ndah yeka rovaṅira matyana yeṅ raṇāṅga,</l>
2980<l n="d">yapvan huvus phalani yoganikaṅ daśāsya.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.59.06" n="6"><l n="a">ndah kantənanya, bapa, maṅsula, saṅ narārya*;</l>
.<l n="b">dontāpraṅāmənaṅa, tan pakabuddhya* lajja;</l>
.<l n="c">brahmāstra rudraśara bāṇa mahāśaranta,</l>
2985<l n="d">byakteka dagdha ləpaseṅ daśavaktra, bhagna*.’</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) C -bapa saṅ naranātha maṅsula; (b) F pakabuddhi; (d) y rūpa.</app> -->
.</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="59" met="śārdūlavikrīḍita" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.60">
2990<!--Śārdūlavikrīḍita: - - - | ~ ~ - | ~ - ~ | ~ ~ - | - - ~ | - - ~ | =-->
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.60.01" n="1"><l n="a">liṅ saṅ nārada; śūra dhīra mavuvus saṅ śrī mahābhūpati:</l><l n="b">`bhoh bhoh saṅ ṛṣi, hayva saṅśaya kite* kāpatyaniṅ rāvaṇa.</l><l n="c">tonton teki məne pamukviki lavan yātyanta riṅ kādbhuta.</l><l n="d">dhik, tan mantuka riṅ purāku, yadiyan tan sora deṅkv iṅ raṇa.</l>
. <!-- <app>(b) A tike.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.60.02" n="2"><l n="a">lāvan tan pəjahaṅ musuh juga ya don saṅ śūra vīreṅ raṇa,</l>
2995<l n="b">tan saṅkeṅ aharəp lumiṇḍihana rājyāmetaṅ arthottama;</l>
.<l n="c">svasthāniṅ bhuvaneki mukhyaṅ inivə̄, mvaṅ bhaktyaniṅ rāt kabeh</l>
.<l n="d">ṅkāne jə̄ṅnira, rudramūrti kahiḍəp saṅ maṅkana lvirnira.’</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.60.03" n="3"><l n="a">nāhan liṅnira saṅ narendra; makin epv ambəkniraṅ nārada,</l>
3000<l n="b">dūrāsambhava yan manuṅkula* manah saṅ rāvaṇe saṅ prabhu.</l>
.<l n="c">tan varṇan sira; riṅ* kṣaṇekan umijil hyaṅ sūrya dīpteṅ raṇa;</l>
.<l n="d">padmabyūha gəlar narendra, dalaṅ aṣṭekiṅ pravīrottama;</l>
. <!-- <app>(b) q manūkula; (c) q ri.</app> -->
.</lg>
3005<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.60.04" n="4"><l n="a">ṅkāneṅ ardha narendra dibya kahiḍəp santən pramāṇeṅ laga,</l>
.<l n="b">mvaṅ sakveh prabhu hehayekin umarək krūrāmasə̄k tar* kasah.</l>
.<l n="c">sampunyan mapagəh kabeh, tucapa saṅ yakṣendra, kapvāṅrəṅə̄</l>
.<l n="d">an śrī bhūpati kārtavīrya tumutur prāpteṅ təgal papraṅan.</l>
. <!-- <app>(b) q tan.</app> -->
3010</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.60.05" n="5"><l n="a">yekā hetunirātidhīra tumurun saṅkeṅ maṇīndrācala,</l>
.<l n="b">muṅgv iṅ puṇḍakikaṅ vimāna, iniriṅ* deniṅ vatək rākṣasa;</l>
.<l n="c">lvir guntur mapagut patəmpuhika garva mvaṅ vatək hehaya,</l>
.<l n="d">sākṣāt sāgara mombak atri gumuruh ghoran panəmpuh karaṅ.</l>
3015 <!-- <app>(b) BF hiniriṅ.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.60.06" n="6"><l n="a">tan dvāpraṅ marukət silih praṅ atugur, munyaṅ mṛdaṅgāsəlur,</l>
.<l n="b">śaṅkhāṅhrik harəp iṅ rathāṅga, tumitih sakveh vatək bhūpati;</l>
.<l n="c">len tekaṅ hana rin gajāśva pinupul deniṅ balākveh masə̄;</l>
3020<l n="d">mvaṅ tekaṅ bala rāvaṇeka lumurug sampun haneṅ vāhana.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.60.07" n="7"><l n="a">ndan saṅ śry arjuna dhīra yatna lumihat kvehniṅ musuh rākṣasa,</l>
.<l n="b">mvaṅ saṅ rāvaṇa vīra rodra kahiḍəp hyaṅ brahma tejomaya;</l>
.<l n="c">maṅkāścarya daśāsyarāja ya təkap śrī hehayāṅśaprabhu,</l>
3025<l n="d">sākṣāt hyaṅ parameśvareka kadələ̄ lvir mukṣa māreṅ tavaṅ.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.60.08" n="8"><l n="a">ndan yekan paḍa garjitekan umasə̄ krūrāṅgəgə̄ sāyaka*,</l>
.<l n="b">sarvāstrādbhuta mṛtyutulya luməpas cakrāstra tīkṣṇojvala*;</l>
.<l n="c">nirdon tampuhike ri saṅ rva, kavaluy bhagnaṅ mahāsañjata,</l>
3030<l n="d">vvāgan taṅ balasaṅgha cūrṇa matəmah sindhv adri deniṅ panah.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) y sañjata; (b) tikṣṇojvala: y sūryopama.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.60.09" n="9"><l n="a">krūrāmbək daśavaktra, śīghra maṅabən riṅ konta muntab murub;</l>
.<l n="b">bajrāgə̄ṅ luməpas parəṅ, linuputan de śrī narendrādhipa;</l>
3035<l n="c">brahmāstrānupameka bāṇa pamaləs saṅ nātha dhīromasə̄,</l>
.<l n="d">tampuhnyādbhuta, labdhakārya, katugəl təṇḍasniraṅ* rāvaṇa.</l>
. <!-- <app>(d) Aq taṇḍas.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.60.10" n="10"><l n="a">mumbul taṅ rah anekavarṇa kumucur, təṇḍasnya* sampun tiba;</l>
3040<l n="b">ahyaṅ pārthiva yan paṅadvakən, avū kagyat vatək rākṣasa.</l>
.<l n="c">drak, śīghran patəpuṅ maluy śirahiraṅ yakṣendra pūrṇākṛti;</l>
.<l n="d">tan vandhyan* pinanah təkap nṛpati, līnānindya jīvan muvah.</l>
. <!--<app>(a) Aq taṇḍas-; (d) y tandva n.</app>-->
.</lg>
3045<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.60.11" n="11"><l n="a">ṅhiṅ tekaṅ varapuṣpakeka kavənaṅ deniṅ varāstrādbhuta*,</l>
.<l n="b">rəmpuh syuh tumibeṅ mahītala, məsat saṅ rāvaṇāglis masə̄;</l>
.<l n="c">śīghrāṅandəl i megha, tan dva sumaput yekaṅ* pətəṅ bhīṣaṇa,</l>
.<l n="d">ghoraṅ śabda makon prayatna ri sira śrī hehayāṅśaprabhu.</l>
. <!--<app>(a) y mahāstrā-; (c) A yekā.</app>-->
3050</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="60" met="sandhyakāra" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.61">
.<!--Sandyakara: ~ ~ ~ | ~ - ~ | - ~ ~ | ~ - ~ | - ~ ~ | ~ - ~ | - - ~ | =-->
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.61.01" n="1">
3055<l n="a">atha ri səḍəṅ mahāsurapati prakopa sira tan kacakṣugraha,</l>
.<l n="b">haruhara saṅ vatək ratu ri hehayāṅśabala durbalāvrəg dahut,</l>
.<l n="c">girigirin epu tan vriṅ ulaheki rakva ya təkap daśāsyāmanah,</l>
.<l n="d">humudani* sarvasañjata sakeṅ pətəṅ saha kilat gəlap ghūrṇita.</l>
. <!-- <app>(d) y maṅudani.</app> -->
3060</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.61.02" n="2">
.<l n="a">karaṇanikaṅ pravīrabala hehayāṅśa matumaṅ təkapnyan pəjah;</l>
.<l n="b">makacərəcəb* tikaṅ turaga sāmajālvaṅika deniran syuh pəjah;</l>
.<l n="c">makabarubuh tikaṅ giri kabāṇa bhasmi təkan iṅ mahāvṛkṣa sol;</l>
3065<l n="d">jalanidhi matsya cūrṇa kacacah, varinya kadi pāvakoṣṇāṅalun.</l>
. <!-- <app>(b) F makacarəcəb.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.61.03" n="3">
.<l n="a">pracalitaṅ aṇḍabhūmi, kumətər tikaṅ bhuvana denikaṅ hrū ləpas;</l>
3070<l n="b">təka ri ḍasarnikaṅ kṣiti, bhaṭāra nāgapati pūh kacuṇḍuk kəna;</l>
.<l n="c">ikaṅ umareṅ surālaya, kavas kabeh sahana saṅ vatək devatā,</l>
.<l n="d">hyaṅ amararāja muṅsir irikaṅ śivāṇḍa saha patnikāpet hurip.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.61.04" n="4"><l n="a">narapati dhīra tan sigasigun sire gatinikaṅ daśāsyeṅ laga*;</l>
3075<l n="b">aruṇa sahasra dibyan* umijil sake* panahirātidīptāpaḍaṅ,</l>
.<l n="c">maḍəmi* pətəṅnikaṅ bhuvana; dṛṣṭa* mūrtinika saṅ mahārāvaṇa,</l>
.<l n="d">saha śara nāgapāśa maharəp makoliha ri saṅ narendrādhipa.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) y tavaṅ; (b) y dipta; F sakeṅ; (c) C maḍəma; F dṛpta.</app> -->
.</lg>
3080<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.61.05" n="5"><l n="a">karaṇa narendra śīghra mamanah riṅ astra khagarāja* bāṇottama,</l>
.<l n="b">rumaməs ikaṅ mahābhujaga, tan dva māti pinaṅanya, sampun hilaṅ;</l>
.<l n="c">muvah amanah sireṅ śara viśeṣa rudraśara bhāsvarānindita,</l>
.<l n="d">umalap i jīva saṅ prabhu daśāsya, manrus i jajanya, mar pūh tibā.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) Fy nagarāja.</app> -->
3085</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.61.06" n="6"><l n="a">linudika riṅ śarāgni ya təkap narendra saha bāyubajrāmusus*,</l>
.<l n="b">gəsəṅika bhasmibhūta matəmah havū vəkasiraṅ mahārāvaṇa;</l>
.<l n="c">tinut ikanaṅ mahāsurabalāvrəg osah alayū kagə̄man kavəs,</l>
.<l n="d">sinusunan iṅ śarādbhuta, dine, linakṣa ya təkap vatək pārthiva.</l>
3090 <!-- <app>(a) -āmusus: y -āṅasut.</app> -->
.</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="61" met="sragdharā" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.62">
.<!--Sragdharā: - - - | - ~ - | - ~ ~ | ~ ~ ~ | ~ - - | ~ - - | ~ - =-->
3095<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.62.01" n="1"><l n="a">rəp, śīghra prāṇa* jīvan daśamukha maṅadəg ghorarūpāṅgakāra;</l><l n="b">ḍyam tekaṅ bhūr bhuvah svah, giripati makətər, deni gə̄ṅniṅ svadeha;</l><l n="c">sə̄k taṅ mūrdhātiśobhā daśavidha kahiḍəp mṛtyutulyāprameya,</l><l n="d">hastākveh viṅśati prodbhuta paḍa ruməgəp sarvadivyāstra śakti:</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) y pūrṇa.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.62.02" n="2"><l n="a">bhalla mvaṅ bajra cakra kṛtala muśala len betalāgra pradīpta;</l>
.<l n="b">bar bor, muntab təkeṅ byomaṅ analan umijil saṅka riṅ cakṣu makveh,</l>
3100<l n="c">yekāṅde trāsaniṅ hehayabala ya, gəsəṅ durbalaṅ vīrasaṅgha;</l>
.<l n="d">mātus taṅ kṣatriyāṅśaprabhu makasulayah denirātyanta rodra.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.62.03" n="3"><l n="a">hetunyaṅ rākṣasāvrəg paḍa maluy i hurip* saṅ mahāyakṣa dibya,</l>
.<l n="b">maṅkin dhairyānəṅah riṅ musuhika rumaməs khaḍganiṅ śatru śakti;</l>
3105<l n="c">akveh sāmantarājādbhuta mati kasikəp* deniraṅ yakṣarāja,</l>
.<l n="d">sākṣāt hyaṅ kāla rodrāmunah* amaravaśaṅ sarvabhūteṅ yugānta.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) F maluyahurip; (c) y sinikəp; (d) A -āmanah, y -āmunuh.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.62.04" n="4"><l n="a">maṅkin krodhāṅivuṅ saṅ daśamukhan inasə̄ riṅ vatək hehayāṅśa,</l>
3110<l n="b">bvat kāla krūra, tan dvāṅamukamuk amaṅan śatru śūrātirodra;</l>
.<l n="c">maṅkin rəmpak* rihək siṅ kapagutika, hilaṅ syūh təkeṅ pekayodha;</l>
.<l n="d">vrinvrin sakveh vatək bhūpati paḍa makətər, pūh maraṅ rājaputra,</l>
. <!-- <app>(c) F rəmpak rimpək.</app> -->
.</lg>
3115<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.62.05" n="5"><l n="a">dhīrekaṅ* vīra maṅsə̄, para ratu suməgut mvaṅ vatək hehayāṅśa,</l>
.<l n="b">krūrāṅraṅkal manek saṅ daśamukha, maṅunus khaḍga tīkṣṇānivārya;</l>
.<l n="c">dudvekaṅ kṣatriyāṅduk jaja, vavaṅ aṅayuh bāhu saṅ rāvaṇāhya,</l>
.<l n="d">kapvāṅrəṅgut śirah, tan gumirisin i təkapniṅ daśāsyātirodra.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) Aq dhīrekā.</app> -->
3120</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.62.06" n="6"><l n="a">prodbhūtaṅ brahmavaṅśopama naga pinupulniṅ ghanākveh lumaṅkuṅ;</l>
.<l n="b">ambəkniṅ śatru sākṣāt maṅaluṣa makire tīrtha śuddhāmṛteṅ rāt;</l>
.<l n="c">guntur mumbul sakeṅ meruśikhara, paḍaniṅ sarvasāstrāprameya;</l>
.<l n="d">śaṅkhāṅhrik, bāṇa makrəp javəh ikan umijil saṅka riṅ jihva malvā.</l>
3125</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.62.07" n="7"><l n="a">ndā tan dvānyuh vatək pārthiva, kadi rinujak denikaṅ astra tīkṣṇa;</l>
.<l n="b">len taṅ sampun katiṅhas gulunika, malajəṅ sinrəṅ iṅ candrahāsa;</l>
.<l n="c">akveh saṅ hehayāṅśaprabhu mati dinəkuṅ deniraṅ rākṣasendra,</l>
.<l n="d">yekan sampun sinəmpal ginutukakənireṅ aṣṭavanvātidūra.</l>
3130</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.62.08" n="8"><l n="a">tovin saṅ sodha sampun pəjah ikan inələ̄ denikaṅ yakṣarāja,</l>
.<l n="b">mvaṅ tekaṅ śaisukā kārdha subala kinəmah dhvas təkeṅ daṇḍa cāpa;</l>
.<l n="c">syūh bhraṣṭaṅ byūha padman gaja rathaṅ inidək mvaṅ balākoṭilakṣa;</l>
.<l n="d">ndātan kevran manah śry arjuna mihat i pamuk saṅ daśāsyātirodra.</l>
3135</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="62" met="śārdūlavikrīḍita" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.63">
.<!--Śārdūlavikrīḍita: - - - | ~ ~ - | ~ - ~ | ~ ~ - | - - ~ | - - ~ | =-->
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.63.01" n="1"><l n="a">yekā hetuniran trivikrama masə̄ krodhātiśobhāṅjəlag,</l><l n="b">sākṣāt hyaṅ tripurāntakāgəṅ aruhur, sor saṅ mahārāvaṇa;</l><l n="c">krūrāṅ aṅga sahasra hasta sumaput lvir nāga rodrāgalak,</l><l n="d">sarvāstrānupameka dibya ginəgə̄ de śrī narendrādhipa.</l>
3140 <!--<app>(c) krūrāṅ &lt; krūraṅ</app>-->
. </lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.63.02" n="2"><l n="a">himpər bhāskara candra sevu luməpas taṅ hrū mahābhīṣaṇa,</l>
.<l n="b">ṅkāne saṅ daśavaktra cūrṇa kahiḍəp rāhv ātirodrākṛti;</l>
.<l n="c">maṅka hrūnika saṅ daśāsya maṅəne śrī hehayāṅśaprabhu;</l>
3145<l n="d">hetunyaṅ praṅ* avarṇa meru mataruṅ mvaṅ sāgarātry āṅalun.</l>
. <!--<app>(d) q hetunyāpraṅ.</app>-->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.63.03" n="3"><l n="a">liṇḍuṅ bhūmi bəlah, girīndra kahiriṅ, sol taṅ mahāmandara;</l>
.<l n="b">svargākveh tumibeṅ tasik, katavurag de saṅ rva vīrottama;</l>
3150<l n="c">syūh bhraṣṭan karəm iṅ samudra kasiləm, devanya sampun məsat;</l>
.<l n="d">gor gər, ghūrṇitaṅ ampuhanya kakəbur mathyāvərə̄ sə̄k pəjah.</l>
. <!--<app>(d) matsya &lt; mathya?</app>-->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.63.04" n="4"><l n="a">krodhāmbək daśavaktra garjita mihatn ton śakti saṅ bhūpati;</l>
3155<l n="b">rəp, śīghraṅ lipuṅ ardha yekan umijil saṅkeṅ tutuk bhīṣaṇa;</l>
.<l n="c">muntab sə̄ṅnyan umuṅ* gəlapnya kumupak, mvaṅ bāyubajrāṅasut;</l>
.<l n="d">ndah yekan rinəgəpnirenayatakən, ghūrṇaṅ triloka kṣaya.</l>
. <!-- <app>(c) F humuṅ.</app> -->
.</lg>
3160<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.63.05" n="5"><l n="a">krūrāṅdhik* daśavaktra, śabda kahiḍəp huṅniṅ prakampānala:</l>
.<l n="b">`āy ay bhūpati, yatnayatna, mati ko! kontaṅku tan vyartha ya.’</l>
.<l n="c">təmpuhnyādbhuta, tan dva yeka kasikəp de śrī narendrādhipa,</l>
.<l n="d">ṅkāne kānaniraṅ mahāstran umaluy* kāntəp siraṅ rāvaṇa.</l>
. <!--<app>(a) v krūrādhik; (d) y tumuluy.</app>-->
3165</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.63.06" n="6"><l n="a">* śīghrodhāni, mahāprakopan umijil hyaṅ kāla durgomasə̄</l>
.<l n="b">saṅkeṅ asya daśāsya, tan dva macaturhastāṅhrik ahyāṅuhuh;</l>
.<l n="c">tan kevran sira saṅ narendra, vihikan yan tan bhaṭārānurun,</l>
.<l n="d">māyākāra daśāsya, hetunira yan tan jrih təkapniṅ musuh.</l>
3170<!--<app> Stanzas 6 and 7 are missing in F.</app>-->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.63.07" n="7"><l n="a">yatna śry arjuna, daṇḍa śakti pinutər, lvirnyan saraṅrə̄ magə̄ṅ,</l>
.<l n="b">muntab tejanikā sumə̄ṅ, sumuluh iṅ svargānuvarteṅ jagat.</l>
.<l n="c">`ai koṅ rāvaṇa duṣṭa, mah lihat ike!’ nā liṅnirākrak masə̄;</l>
3175<l n="d">pok pok, gə̄ṅ dhvaniniṅ gadāstra tumameṅ taṇḍasniraṅ rāvaṇa.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.63.08" n="8"><l n="a">ndā tan dvan kapəṅəl, mamə̄ṅ puṅupuṅun pūh, tan pəjah, mār kasep;</l>
.<l n="b">dhīrāmbək prabhu kārtavīrya lumihat saṅ rāvaṇan koratan,</l>
.<l n="c">ghoraṅ hasta sahasra yatna sumikəp śatrv āsalah pālaga;</l>
3180<l n="d">ṅkan pinrih rinakut taṅanya, kinənan pāśaṅ mahārākṣasa.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.63.09" n="9"><l n="a">sampunyan kavənaṅ daśāsya ya rinantay loha de saṅ prabhu,</l>
.<l n="b">lvir tan pātma sumuṅkəm iṅ kṣiti, vināśaṅ rūpa ghorākṛti.</l>
.<l n="c">āścaryaṅ* para devasaṅgha lumihat ghūrṇāsurak riṅ laṅit*,</l>
3185<l n="d">tuṣṭāmbəknira denya, tan dva maṅigəl saṅ nāradātry āgiraṅ.</l>
.<!--<app> (c) C aścaryā; y viyat.</app>-->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.63.10" n="10">
.<l n="a">ndan sakvehnikanaṅ tumiṅhali manah saṅ rāvaṇāṅadvakən,</l>
3190<l n="b">śokaprāṇa* kabehnya maṅgəh i gatinyan* matya de saṅ prabhu;</l>
.<l n="c">kīrṇekaṅ bala rākṣasāsəmu samāhyun patya saṅ* rāvaṇa,</l>
.<l n="d">hetunyātilar aṅləs aṅlud i takutnyārəs təkapniṅ musuh.</l>
. <!--<app>(b) F śākaprāṇa; y patinya; (c) A patyana de saṅ.</app>-->
.</lg>
3195<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.63.11" n="11">
.<l n="a">ṅhiṅ rakryan mapatih prahasta sira tan kabvaṅ, marək tan kasah,</l>
.<l n="b">gə̄ṅ satyānivi saṅ daśāsya, sukha milve* patya saṅ rāvaṇa;</l>
.<l n="c">kapvāminta ri sih saṅ arjuna kənoh saṅ rāvaṇecchākəna;</l>
.<l n="d">durśānteki narendra, hetuni taṅisnyāṅras* ri jə̄ṅniṅ tuhan:</l>
3200 <!--<app>(b) y milve, BCF milvī, Aqv milviṅ.</app>-->
.</lg>
.
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="63" met="pr̥thvītala" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.64">
3205<!--Pṛthvītala: ~ - ~ | ~ ~ - | ~ - ~ | ~ ~ - | ~ - - | ~ =-->
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.64.01" n="1">
.<l n="a">`aha prabhu daśāsya, hah, ndi ta vuvus patik bhūpati,</l>
.<l n="b">prasaṅga ri gatinta yan malaga vairanāthārjuna?</l>
.<l n="c">apan rasika vīra śakti subhageṅ jagat kottama,</l>
3210<l n="d">bhaṭāra harimūrtitulya putusiṅ vidagdheṅ raṇa.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.64.02" n="2">
.<l n="a">kita pva laki mūḍhabuddhi, mavərə̄ təkapniṅ guṇa,</l>
.<l n="b">cihāciha ri sih prajāpati ya hetuniṅ duryaśa,</l>
3215<l n="c">kəneṅ uguṅi duṣṭaniṅ bala kaṭuṅka nīcātilar,</l>
.<l n="d">asambhava manahta yan mamənaṅāvamāne sira.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.64.03" n="3">
.<l n="a">balik mara ləhəṅ* kasambya kita maty amūkeṅ raṇa,</l>
3220<l n="b">sudhīra pəjaheṅ raṇāṅgana, pəkən təkapniṅ musuh,</l>
.<l n="c">nda sopadi manahta rakva satatāmaṅun duhkhita;</l>
.<l n="d">aḍā prabhu, lalun purihniṅ avuyuṅ tinaṅgəh kədə̄.’</l>
.<!--<app> (a) y rikā.</app>-->
. </lg>
3225<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.64.04" n="4"><l n="a">nahan vacana saṅ prahasta manəsəl* ri saṅ rāvaṇa.</l>
.<l n="b">daśāsya humənəṅ məkəh manuhu mepu, vetniṅ lara;</l>
.<l n="c">manuṅkulaṅ anuṅ prayojananikeri saṅ bhūpati,</l>
.<l n="d">subhaktya maturaṅ svarājya* maṅaran ri ləṅkāpura.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) y suməsəl; (d) A matura svarājya.</app> -->
3230</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.64.05" n="5"><l n="a">nda yeka panaṅis daśāsya ya lamun ta yovākəna;</l>
.<l n="b">saṅ arjuna sireki tan vavarəṅə̄* mahābhīṣaṇa;</l>
.<l n="c">muvah ta ya pinañjareka ya təkap narendrādhipa,</l>
.<l n="d">kinehan ika, tan dva kāṅkat inirid təkapniṅ bala.</l>
3235 <!-- <app>(b) y siga-sigun.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.64.06" n="6"><l n="a">byatīta, ri təlas* daśāsya katavan təkap saṅ prabhu,</l>
.<l n="b">paḍāhya sukha garjitāmbək ikanaṅ vatək hehaya;</l>
.<l n="c">kunaṅ rasika saṅ daśāsya makucəm katon tan sphuṭa,</l>
3240<l n="d">hilaṅ gəṅi kabhīnabhīnanika riṅ jagat niṣprabha.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) y huvus.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.64.07" n="7"><l n="a">nda śīghran umulih narendra saha vīraśeṣāṅiriṅ*,</l>
.<l n="b">juraṅjuraṅ arəs gunuṅ trəbis ikā kalalvan huvus,</l>
3245<l n="c">samāntara ḍatəṅ sire* təpinikaṅ mahānarmadā,</l>
.<l n="d">ikannahira* saṅ* narendradayitān katiṅgal* ləṅəṅ.</l>
.<!--<app> (a) A vīraśeṣa maṅiriṅ; (c) y sire ḍatəṅ; (d) y ri parnah; ira saṅ: A i rayī, q ira si; Aq katiṅhal.</app>--></lg>
.
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.64.08" n="8"><l n="a">*valiṅnira manuṅsuṅeki kaharəpnire saṅ kasih</l>
3250<l n="b">priyambadan* amogha rūkṣa malurun kapaṅgih pəjah,</l>
.<l n="c">muvah sahananiṅ vvaṅ adyah i daləm paratran tumut,</l>
.<l n="d">vaneh vvalika kuñjaguṇḍikika len huveñāpupul.</l>
. <!--<app>(b) ABqv priyəmbada.
. Instead of tvo stanzas (8 and 9), y has tvo cantos of 14 stanzas [as follovs:].</app>-->
3255</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.64.09" n="9"><l n="a">ya hetunira yan jəṅər kahənəṅan təkap saṅ paḍəm,</l>
.<l n="b">muvah sahana saṅ pravīra paḍa keməṅan riṅ manah.</l>
.<l n="c">rikaṅ kṣaṇa haneki cāraka marək praṇamye haji,</l>
.<l n="d">nda yeka humatur ri jə̄ṅnira ri don supatnī pəjah.</l>
3260 <!--<app>(b) keməṅan &lt; kaməṅan</app>-->
.</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="64" met="jagadnātha" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.65">
.<!--Jagatnātha: ~ - ~ | ~ ~ - | ~ - ~ | ~ ~ - | ~ ~ ~ | ~ ~ ~ | - ~ - | ~ ~-->
3265<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.65.01" n="1"><l n="a">`prabhuṅku kita saṅ maharddhika, nihan karaṇani pati saṅ nareśvarī:</l><l n="b">haneki varaduṣṭabuddhi tumular bala hajin umarək satorasih,</l><l n="c">suvṛddha tuhu sādhurūpa ya, pilih vvil ika, majar i līna saṅ prabhu,</l><l n="d">mataṅnyan iki tan haneki ri ḍatəṅ nṛpati tan ilu riṅ* balakrama.</l>
. <!-- <app>(d) tan ilu riṅ: y dinulur iṅ.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.65.02" n="2"><l n="a">ya hetunira yānta mār kapati, tan vriṅ ulaha rumənə̄ nareśvara,</l>
.<l n="b">ulihniṅ atuluṅ; nimittaniṅ adan tumutura ri narendra riṅ raṇa,</l>
3270<l n="c">makumpul* asaləṇḍə rakva sira tan sah adulura lavan nareśvara.</l>
.<l n="d">̣bhaviṣyati, haneki rakva mavarah ri sira təka saṅ mahāsura.</l>
. <!--<app>(c) A maṅumpul.
. (d) unmetrical. one syllable missing.</app>-->
.</lg>
3275<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.65.03" n="3"><l n="a">nimittanira yar pamə̄k kuku lavan gəluṅira ya vinə̄r cinupvanan,</l>
.<l n="b">tibākəna ri jə̄ṅta rakva ri luvarniṅ asura, paməkasnireṅ hulun.</l>
.<l n="c">vvayeki viphalan tuhanku ri huripta, bapa, mamənaṅ iṅ raṇāṅgaṇa!</l>
.<l n="d">nda pamvit i manəhta yeki huniṅan, tumutura ri pəjah nareśvarī.’</l>
.</lg>
3280<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.65.04" n="4"><l n="a">nahan liṅika, tan dva māti matəvək tanu pəjah i harəp nareśvara.</l>
.<l n="b">narendra kamatəṅgəṅən sira, vimūrcha kaləṅər i dagan nareśvarī,</l>
.<l n="c">hilaṅ kətəkətəgnireki sumaput gəṅi turidanirāpulaṅ lulut;</l>
.<l n="d">udhāni ta sirānaṅis*, paḍa təñuh sahanahananikaṅ balālaṅə̄.</l>
. <!-- <app>(d) A sirānaṅi.</app> -->
3285</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="65" met="jagaddhita" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.66">
.<!--Jagaddhita: - - - | ~ ~ - | ~ - ~ | ~ ~ - | ~ ~ ~ | ~ ~ ~ | - ~ - | ~ =-->
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.66.01" n="1"><l n="a">`hah dyah, saṅ rumuhun hilaṅ makahavan turida, mulahakən patibrata,</l><l n="b">saṅ sthīre luṅidiṅ pabelan i pəjahta tumutura ri līnaniṅ hulun,</l><l n="c">maṅke pvā ri huripku mithya savuvusniṅ avarah i patiṅku riṅ raṇa.</l><l n="d">tolih ṅvaṅ, bibi, tolihən mara taṅis mami katilar i tīraniṅ nadī.</l>
3290</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.66.02" n="2"><l n="a">hah rakryan, huniṅan pasambat i manəhta kasihan apulaṅ lavan śava.</l>
.<l n="b">bhoh tenduṅ rari, paṅlilir, tutututur paṅucap, ibu, ri paṅkvaniṅ hulun.</l>
.<l n="c">ndīku* kvāni manismanistan inamər katitihan avijāṅdələ̄ mata?</l>
.<l n="d">maṅkin* mukṣa hatiṅku denta, bibi, yan vagəd amaḍani seṣṭiniṅ hati.</l>
3295 <!-- <app>(c) C ndi n; (d) y maṅke.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.66.03" n="3"><l n="a">dyahkv induṅ, riṅ apaṅ* madhubrata vənaṅ saha ri rəcəpi sāriniṅ səkar?</l>
.<l n="b">mvaṅ taṅ cātaka dūra yan harəp adoha maləra ri kadohan iṅ* javəh;</l>
.<l n="c">len tekaṅ taḍaharṣa rūkṣa niyatan pəjaha ri tiləmiṅ niśākara;</l>
3300<l n="d">tadvat* maṅkana tāku matya ri hilaṅta sapuḍaka salambaṅ iṅ laṅə̄.</l>
. <!-- <app>(a) F riṅ apan; (b) F malara ri doha niṅ; (d) y tandvā.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.66.04" n="4"><l n="a">saṅsiptanya, tuhanku, nora vənaṅ aṅrahatana manahiṅ kināryakən,</l>
.<l n="b">aṅhiṅ matya jugeki rakva, muburaṅ bhuvana havananiṅ hulun pəjah;</l>
3305<l n="c">mvaṅ taṅ vvil magave kṣayanta vulikən vulatana sahaneṅ jagattraya.’</l>
.<l n="d">nāhan liṅnira yan mayat matəmahāgəṅ umuvaha kadīṅ* praṅ adbhuta.</l>
. <!-- <app>(d) F kadī.</app> -->
.</lg>
.</div>
3310<div type="canto" rend="met" n="66" met="śārdūlavikrīḍita" xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.67">
.<!--Śārdūlavikrīḍita: - - - | ~ ~ - | ~ - ~ | ~ ~ - | - - ~ | - - ~ | =-->
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.67.01" n="1"><l n="a">rəp, prāptaṅ kiraṇa pradīptan umijil saṅ hyaṅ hyaṅiṅ narmadā,</l><l n="b">strīrūpādhika tan pahīṅan, acaturhastāmavāṅ oṣadhi;</l><l n="c">sampun prāpta ri saṅ narendra, tumuluy saṅ nātha bhaktī sira.</l><l n="d">`om om bhūpati, hayva saṅśaya ri līnā saṅ supatnīśvarī.</l>
.</lg>
.<lg xml:id="arjunaVijaya_01.67.02" n="2"><l n="a">āpan tan təkaniṅ patī patini saṅ sākṣāt maṇikniṅ purī;</l>
3315<l n="b">ṅhiṅ yan māti narendra rakva niyatan milvānute jə̄ṅ haji.</l>
